question: crs - warum wir bestimmte informationen von dir ben√∂tigen
answer:
n26 ist als reguliertes finanzinstitut gem√§√ü des common reporting standard (crs) dazu verpflichtet, steuerlichen beh√∂rden in der europ√§ischen union informationen √ºber kundenkonten zur verf√ºgung zu stellen, deren inhaber in anderen l√§ndern steuerpflichtig sind. der crs wurde von der oecd (organization for economic cooperation and development) entwickelt und ist ein globaler standard f√ºr den automatischen austausch von informationen (aeoi). das ziel des crs ist es, zur bek√§mpfung von steuerhinterziehung beizutragen, indem er steuerlichen beh√∂rden den bestand im ausland befindlicher verm√∂genswerte tranparenter macht. mehr als 90 l√§nder haben sich erkl√§rt, im rahmen des crs informationen ihrer einwohner √ºber ihre verm√∂genswerte und einkommen zu teilen. damit wir feststellen k√∂nnen, ob ein konto den steuerlichen beh√∂rden zwecks crs mitzuteilen ist, m√ºssen wir dich fragen: in welchem land du als steuerpflichtige person giltst:
normalerweise giltst du als steuerpflichtige person desjenigen landes, in dem deine wohnadresse liegt. wenn du mehrere wohnadressen in verschiedenen l√§ndern hast, greifen f√ºr gew√∂hnlich bestimmte entscheidungsregeln, die in den steuerabkommen und steuergesetzen der betreffenden l√§nder festgehalten sind. es kann vorkommen, dass du in mehreren l√§ndern steuerpflichtig bist. wenn dieser fall gegeben ist, m√ºssen wir wissen, um welche l√§nder es sich handelt und wie deine entsprechenden identifikationsnummern als steuerzahler lauten, damit wir den steuerlichen beh√∂rden zuverl√§ssige informationen zur verf√ºgung stellen k√∂nnen.
wie deine steuer-identifikationsnummer (‚Äútin‚Äù) lautet:
die zuteilung und das format der tin variiert zwischen den l√§ndern. die eu hat eine anleitung(neuen tab) zur identifikation der tins ihrer mitgliedstaaten ver√∂ffentlicht, mit der du deine individuelle(n) tin(s) in den verschiedenen l√§ndern identifizieren kannst. falls sich deine lebenslage ver√§ndert, kannst deine steuerinformationen in der n26 app jederzeit anpassen. logge dich daf√ºr einfach in deine n26 app ein, und gehe zum bereich: mein konto > einstellungen > pers√∂nliche einstellungen > steuerdaten, und aktualisiere dort deine informationen.

question: will my direct debit go through if i am low on funds?
answer: if your account has insufficient funds when a direct debit is due, it will simply be declined. it is not possible to delay a direct debit. please note, your account will not be charged an insufficient funds fee.

question: fatca - why we require certain information from our customers
answer:
as a financial institution, n26 is required to report information about financial accounts held by u.s. taxpayers or by foreign entities (in which u.s. taxpayers hold a substantial ownership interest according to fatca) to the united states department of treasury and the internal revenue service (‚Äúirs‚Äù). fatca is an acronym for foreign account tax compliance act and is a legislation designed to prevent tax evasion. another purpose of fatca is to encourage better tax compliance by preventing u.s. persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid u.s. taxation on their income and assets. you can find more information about fatca on the irs website(new tab). the u.s. tax system includes u.s. citizens who are not presently residing in the u.s. in comparison. so in order for us to be able to accurately determine whether your account is to be reported to the irs, we‚Äôll need to ask you: are you (also) a citizen or green card holder of the united states? 
are you subject to tax in the u.s?

being ‚Äúsubject to tax‚Äù in the u.s. does not necessarily mean that you‚Äôre also paying personal income tax in the u.s. it means that u.s. tax law requires you to file a tax return and declare your (worldwide) income to the irs, even if you don‚Äôt end up paying any u.s. tax.
if so, what is your u.s. taxpayer identification number?

as a u.s. tin you can either use your u.s. social security number (‚Äússn‚Äù) or your u.s. individual taxpayer identification number (itin). you can find more information about tin on the irs‚Äô website(new tab). additionally, if your account shows: a u.s. place of birth, a u.s. telephone number,a standing order to the u.s. then we are required by fatca legislation to initially assume that you are subject to fatca until you can specifically confirm to us otherwise. in case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the n26 app. to do this, simply log in to the n26 app and go to: my account > settings > personal settings > tax information

question: how do i activate my debit card?
answer: please keep in mind that: you need to physically have your debit card in order to activate it. you‚Äôll need your 10-digit token number for this: it‚Äôs found below your name on the front of your debit card. we‚Äôll ask you for this number every time you contact us to prove it‚Äôs really you.if you have multiple debit cards (for example, you ordered your card more than once or your delivery was delayed), you can only activate your most recent debit card. all other debit cards will be disabled. this is because you can only have one card per account.you‚Äôll need to follow the activation steps below every time you activate a new or replacement debit card.activate your debit card through the mobile app:log into your account.  then go to:  "actions"‚Üí"card settings"‚Üí"activate".you will need to enter your token number (below your name). activate your card through the web app:log into your account.  the option to activate the debit card will be seen as a banner on the home page.  you will need to enter your token number (below your name). after you‚Äôve activated your debit card, the next step is choosing a card pin.

question: how to request a refund for a direct debit?

question: psd2 - strong customer authentication
answer: sca acts as an additional layer of security for all n26 customers by providing two-factor authentication (2fa). this is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. you‚Äôre probably familiar with using just your personal password to sign in to your account but with two-factor authentication you‚Äôll need either confirmation from a paired device or an sms code. when you log into your n26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you‚Äôll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or you can request an sms code to be sent to your registered number to confirm your login attempt. this ensures that only you can log into your n26 account.  when you log into your n26 account from your paired device, two-factor authentication is already in motion. therefore, the process of logging into your n26 account from your paired device stays the same. sca is being introduced as part of the revised european payments services directive (psd2) which applies to all european banks. the objective of psd2 is to enhance the security of the customers‚Äô data and account security. find out more about psd2 in our dedicated article about the psd2.  faqs first, try update your phone to the newest version. if you still cannot log into your account but still have access to your registered email address, please try to reset your password. if you don‚Äôt have access to your registered email address, please contact us via our live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out.  if you lost access to your paired device but you still have access to your registered phone number, please log into your n26 account and request an authentication code. to do this: login to the webappwhen prompted to confirm your login on your paired device, select help choose send sms codeonce you receive the sms code, input it into the webapp as you confirm the authentication code you‚Äôve completed two-factor authentication and you‚Äôll be able to pair your new device with your account again. if you don‚Äôt have access to your registered phone number - either because you have a new phone number or your phone was lost or stolen - please contact our customer service via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out.  if you have an older smartphone device that doesn‚Äôt support the latest app version,  you won‚Äôt be able to access n26 via the mobile app anymore using your phone.  you can still use our webapp to view your account, to do this you‚Äôll need to confirm your login attempt via an sms verification code which we‚Äôll send to your account‚Äôs registered phone number.  you‚Äôll still be able to complete card transactions and cash withdrawals as normal using your mastercard but bear in mind that you won‚Äôt be able to perform any bank transfers or payments until you can confirm the transfer within the n26 app.

question: how long does it take to send money with transferwise?
answer: once you‚Äôve initiated your transfer via transferwise you‚Äôll be given an estimated time frame. when making a transfer, ensure that the recipients name exactly matches the name on their bank account!  if a transferwise transfer fails, we‚Äôll notify you via push message. the amount will automatically be returned to your account a few days later. you can‚Äôt personally cancel a transfer, but if you get in touch with transferwise support this way they can cancel the transfer for you. keep in mind that the transfer can only be cancelled up until the point transferwise pays out your funds. once the money has been sent to the recipient, it‚Äôs not possible to cancel the transfer anymore. the recipients details can only be changed up until the point that transferwise has paid out your money. after your money has been paid out, the recipients details can no longer be changed. you can get in touch with transferwise this way. transferwise doesn‚Äôt charge extra fees for a returned payment and neither do we. however, some participating banks do charge fees, in which case transferwise will deduct this amount from the money returned under their conditions of use(new tab). common reasons for a failed transfer: error in the transfer details (for example, when entering the recipient‚Äôs name or account information).special characters or too many characters in the recipient‚Äôs name or reference field.limits have been reached or online payments aren‚Äôt active in card settings.foreign currency transfers aren‚Äôt possible with n26 business or n26 business you or if the recipient is a business account.

question: shared spaces - what is a power of attorney?
answer: the legal model behind shared spaces is called power of attorney (kontovollmacht in german).  participants of a shared space do not have equal ownership of the account like a joint account in the traditional banking sense. after receiving power of attorney the participants obtain the right to act on behalf of the owner regarding any transfer of funds within the shared space. the person authorizing the other to act on his behalf is called the ‚Äúowner‚Äù, this person is the only account holder. the owner must be a n26 premium account holder e.g. n26 you, n26 metal and n26 business you. this means that whoever created the shared space is its legal owner. the owner of a shared space:  owns all the funds within a shared space. can transfer funds freely in and out of the account anytime. can invite people to the shared space by granting others power of attorney.can revoke the power of attorney of a participant at any time.can also close a shared space after removing a participant. (all funds in the shared space will be transferred to the owner‚Äôs main account) by granting a person power of attorney, they‚Äôll have full access to all the money held within a shared space. this means that each participant can also transfer funds freely in and out of the shared space.   n26 bank gmbh cannot be held liable for payments covered by the power of attorney. learn more

question: what are spaces?
answer: spaces are sub accounts that you can create and personalize. spaces help you visualize your short- and long-term financial goals by giving you a place to set aside your money and track your progress. you can instantaneously move money between your spaces accounts as often as you like. this feature is available using our mobile application and webapp. see below for more information about how to start using spaces today! related topics "how can i use spaces?" congratulations on taking the first step toward reaching your financial goals. a step-by-step guide to using spaces is here(new tab). "how many spaces can i create?" in addition to your main account (or primary space), you can create and delete two additional spaces sub accounts as often as you‚Äôd like. "how can i see transactions into and out of my spaces?" your primary account statements will include all transactions sent to a space or received from one. you can download balance statements from the confirmation page. "how long does it take to transfer the money between spaces?" no time at all! once the amount is confirmed, the balance is updated instantaneously. locking a space is a great way to ensure that you are not moving funds out of it and thereby staying on track to reach your financial goals.  to lock/unlock the space:go to your space.tap on the three buttons in the top right corner.select "lock/unlock space" (in the webapp, "lock space")enter your confirmation pin.  "how do i move money into a space?" you can move money into a space by tapping (or clicking) and holding down on your primary account,  and then dragging across into your space. you can also add a reference text of your choice. once the amount is confirmed, the balance is updated right away. "can i move money into a locked space?" yes, funds can be deposited into a locked space. please note that if you need to withdraw money from a locked space, you will need to unlock it first. "is the money in my space visible in my main account balance?" yes, but if you want to keep the balance in your space separate from the balance in your main account, you can hide the space balance. to hide a space balance: go to the space in the mobile application or webapp. tap on the three buttons in the top right corner.tap or click on "hide space balance".

question: wie investiert n26 mein geld?
answer: wir streben an, die einlagen unserer kunden auch f√ºr kredite an unsere kunden zur verf√ºgung zu stellen (sofern diese √ºber eine entsprechende bonit√§t verf√ºgen). f√ºr die nicht im kundengesch√§ft ben√∂tigte liquidit√§t ist unsere anlagestrategie risikoarm. wir legen das geld unserer kunden kurzfristig bei der deutschen bundesbank und bei anderen europ√§ischen banken im euroraum mit ausschlie√ülich guten risikoklassen an. daneben refinanzieren wir √∂ffentlich-rechtliche kunden haupts√§chlich in deutschland (st√§dte und gemeinden) und investieren in euro-staatsanleihen. wir sind kein handelsbuchinstitut. das hei√üt, wir betreiben keinen handel zur kurzfristigen gewinnerzielung. und wir t√§tigen auch keine spekulationsgesch√§fte, weder auf nahrungsmittel, devisen, bitcoins, noch auf andere anlageklassen.

question: how to block my n26 card?
answer: you can block and unblock your cards at any time in the app. go to the actions tab and select card settings. there you can decide if you want to temporarily limit or disable your atm withdrawals, online payments or payments abroad, or block your card entirely. this way, you have full control of your card and can protect yourself against unauthorized transactions. you should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. you can always unblock it later.  if you do not have access to your n26 mobile app or your n26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in english) .

question: how to reorder a card?
answer: if you are already waiting for a card, please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed. you can check it on the home screen of your mobile app. if you need to reorder a card, please check your shipping details: üë§ my account > settings > personal settings > shipping address. it must be a residential address (business addresses are not accepted).your name must be on the mailbox (if a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the additional address info in your mobile app).enter your postal code without any spaces.if applicable, add your building number, stairwell number and door code to the additional address info in your mobile app.if your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.if you are moving soon then consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you will be moving. if your very first n26 card did not arrive within the estimated timeframe then please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app and we will help you from there. if you had an activated card before then follow these steps: go to the ‚Äôhome screen‚Äô and then ‚Äôactions‚Äôtap ‚Äôcard settings‚Äôfrom your list of cards, swipe until you see the card you wish to reorderfinally, select ‚Äôreorder‚Äô use your card before it physically arrives: before your n26 card even arrives in the mail, you can begin using it through your apple pay or google pay wallet. this way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants that support this payment method. learn more about this option in our dedicated article(new tab). standard delivery: n26 standard and n26 you cards: 10‚Ç¨n26 metal cards: 45‚Ç¨ express delivery: n26 standard and n26 you cards: 30‚Ç¨n26 metal: 65‚Ç¨ please note: if you‚Äôre waiting for your first card and your shipping address is correct then please contact our customer service.

question: how to make transfers in foreign currencies?
answer: we have partnered with transferwise to make foreign currency transfers easy. transferwise offers real-time exchange rates and no hidden fees. to initiate a transfer in a foreign currency start by logging into the mobile app:  from the home screen choose the actions tabselect send money followed by foreign currency transferselect the desired currency and enter the amount you would like to send in ‚Ç¨ (it will automatically convert into the foreign currency below). after that, you add a new recipient or select an existing payeefinalise the transfer with your confirmation pin you‚Äôll receive an email from transferwise to change your password and then you can use both log in details to perform the transfer from there. please note that in order for this process to work, you need to create a transferwise profile via the n26 app first, meaning that you need to try to go through the in-app foreign currency transfer flow. otherwise you won‚Äôt receive an email from transferwise to reset the password. please also note that foreign currency transfers in the app are not possible with the n26 business, business you or business metal account, nor are transfers to businesses. transferwise has its own transfer types and fees but this will all be indicated before you confirm the transfer. for detailed information about eligible recipients, please check transferwise‚Äôs available currencies(new tab). want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to n26. learn more about our refer a friend program.

question: what are shared spaces?
answer: shared spaces is a new and easy way for n26 users to share money together. these spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative. shared spaces are available to n26 premium users (you / business you / metal), who can both create shared spaces and invite participants to their space. participants can be any n26 account holder regardless of their account type.the owner of the shared space owns the money inside it.the owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants for their space. similar to regular spaces, shared spaces have neither an iban nor a card attached to them.

question: where is my refund?
answer:
in most cases, your refund will be visible in the app on the day of the original transaction, not the refund date. scroll down your transaction list or download your previous balance statements to find it. to view and download pdfs of your (preliminary and previous) monthly balance statements: on the webapp(new tab): from transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach downloads then select bank statements.
on the mobile app: if you‚Äôre using an iphone, tap on the three dots to the right of your current balance from the main screen. a menu will pop up and will give you the option to access your balance statement. for androids, you‚Äôll find the option under statistics (just tap the 3 dots in the top right-hand corner). the amounts blocked as a car rental deposit can take up to 30 days to return to your account while a refund of a card payment will be automatically credited to your account within a maximum of 12 days.

question: how to change my confirmation pin?
answer: you can change your confirmation pin at any time in the app: go to üë§ my account then: settings and security (mobile app) or security settings (webapp(new tab))select change confirmation pinenter the 10-digit token number on your mastercardcreate and confirm your new confirmation pin if you enter your confirmation pin incorrectly 6 times, you‚Äôll need to reset it before trying again. for security reasons, your pin can‚Äôt contain parts of your date of birth or your address, repeated numbers (such as 1111, 111, or 11), or sequences (such as 1234 or 4321). if the pin you‚Äôve chosen is not accepted, please try again using a different one. prefer a video over text? watch the tutorial(new tab) on our n26 support youtube(new tab) channel.

question: how to find my iban or account number?
answer: you can find your iban and bic number on your balance statements or in üë§ my account from the mobile app or webapp(new tab) (if you haven‚Äôt activated your card and need to top up your account). all our ibans start with de (germany), it (italy), or es (spain) followed by the check digits (two numbers), then our bank code 10011001 and end with your 10-digit account number (start at 26). you can easily share your information through the share button in üë§ my account. or you can download your bank account information as a pdf by logging into the webapp(new tab) and selecting the cloud icon on the top-right corner of transactions. prefer a video over text? watch the tutorial(new tab) on our n26 support youtube(new tab) channel.

question: how to invite friends to join n26?
answer: you can start inviting friends as soon as you have access to your account, in the mobile app or n26 webapp.(new tab) to invite friends: on ios: log into the mobile app and tap on the explore tab next to the + button.tap on refer friends.tap on your referral code to copy it.select one of the options available for sharing. write a message to your friend or use the default then tap send. on android: log into the mobile app, then go to my account üë§ and select the gift icon.tap on your referral code to copy it.tap tell a friend.select one of the options available for sharing.write a message to your friend or use the default then tap send. find out how you can be rewarded for your referrals with our refer a friend program (available in select countries).

question: how to prove my identity?
answer: as a licensed bank, it‚Äôs important that we know who our customers are. that‚Äôs why we request our customers to prove their identity with a supported id document when they open an account or use certain products. we would never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. we‚Äôve gathered other tips to help you protect your identity. there are two different ways you can show us your id, and we‚Äôve also collected some troubleshooting tips for each: photo and video. the method you can choose to show us your id depends on your nationality, your country of residence, and the type of id you use: i live in germany(new tab)i live in spain(new tab)i live in italy(new tab)i live in a different country(new tab) if your id isn‚Äôt on the list, it means we cannot offer you an account with us at the time. we take identity verification very seriously and our customer support will not be able to make an exception for you regarding the supported documents. but we‚Äôre always adding new documents to this list so it‚Äôs worth checking back to see if yours has been added. in case your residential address is in germany and you‚Äôre unable to complete your photo or video verification due to a disability, please start the registration process by entering your details and then contact our customer support. we‚Äôre happy to assist you. chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including sundays and bank holidays.

question: how to reorder a card?
answer: if you are already waiting for a card, please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed. you can check it on the home screen of your mobile app. if you need to reorder a card, please check your shipping details: üë§ my account > settings > personal settings > shipping address. it must be a residential address (business addresses are not accepted).your name must be on the mailbox (if a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the additional address info in your mobile app).enter your postal code without any spaces.if applicable, add your building number, stairwell number and door code to the additional address info in your mobile app.if your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.if you are moving soon then consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you will be moving. if your very first n26 card did not arrive within the estimated timeframe then please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app and we will help you from there. if you had an activated card before then follow these steps: go to the ‚Äôhome screen‚Äô and then ‚Äôactions‚Äôtap ‚Äôcard settings‚Äôfrom your list of cards, swipe until you see the card you wish to reorderfinally, select ‚Äôreorder‚Äô use your card before it physically arrives: before your n26 card even arrives in the mail, you can begin using it through your apple pay or google pay wallet. this way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants that support this payment method. learn more about this option in our dedicated article(new tab). standard delivery: n26 standard and n26 you cards: 10‚Ç¨n26 metal cards: 45‚Ç¨ express delivery: n26 standard and n26 you cards: 30‚Ç¨n26 metal: 65‚Ç¨ please note: if you‚Äôre waiting for your first card and your shipping address is correct then please contact our customer service.

question: warum ist n26 sicher?
answer: zum schutz deines kontos verwenden wir eine dreistufige sicherheitsarchitektur: sichere anmeldung: die zugangsdaten der mobilen app und der webapp(neuen tab) bestehen aus einem benutzernamen und einem passwort oder einer fingerabdruck-/gesichtserkennung (abh√§ngig von deinem smartphone). bitte w√§hle ein sicheres passwort und gib deine zugangsdaten nicht an dritte weiter.best√§tigungs-pin: dies ist ein 4-stelliger code, den du jedes mal ben√∂tigst, wenn du eine √ºberweisung durchf√ºhrst oder dein smartphone verkn√ºpfst/trennst. du richtest diese pin erstmalig ein, wenn du dein smartphone erfolgreich mit deinem konto verkn√ºpft hast. danach kannst du sie in der app selbst √§ndern.push-nachrichten: f√ºr jede eingehende und ausgehende zahlung wird eine push-nachricht an dein verkn√ºpftes smartphone gesendet. sie dient auch zur best√§tigung und zum abschluss deiner transaktionen. au√üerdem haben wir 3d secure eingerichtet, um dich vor online-kartenbetrug zu sch√ºtzen. jedes mal, wenn du uns kontaktierst, werden wir dir einige sicherheitsfragen stellen um sicherzugehen, dass wir wirklich mit dir sprechen. aber wir werden dich nie nach deiner kartennummer, deinem card verification code (cvv), passwort und deiner karten- oder best√§tigungs-pin fragen. wir haben weitere schritte eingef√ºhrt, um deine pers√∂nlichen daten zu sch√ºtzen: wir speichern so wenige informationen √ºber dich wie m√∂glich; nur so lange wie wir rechtlich dazu verpflichtet sind und l√∂schen diese daten, sobald sie f√ºr das produkt oder die dienstleistung nicht mehr ben√∂tigt werden. du kannst deine pers√∂nlichen daten bis zu 6 monate nach deiner kontoschlie√üung herunterladen. mehr informationen dazu findest du in unserer datenschutzerkl√§rung(neuen tab).

question: how to get my money back in case of fraud?
answer: if you don‚Äôt recognize a transaction or you‚Äôre sure you didn‚Äôt authorize it, blocking your card won‚Äôt be enough. in these cases you should immediately: request new card(new tab) and indicate that the old one has been stolen. please tear up the card by cutting it with scissors, for example. both the chip, the nfc antenna and the magnetic stripe must be cut into pieces.then fill out the dispute form(new tab). from there we will do everything we can to get your money back. you can continue using your account for bank transfers until your new card arrives. if you‚Äôre in germany or austria, you can also use cash26 for cash withdrawals. you should keep in mind that changes in the final amount debited from your account don‚Äôt necessarily indicate fraud.

question: how does n26 business work?
answer: ‚ÑπÔ∏è applies to austria, belgium, denmark, estonia, finland, france, germany, greece, iceland, ireland, italy, liechtenstein, luxembourg, the netherlands, norway, poland, portugal, slovakia, slovenia, spain, sweden, and switzerland. it‚Äôs not yet possible to switch between accounts so it‚Äôs important to know if n26 business is right for you: the n26 business account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. that means you can‚Äôt have your company‚Äôs name on the account or card.the n26 business mastercard is intended for business use only. you receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. it‚Äôs currently not possible to have two separate n26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a maestro card (it‚Äôs available in germany, austria, and the netherlands).as with the n26 bank account, the account is free and we cover certain cash withdrawals as part of our fair use policy. unlike other accounts, transfers in foreign currencies aren‚Äôt possible with n26 business within the app. you can visit transferwise(new tab) for this.business to business (b2b) payments are not supported with a n26 business account.  want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to n26. learn more about our refer a friend program.

question: why did my sepa transfer fail?
answer: we accept transfers in eur done via sepa. we don‚Äôt support swift so if you need to make a foreign currency transfer, please use transferwise (in the app or from their website(new tab)). to get a transfer, you‚Äôll only need to provide the sender with your full name (as it‚Äôs written on the id you provided for verification) and your iban. you can find your iban on your balance statements and in üë§ my account (in the mobile app or webapp(new tab)). common reasons for failed transfers: the recipient‚Äôs name on the transfer order is different from the name on their account (must be their name as written on their id).the recipient‚Äôs name is a company name instead of a personal/account name (applies to n26 business).the iban is incorrect.you‚Äôre not receiving the push message to confirm your transfer.an inappropriate use was found. n26 has the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see gwg ¬ß 10(new tab)). as a result, we may ask for documentation to verify the origin or source of these transactions. this can result in the credit being delayed or not taking place.

question: why didn't i receive my pairing code via sms?
answer: a pairing code is required to connect your smartphone to your account. if you didn‚Äôt receive this code via sms for whatever reason, you can request a new one up to five times in the mobile app. please wait 30 seconds before requesting a new one.  if all five codes are requested and pairing is still unsuccessful, then for security reasons you‚Äôll be blocked from making further requests for 24 hours. if this happens, you can either wait or contact our customer support via chat - who would be happy to help you. if your country code is outside of the eu, it‚Äôs likely that you‚Äôll need to contact us to receive a pairing code.

question: kann ich meine karte mit expressversand schneller bekommen?
answer: die expresslieferung ist eine gute wahl, wenn du deine karte schnell ben√∂tigst.  wenn du deine erste karte bestellst oder eine neue karte bestellst, steht auch die option expressversand zur verf√ºgung. die karte ist nicht nur schneller bei dir, du erh√§ltst auch noch einen tracking-link per e-mail. wenn du bei der zustellung nicht zu hause bist und dein postfach nicht erreichbar ist, wird die karte an einen zugangspunkt in deiner n√§he geliefert (den du √ºber den tracking-link findest). die karte bleibt nur f√ºr eine begrenzte zeit dort, danach wird sie an uns zur√ºckgesandt. wir informieren dich in diesem fall per e-mail. wenn du die expresslieferung w√§hlst, beachte bitte: deine neue n26 mastercard wird innerhalb von drei werktagen ausgeliefert. die zustellung erfolgt zwischen 8 und 12 uhr.lieferungen k√∂nnen per dhl express in alle von uns unterst√ºtzten l√§nder innerhalb europas erfolgen. lieferungen in andere l√§nder sind derzeit nicht m√∂glich.wenn expresslieferung als versandart ausgew√§hlt wurde, kann die lieferung nicht storniert oder ge√§ndert werden.auch wenn du dein konto schlie√üt, wird die geb√ºhr f√ºr die expresslieferung f√§llig. wenn deine karte nicht innerhalb von 3-5 werktagen nach deiner bestellung eingetroffen ist, √ºberpr√ºfe bitte den tracking-link auf m√∂gliche updates. du kannst den tracking-link auch verwenden, um dhl direkt √ºber die details deiner lieferadresse zu informieren oder die sendung umzuleiten, wenn du zum zeitpunkt der lieferung nicht zuhause bist. bei n26 standard und n26 you kostet eine neue karte 10‚Ç¨ inklusive standardversand oder 30‚Ç¨, wenn du dich f√ºr eine expresslieferung entscheidest.

question: how to file a complaint?

looking for support or have a question if you don‚Äôt wish to make a complaint but you have questions about our products or need help with your account, we‚Äôre always happy to assist. you can email us at support@n26.com(new tab) (new tab), or just open a chat with us directly within the mobile app or webapp, that‚Äôs the fastest and simplest way to get in touch. raising a complaint we‚Äôre sorry you feel the need to raise a complaint, please see below for the ways you are able to do this.  if you are dissatisfied with one of our products or services, you can send us an email from your registered email address* or send your complaint via post to the address to: n26 bank gmbh ‚Äì complaint management

arrangements, debit card charges and more. in the event that it is not possible for us to respect the time limit of 15 days, n26 will send an holding answer indicating the reasons for the delay and resolution platform to help consumers dispute out of court. we are committed to constantly improving our products and services and your feedback makes this possible. should you wish to provide us with question: can i open an account if i live outside the eurozone?

consejos para un env√≠o con √©xito: si tu direcci√≥n contiene caracteres especiales, cont√°ctanos mediante el chat de la app.solo enviamos las tarjetas a direcciones residenciales (no se admiten direcciones comerciales).en la direcci√≥n de entrega, no utilices espacios cuando escribas el c√≥digo postal.aseg√∫rate de que no falta informaci√≥n esencial (por ejemplo, el nombre en tu buz√≥n si vives en alemania o el n√∫mero de edificio, n√∫mero de escalera y c√≥digo de la puerta, si corresponde). si te vas a quedar temporalmente en alg√∫n lugar (con un amigo o en un airbnb), aseg√∫rate de incluir el nombre en el buz√≥n que pertenece al inquilino principal del departamento.si te vas a mudar a alg√∫n lugar y esta es tu primera tarjeta, aseg√∫rate de seleccionar el pa√≠s y la direcci√≥n a donde te mudar√°s y deseas recibir tu tarjeta n26.

question: ¬øpor qu√© me han cobrado m√°s de lo esperado?
answer: todas las transacciones se hacen en tiempo real. te avisaremos cada vez que haya una transacci√≥n entrante o saliente mediante una notificaci√≥n push. en ocasiones, una transacci√≥n puede resultar sospechosa debido a que la cantidad final es diferente a la cantidad original. esto puede deberse a varias razones: un comerciante puede bloquear una cantidad superior a la del precio del servicio a modo de dep√≥sito (ocurre a menudo en las estaciones de servicio, con el alquiler de veh√≠culos o con reservas de hotel). la diferencia entre el dep√≥sito y el precio del servicio se ingresar√° en tu cuenta cuando pase la fecha de vencimiento.los tipos de cambio pueden dar lugar a ligeras variaciones en las transacciones en moneda extranjera. en ambos casos, no cobramos ning√∫n inter√©s por la diferencia de las cuant√≠as.  pero da por sentado que si una transacci√≥n no se ha autorizado por ti, el propietario de la cuenta, te ayudaremos a recuperar tu dinero.

question: how do i close my n26 account?
answer: to close your n26 account, please contact us at 1-888-n26-0-n26 (1-888-626-0626) or via chat in our mobile application or webapp(new tab) and we‚Äôll help you take care of it. a few tips to help speed up the account closure process: in order to close your account, your balance must be zero.accounts with a positive balance: if you have a positive balance in your main account or in spaces(new tab), you have a few options to take your balance to zero. please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out to us if you need help with any of these options. please note that direct transfers and/or withdrawals cannot be made directly out of spaces. any balance in your spaces must first be moved into your main account for it to be accessible.  if you have a balance in a denomination that you can withdraw from an atm, you can easily take your balance to zero this way (please see our article ‚Äúall about allpoint(new tab)‚Äù for more information).you can use your n26 debit card to make a purchase that will take your balance to zero.you can use a third-party payment processor (paypal, for example) and transfer your remaining balance. you can transfer your balance to an external bank account. this can be done by initiating a withdrawal by the external bank from your n26 account. please see our article ‚Äúhow to add money to my n26 account(new tab)‚Äù to learn more about linking an external bank account to your n26 account. please note that the transfer must be initiated at the external bank account. we do not currently offer the ability to transfer funds from your n26 account to an external bank account from within our mobile or web applications.  accounts with negative balance: if you have a negative balance, please add funds to bring your balance to $0. please see our article ‚Äúhow to add money to my n26 account?(new tab)‚Äù for more information.  after your account is closed, please destroy your card by cutting it with scissors or a shredder. the chip, nfc antenna, and the magnetic strip should all be cut into pieces and disposed of separately. please note that the process of closing your account will take a minimum of 10 business days. we will notify you via email when it is closed.

question: what are the benefits of n26 you?
answer:
once you upgrade to n26 you, you‚Äôll receive 10 additional spaces and the option to choose one of our five new card colours: rhubarb, ocean, sand, aqua, and slate.  n26 you customers are also covered under the premium account‚Äôs insurance package provided by allianz global assistance*, which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as: travel insurance: reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.
snow and mountain rescue. get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains. car, bike and scooter sharing. coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies. extra card. you can purchase an extra n26 you card for a one-off fee of 14‚Ç¨ through your n26 app (available in germany, spain, austria, italy).  if you‚Äôre an n26 you customer, or if you want to upgrade to n26 you, you‚Äôll have the possibility to choose one of our five new colors when ordering a new card:  keep these in mind when considering n26 you(new tab): the n26 you mastercard has no embossing: the card details, including the number, cvv code, and 10-digit token are printed on the back. if you upgrade to n26 you, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨9,90 will be deducted directly from your n26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. if you‚Äôre a new customer, the first fee will be deducted 15 days after you prove your identity. from then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on your sign-up date. meaning that, if you opened your account at the end of the month, the first two  monthly fees will be charged the following month. the minimum membership is one year. your contract automatically renews if you don‚Äôt cancel your membership at least 4 weeks before the contract expires. you can purchase an extra n26 you card for a one-off fee of 14‚Ç¨ through your n26 app.   *allianz global assistance europe trade name of awp p&c s.a. - dutch branch, and member of the allianz group. want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to n26. learn more about our refer a friend program.

screen of your n26 mobile app, you will also receive an email with a tracking link to stay up-to-date on the progress of your card delivery. learn more in our dedicated article about express delivery. please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed before taking further action. your first card after opening the account or upgrading to a premium membership is always free. for the following ones, a replacement fee may apply. you need to verify your identity when opening an n26 account. please be sure you have completed this process by logging into your account. once this process is question: what does n26 do with my tax information?
answer: the oecd requires certain tax information to be shared by means of the common reporting standard(new tab) (ecr). to carry out our obligations, we must establish which country you‚Äôre taxable in. we do this through your tax identification or national insurance number.  we forward this information via the german federal tax office to tax authorities in other countries if:  you live in a ecr participating country.you have a postbox or a second registered address in another ecr participating country.when registering you gave a telephone number belonging to another ecr participating country.you have a standing order, or make regular payments, to an account located in another ecr participating country. we also forward data to the u.s. internal revenue service(new tab) (irs) according to the foreign account tax compliance act(new tab) (fatca). we may request your social security number (ssn) in order to check your tax status in the u.s. because: you are a citizen of the u.s (including dual citizenship).when registering you gave a telephone number belonging to the u.s.you were born in the u.s. (or in a u.s. embassy located abroad).you‚Äôre married to a u.s. national.you gave us an address in the u.s.you make regular payment transfers to the u.s. to update your tax identification or social security number in the n26 app: go to  my account and tap on settings and account settingsselect personal settings then tax informationselect the country in which you‚Äôre tax-liableenter either your tax identification number or your social security number important information in germany, we need your steueridentifikationsnummer (11 digits) not your steuernummer (9 digits).if you‚Äôre not tax-liable in another country, contact us so we can confirm your tax status.in each and every case your personal data will be securely stored and only used for the fulfillment of ecr and fatca requirements.we‚Äôre unable to advise you on your tax status. if you‚Äôre unsure of your status please discuss the matter with a tax advisor.if you‚Äôve entered the country in which you are liable for tax but not your tax identification number, please remove the country from the list shown to you in the app, reenter the country, and enter your tax identification number again.

question: how to file a complaint?
answer:
looking for support or have a question
 if you don‚Äôt wish to make a complaint but you have questions about our products or need help with your account, we‚Äôre always happy to assist. you can email us at support@n26.com (new tab)(new tab), or just open a chat with us directly within the mobile app or webapp, that‚Äôs the fastest and simplest way to get in touch. raising a complaint
 we‚Äôre sorry you feel the need to raise a complaint, please see below for the ways you are able to do this. if you are dissatisfied with one of our products or services, you can send us an email from your registered email address* or send your complaint via post to the address to: n26 bank gmbh ‚Äì complaint management
klosterstra√üe 62, 10179 berlin, germany to submit your complaint via email please write to the following email address litiges@n26.com(new tab) (new tab). alternatively you can request to raise a complaint via our live support team and they will be happy to assist. when filing a complaint, please always include: your full name email and home addressthe product or service you‚Äôre unhappy happy witha description of your complaint and when this occurred. you can also include any supporting documentation you have in relation to your complaint  we‚Äôll contact you via email to confirm that we‚Äôve received your complaint and then begin our investigation. in case we need more information from you, our complaint management department will reach out directly via email with an explanation of the information required.
once our complaint management department has investigated your concerns we will provide you with a final decision via email.  if you are unhappy with the outcome of your complaint if you are not satisfied with the resolution provided, you can escalate your complaint to an independent third party. for example: an arbitration body is available to you at the german federal bank (deutsche bundesbank)or you could file a complaint with the german federal financial supervisory authority (bundesanstalt f√ºr finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht ‚Äì bafin)  the european commission has also set up the online dispute resolution platform to help consumers dispute out of court. we are committed to constantly improving our products and services and your feedback makes this possible. should you wish to provide us with feedback regarding anything, please write to us at ideas@n26.com(new tab) (new tab). * we can only discuss account related matters from an email address registered with the n26 account

question: where does n26 invest my money?
answer: we strive to provide our clients‚Äô deposits for loans to our customers (provided that they have the appropriate credit rating). for the liquidity not required in the customer business, our investment strategy is low in risk. we invest our customers‚Äô money at short notice with the deutsche bundesbank and other european banks in the eurozone with only good risk classes. and we refinance public-law customers mainly in germany (cities and municipalities) and invest in euro government bonds. we‚Äôre not a trading book institute. that is: we do not trade for short-term profit. and we don‚Äôt engage in speculation, whether on food, foreign exchange, bitcoins or other asset classes.

question: shared spaces - what is a power of attorney?
answer: the legal model behind shared spaces is called power of attorney (kontovollmacht in german).  participants of a shared space do not have equal ownership of the account like a joint account in the traditional banking sense. after receiving power of attorney the participants obtain the right to act on behalf of the owner regarding any transfer of funds within the shared space. the person authorizing the other to act on his behalf is called the ‚Äúowner‚Äù, this person is the only account holder. the owner must be a n26 premium account holder e.g. n26 you, n26 metal and n26 business you. this means that whoever created the shared space is its legal owner. the owner of a shared space:  owns all the funds within a shared space. can transfer funds freely in and out of the account anytime. can invite people to the shared space by granting others power of attorney.can revoke the power of attorney of a participant at any time.can also close a shared space after removing a participant. (all funds in the shared space will be transferred to the owner‚Äôs main account) by granting a person power of attorney, they‚Äôll have full access to all the money held within a shared space. this means that each participant can also transfer funds freely in and out of the shared space.   n26 bank gmbh cannot be held liable for payments covered by the power of attorney. learn more

question: how to order my card with express delivery?
answer: express delivery is a good option if you need your card in a hurry or if postal deliveries have sometimes failed to reach you for whatever reason. you‚Äôll be given the option to select express delivery when choosing a delivery method for your first card or if you reorder a card. you‚Äôll then receive a tracking link by email. if you‚Äôre not home during the delivery and your mailbox can‚Äôt be accessed, the card will be left at a nearby access point (you can find it through the provided tracking link). the card only stays at the access point for a limited amount of time. after that, it‚Äôll be returned to us. we‚Äôll inform you by email if that happens. if you order via express delivery, keep in mind that: your new standard, n26 you or metal mastercard will be delivered within 2-3 working days. deliveries take place between 08:00 and 12:00. deliveries can be made by dhl express to all of our supported countries within europe. it‚Äôs currently not possible to make deliveries to other countries.it‚Äôs not possible to cancel or change an express delivery once it‚Äôs been selected as the delivery method.to close an account, you must pay for the express delivery of your card. if your card hasn‚Äôt arrived within 3-5 working days of placing your order, please check the tracking link for an update. you can also use the tracking link to inform dhl directly about the details of your delivery address or to redirect the shipment if you can‚Äôt be there at the time of delivery. n26 standard and n26 you cards have a fee of ‚Ç¨10 for standard shipping and ‚Ç¨30 for express shipping (which includes the ‚Ç¨10 card replacement fee).

question: where is my refund?
answer:
in most cases, your refund will be visible in the app on the day of the original transaction, not the refund date. scroll down your transaction list or download your previous balance statements to find it. to view and download pdfs of your (preliminary and previous) monthly balance statements: on the webapp(new tab): from transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach downloads then select bank statements.
on the mobile app: if you‚Äôre using an iphone, tap on the three dots to the right of your current balance from the main screen. a menu will pop up and will give you the option to access your balance statement. for androids, you‚Äôll find the option under statistics (just tap the 3 dots in the top right-hand corner). the amounts blocked as a car rental deposit can take up to 30 days to return to your account while a refund of a card payment will be automatically credited to your account within a maximum of 12 days.

question: how to get push messages?
answer: we send you push messages to finalize transfers (such as moneybeam) or to confirm a service (as with cash26- please note this is only available in germany, austria, italy). if you aren‚Äôt receiving these messages, first check that notifications are enabled for both your phone and the app. then try some of our troubleshooting suggestions, depending on your smartphone: ios: delete the app and restart your smartphone. download and install the latest version of the app from the apple app store and connect your smartphone again.check whether you‚Äôre logged into your n26 app.make sure messaging for the app has been activated in the general settings of your smartphone. android: delete the app and restart your smartphone. download and install the latest version of the app from the google play store and connect your smartphone again.go to your account settings and activate notification by tapping app settings then notifications.huawei and xiaomi: go to settings then advanced settings and battery settings. then set n26 as a protected app.oneplus: select battery optimization then the n26 app and then don‚Äôt optimize.oppo: disable battery optimization for the app and lock it in the recent apps overview.

question: wie lege ich meine karten-pin fest?
answer: wir senden dir keine pin per post; du legst die pin f√ºr deine mastercard oder maestro card selbst fest, nachdem du dein smartphone erfolgreich mit deinem konto verkn√ºpft und deine karte(n) aktiviert hast. so legst du deine pin fest oder √§nderst sie: gehe zum aktionen-tabw√§hle karteneinstellungen und streiche nach links, um eine karte auszuw√§hlenw√§hle pin √§nderngib die 10-stellige token-nummer auf deiner karte einw√§hle deine neue pin und best√§tige sie beachte: wenn du in frankreich, spanien, irland, griechenland, finnland oder estland wohnst, musst du deine erste zahlung mit dem chip und der pin deiner karte t√§tigen, um die karte vollst√§ndig zu aktivieren. alternativ kannst du daf√ºr an einem geldautomaten auch deinen kontostand abfragen oder geld abheben. aus sicherheitsgr√ºnden akzeptieren wir keine pin, die elemente deines geburtsdatums, deiner adresse oder eine kombination aus wiederholten ziffern oder zahlenfolgen (z. b. 1111, 1234 oder 4321) enth√§lt. wenn die von dir gew√§hlte nummer nicht akzeptiert wird, versuche es bitte erneut mit einer anderen kombination. wird eine pin dreimal hintereinander falsch eingegeben, wird die karte aus sicherheitsgr√ºnden automatisch gesperrt. in diesem fall wende dich bitte per chat an unseren kundenservice, damit wir die sperre f√ºr dich aufheben k√∂nnen. deine karten-pin ist eine andere als deine best√§tigungs-pin, du kannst jedoch f√ºr beide dieselbe zahlenkombination w√§hlen.

question: how to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?

question: what's p-account and how can i get it?
answer: a p-account is a legal protection against garnishments which can be applied to any account type that we offer. if you have a german iban you are generally entitled to convert your n26 account to a p-account. this means that in case you have an active garnishment, you‚Äôll have a monthly allowance of normally 1178,59‚Ç¨ which remains accessible to you and inaccessible to the creditor on a per month basis. an active alimony garnishment can decrease that amount. please note, however, that we need to report the conversion of you account into p-account to schufa ag. you may decide to convert your n26 account to a p-account in case your n26 account has been garnished. please note that in this case we are obligated by law to seize your account. you will simultaneously receive a detailed in-app message from us to your messages with n26 with all information regarding your garnishment and the options available to you. we encourage you to read it carefully so you are also informed about your other options, before making a decision.  in order to get a p-account, please fill out this p-account form(new tab) and sign it. you‚Äôll also find this link in the in-app message you received from us regarding your garnishment in messages from n26. please send the form back as a direct reply to that email or from your registered email address to support@n26.com. please note: if your account has been garnished and you have an open credit or overdraft at the time of conversion to a p-account, we will have to cancel your overdraft and/ or credit.you‚Äôre allowed to have only one p-account. having multiple p-accounts (even at other banks) is a violation of the law and can lead to an extraordinary termination without notice of your n26 account. faq the conversion to a p-account is free of charge and doesn‚Äôt entail additional monthly fees. already existing fees, such as account usage and premium subscription fees, will still apply. in order to increase the basic allowance of your p-account, we‚Äôll need a completed certificate from an authority or appropriate body under ¬ß 850k (5) code of civil procedure. this also applies to a one-time increase (e.g. for forwarding a rent deposit loan). you can get this certificate issued from the following authorities: your employerthe institution making payment of the child benefits (familienkasse)a nonprofit debtor and insolvency advisory bodythe job centerlawyers please send us the original certificate by post to: n26 bank gmbh claims klosterstra√üe 62  10179 berlin germany in order to convert your p-account back to your normal account you can send us an email from your registered email address to support@n26.com with the following information: your first name and surnameyour n26 ibanconfirm that you want to convert your p-account to your normal account. in case you still have an active garnishment, please be aware that your account will be seized immediately and your funds transferred to the creditor.

question: how to top up my account?
answer: once you are successfully verified, you‚Äôll be able to top up your account in several ways. to do so, simply go to the n26 app and select ‚Äôadd money‚Äô to see the available options: 1. sepa transfer (up to 2 business days): the transfer must be in eur and within the sepa zone.you will need to provide your iban and your name as it is written on the id you used to create your account.if you have a business account, please keep in mind that we do not accept company names. 2. debit or credit card (instant): you can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 150‚Ç¨.the first deposit is free. the following deposits charge a fee of 3% of the deposit amount.simply enter the card details from the sending account. please note, prepaid cards and american express credit cards are not accepted. 3. apple pay or google pay (instant): you can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 150‚Ç¨.the first deposit is free. the following deposits charge a fee of 3% of the deposit amount.simply enter the card details (credit or debit) linked to the apple pay or google pay account. please note, prepaid cards and american express credit cards are not accepted. 4. moneybeam (instant): you can receive money from other n26 users. 5. cash26 (instant): available in germany, austria and italy.deposit cash through our partner stores once your card is activated and with your paired device.

question: how to export a list of my transactions?
answer:
our web app(new tab) allows you to search within your transactions. you can also download a history of your transactions in csv format. to export your transaction list: from transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach downloads
under csv you can select the start date and end date and download csv you can also sort your transactions using categories and hashtags in the app. to view and download pdfs of your (preliminary and previous) monthly balance statements: in the web app(new tab): from transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach downloads then select bank statements.
in the mobile app: from the home screen, tap on the three bullet points in the top-right corner of the screen and choose balance statements.

question: why was i charged more than expected?
answer: all transactions take place in real-time. we‚Äôll alert you when any incoming or outgoing transaction happens via push message. sometimes a transaction could look suspicious because the final debited amount can differ from the original transaction amount for a few reasons: a merchant blocks a higher amount for a deposit (for example, at a gas station, or a car rental or hotel booking), and the difference is credited to your account once the deposit is no longer required.changes in exchange rates may result in slight differences in the total for transactions made in foreign currencies. in both cases, we don‚Äôt charge interest for the difference in amounts. but if you‚Äôre certain that a transaction is unauthorized by you, we could help get your money back.

question: how can i keep track of my daily spending?
answer: to make it easier for you to stay on top of your daily spending, we automatically sort your transactions(new tab) and display our findings in our statistics feature.  we do this by sorting your: categories:we collect information on retailers and payment reasons in order to improve the way we sort transactions into categories such as atm, food & groceries, or shopping. for example, if you send a transfer with the reference text lunch, we‚Äôll put it in the bars & restaurants category.hashtags(#):there are  default hashtags for:transaction times (#weekend)types of transactions (#books)locations of purchases (#newyork)you can further sort your transactions by adding your own hashtags:tap on a transaction and then the pencil icon to add tags (such as #portugal_trip or #everymonth) or to remove unwanted tags. you can access the statistics feature in the n26 mobile application by either: 1. tapping on the statistics icon on the home screen. or 2. tapping the bullet point icon in the top right-hand corner of the home screen, then tapping statistics. please note that we are constantly adding new features to our mobile application. if you do not see a feature that we describe here, please make sure you are using the latest version of our application by visiting the app store or google play.

question: perch√© la verifica foto non funziona?
answer: ‚ÑπÔ∏è valido per tutte le regioni eccetto germania innanzitutto, assicurati di aver abilitato la geolocalizzazione. quindi, esamina la guida(nuova tabella) che abbiamo creato per aiutarti a scattare le foto migliori. la maggior parte delle foto verifiche non riesce a causa della cattiva qualit√† dell‚Äôimmagine. ecco alcuni suggerimenti: esegui il processo in un ambiente luminoso e utilizza un telefono cellulare con una buona fotocamera.se utilizzi un dispositivo android, assicurati di avere una messa a fuoco automatica adeguata.scatta il selfie all‚Äôaltezza degli occhi (la fotocamera dovrebbe essere alla stessa altezza dei tuoi occhi).assicurati di essere l‚Äôunica persona nella foto e che il documento sia ben visibile. controlla il tuo documento. accettiamo solo foto del documento originale (fotocopie o screenshots non vengono accettate).mantieni il tuo documento su una superficie piatta ed assicurati che sia completamente visibile.possiamo accettare solo carta d‚Äôidentit√† o passaporto (non sono accettati permessi di soggiorno). dall‚Äô8 luglio 2019 i clienti con nazionalit√† italiana residenti in italia, potranno anche utilizzare la combinazione tessera sanitaria + patente di guida (emessa dal 2013)  durante il processo di verifica.assicurati che il documento non sia danneggiato. se scatti una foto del tuo documento d‚Äôidentit√† o di te stesso e il primo tentativo non va a buon fine, puoi riprovare. una volta completata la verifica, ti invieremo la tua mastercard n26. la consegna richiede fino a 10 giorni. la chat √® disponibile dal luned√¨ alla domenica dalle 07:00 alle 23:00.

question: how long does it take to send money with transferwise?
answer: once you‚Äôve initiated your transfer via transferwise you‚Äôll be given an estimated time frame. when making a transfer, ensure that the recipients name exactly matches the name on their bank account!  if a transferwise transfer fails, we‚Äôll notify you via push message. the amount will automatically be returned to your account a few days later. you can‚Äôt personally cancel a transfer, but if you get in touch with transferwise support this way they can cancel the transfer for you. keep in mind that the transfer can only be cancelled up until the point transferwise pays out your funds. once the money has been sent to the recipient, it‚Äôs not possible to cancel the transfer anymore. the recipients details can only be changed up until the point that transferwise has paid out your money. after your money has been paid out, the recipients details can no longer be changed. you can get in touch with transferwise this way. transferwise doesn‚Äôt charge extra fees for a returned payment and neither do we. however, some participating banks do charge fees, in which case transferwise will deduct this amount from the money returned under their conditions of use(new tab). common reasons for a failed transfer: error in the transfer details (for example, when entering the recipient‚Äôs name or account information).special characters or too many characters in the recipient‚Äôs name or reference field.limits have been reached or online payments aren‚Äôt active in card settings.foreign currency transfers aren‚Äôt possible with n26 business or n26 business you or if the recipient is a business account.

question: how to add or remove shared space participants?
answer: for an owner to remove a participant from a shared space: in the space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.from the ‚Äòparticipants‚Äô list, tap on the arrow to the right of the relevant participant‚Äôs name (ios). android users can just simply tap on the participant‚Äôs name.tap ‚Äòrevoke power of attorney‚Äô. confirm the notification on the next screen and tap ‚Äòrevoke power of attorney‚Äô.   accept an invitation and join a shared space: in the spaces overview, tap the space with ‚Äòpending‚Äô and the shared space icon. read the shared space summary and continue to the power of attorney screen.once you‚Äôve read and understood the information on the power of attorney page (the legal screen), tick the box and tap the ‚Äòaccept power of attorney‚Äô button.enter your confirmation pin.confirm the ‚Äòaccept power of attorney‚Äô push notification on your paired mobile device you‚Äôll need to have enough free space(s) to accept an invitation to a shared space. if not, you can only proceed if you delete other space(s) to free up ‚Ä¶ space. you must also not have any open space with the same name or image as the shared space. you can only accept the invitation to join a shared space once you change the name/image of the other space(s).  to leave a shared space: in the space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.inside the settings tap on ‚Äòexit shared space‚Äô.confirm the notification on the next screen and tap ‚Äòleave the space‚Äô. a shared space can be created and modified within the n26 app or webapp  learn more

question: how to create a password?
answer: if you forgot your password or want to change it, select forgot? in the app or forgot your password?(new tab) in the webapp(new tab) during login. we‚Äôll send a link to your registered email address so you can create a new password. make sure your new password meets our requirements: we do not have a specific set of requirements for our passwords. we measure their strength on the fly and only accept passwords that are considered robust by our underlying algorithm. we tend to recommend to go with a ‚Äúpassphrase‚Äù rather than a password, and thus go by the common phrase ‚Äúhard to guess, easy to remember‚Äù.  if your password is not accepted by our system, try to add more special characters, numbers, and vary between upper- and lowercase letters. if you enter your password incorrectly six times in a row, you‚Äôll be temporarily blocked from your account. if this happens, try logging in again after 30 minutes. chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including sundays and bank holidays.

question: how to download my personal data?
answer: the general data protection regulation (gdpr) is a european regulation on data protection and privacy that went into effect on may 25th, 2018. we‚Äôve added a data export option to the webapp(new tab) as a response to art. 20 gdpr. and, as with everything we do, getting your personal data you provided to us is transparent and simple, and you‚Äôre in complete control: go to üë§ my account then personal settings and your personal data. the right to data portability under art. 20 gdpr covers personal data you provided to us. art. 20 gdpr shall enable you to easily switch the service provider in case you want to use these data to open a bank account at another bank. this is why art. 20 gdpr requires to provide these data in a machine-readable format to you.  it‚Äôs important to keep in mind that the file is to be used for data portability purposes only and your computer might not be able to read a json file. also, if you can open the json file the data might be difficult to understand as it is not intended to be human-readable, but machine-readable. the file we provide has the only purpose of being transmitted to another bank.  as a mobile bank, we know the importance of data security. for this reason we take additional security measures before you can download your data, which are described below. we do so in order to make sure that you, the account holder, is in fact the person who downloads the data.   how to download your data you can request to download the personal data you provided for a current or previous account with us up to 6 months after account closure date. it will come in a machine-readable format so you can share it with a third party if you choose to. current customers: please request your data through our web form(new tab). you will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. this link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. and please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request. former customers: you can download personal data you provided up to 6 months after account closure date. to request this information, complete a data request form(new tab) and make sure that the information you provide correctly matches all your previous account information. you‚Äôll need to know: the first and last name, personal id number, and expiration date of the identification document (national id card or passport) you used to verify the account,the registered email address of the account,the date (month and year) you created and closed your account (check your verification email). for security reasons, we have to make sure it‚Äôs really you downloading the data: if any field is inaccurate or missing, your request will not be successful. you will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. this link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. and please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request. if you want more information about the collection, use, and processing of your personal data, please visit our updated privacy policy (deu(new tab)) (eu(new tab)).

question: warum war eine zahlung h√∂her als erwartet?

dedicated interface

question: how long do transfers take?
answer: all domestic and international incoming sepa transfers are instant if they come from a bank that supports instant transfers and the sender selects this option. banking regulation applies to sepa instant transfers and may delay the transfer in case it needs additional monitoring e.g. when sending large amounts of money. in case the sending bank doesn‚Äôt offer instant transfers or the sender doesn‚Äôt choose this option, all sepa transfers should arrive within a maximum of 2 working days.  please note that outgoing sepa transfers are completed within one banking day. if the transfer is not instant, keep in mind that if a transfer has been made right before a weekend or bank holiday, the time frame will be extended. we send our sepa payment orders through target2(new tab). it‚Äôs open to process payments every working day from 07:00 to 18:00 cet. the system is closed on the following days: 1 january (new year‚Äôs day)good friday, easter monday1 may (labour day)25 december (christmas day)26 december. with moneybeam, you can transfer money to other n26 customers instantly and you can also receive instant moneybeam requests from banks that support instant transfers. times vary for foreign currency transfers with transferwise (but you‚Äôll see an estimated transfer time on the quote screen). you‚Äôll need to confirm each type of transfer via push message in the app before we send anything out. please note: we only accept transfers in eur via sepa (that means no swift transfers). if your incoming transfer is outside of these estimated time frames, please contact the sender (bank) for a payment investigation. we can‚Äôt investigate incoming transfers.

question: warum wurde mir etwas doppelt berechnet?
answer: wir bieten dir banking in echtzeit. das bedeutet, dass du prozesse hinter deinem konto sehen kannst, die du sonst nicht sehen w√ºrdest. es gibt zwei haupttransaktionsarten, die bei einem kauf in einem gesch√§ft oder im internet stattfinden: autorisierungen. ein betrag, der von einem einzelh√§ndler oder verk√§ufer blockiert oder reserviert wurde. dies kann alles von der morgendlichen tasse kaffee bis hin zu hotel- oder mietwagenbuchungen (einschlie√ülich kautionen) sein.buchungen. der tats√§chliche betrag, der von deinem konto abgeht. die tasse kaffee wurde endg√ºltig von deinem konto abgebucht, du hast deine kaution nach dem auschecken im hotel zur√ºckerhalten oder das auto unversehrt zur√ºckgegeben. sobald eine autorisierung best√§tigt wurde, k√∂nnen wir sie nicht mehr stornieren oder r√ºckg√§ngig machen. an diesem punkt k√∂nnen mit deiner autorisierung ein paar dinge passieren: sie wird zu einer buchung, sie wird abgelehnt oder sie verf√§llt (und kehrt nach sp√§testens 12 tagen automatisch auf dein konto zur√ºck. bei kautionen f√ºr autovermietungen kann es bis zu 30 werktage dauern.) nicht vergessen: manchmal siehst du sowohl die autorisierung als auch die endg√ºltige buchung, wenn es am zahlungsterminal technische probleme gibt oder die verbindung w√§hrend des vorgangs unterbrochen wurde. letztlich erlischt diese autorisierung. wenn das nach 12 tagen nicht passiert ist, k√∂nnen wir dir helfen, dein geld zur√ºckzubekommen.verifizierungsautorisierungen (in der regel sehr kleine betr√§ge) werden verwendet, um zu pr√ºfen, ob deine karte aktiv ist (z.b. beim google play store). dieses geld wird auf dein konto zur√ºck√ºberwiesen.die h√∂he einer autorisierung kann aus verschiedenen gr√ºnden von der endg√ºltigen vorlage abweichen.

question: what to do if i can't repay my overdraft or loan?
answer: we offer repayment plans if you can‚Äôt repay your overdraft or loan with n26 credit. this could happen because your overdraft was cancelled or you need more than two months to repay your negative amount. here‚Äôs how it works: chat with us and propose a detailed plan on how you‚Äôre going to pay back your overdraft or loan in instalments, such as a certain amount every month until your loan is paid off. we don‚Äôt accept offers of simply paying back the whole sum at a later date. we will then either accept, reject, or propose an alternative plan. it‚Äôs then up to you to confirm it. by the way: your account will be closed if it‚Äôs negative for an extended period of time. all closure dates are final unless you pay back your loan before this date. if not, your debt will go to a collection agency.

los pagos sin contacto (contactless o nfc) son una opci√≥n que viene de forma predeterminada y no se puede desactivar. si tienes alg√∫n problema con los pagos sin contacto, ten en cuenta que: para activar los pagos nfc, primero deber√°s utilizar tu tarjeta en el cajero o en un terminal de pago.las transacciones de hasta 50‚Ç¨ no requieren el pin de la tarjeta*. para cantidades superiores a 50‚Ç¨, necesitar√°s introducir el pin.  *siempre que el sistema que utiliza el comercio acepte esta opci√≥n. si has realizado varias transacciones y has gastado en total 150‚Ç¨, tendr√°s que usar el pin antes de poder seguir haciendo transacciones nfc. aseg√∫rate de que tu tarjeta est√° sobre un terminal de pago compatible con la tecnolog√≠a nfc. ten en cuenta que, si retiras la tarjeta demasiado r√°pido o si no la mantienes lo bastante cerca, podr√≠as tener que volver a repetir la operaci√≥n.
las tarjetas n26 metal solo tienen nfc en la cara posterior. aseg√∫rate de apoyar la cara posterior de la tarjeta contra el terminal de pago para usar el nfc (si lo haces con la cara frontal, no funcionar√°). si el pago nfc no funciona, intenta siempre utilizar el m√©todo chip y pin para completar tu pago.
