question: why was i charged more than expected?
answer: all transactions take place in real-time. we‚Äôll alert you when any incoming or outgoing transaction happens via push message. sometimes a transaction could look suspicious because the final debited amount can differ from the original transaction amount for a few reasons: a merchant blocks a higher amount for a deposit (for example, at a gas station, or a car rental or hotel booking), and the difference is credited to your account once the deposit is no longer required.changes in exchange rates may result in slight differences in the total for transactions made in foreign currencies. in both cases, we don‚Äôt charge interest for the difference in amounts. but if you‚Äôre certain that a transaction is unauthorized by you, we could help get your money back.

question: how to dispute a transaction?
answer:
is there a card transaction on your n26 monthly statement that you did not make? did you place an order online, but never receive it? don‚Äôt worry, this article will help you figure out how to resolve these issues. a chargeback is a service offered by n26 through mastercard, which allows you to dispute transactions which you did not make, or where something went wrong with the merchant. for example, if you ordered goods online and did not receive them by the allotted delivery date, you may be eligible to file a chargeback and ask for your money back.  if you need to dispute a transaction, you can do it in your n26 app by navigating to the transaction you want to dispute, then clicking report a problem. if you already closed your account and you do not have access to the app, you will need to contact customer service via email to support@n26.com. note: if your dispute is due to an unauthorised transaction, you need to block and reorder your card to prevent further fraud occurring, before we can process your request.  
common card dispute faqs:  a: go to your n26 app, and reorder your card as ‚Äúlost‚Äù or ‚Äústolen‚Äù based on your circumstances. if your card was in your possession at all times, please re-confirm that you did not make the transaction yourself. if that is the case, you can go ahead and reorder as ‚Äústolen‚Äù. this will prevent further unauthorised transactions occurring, and secure your account. report the fraud with the police, and follow the instructions above to initiate a dispute.   a: if you did not receive a delivery date, mastercard chargeback guidelines allow for customers to file a dispute 30 days after the date of the transaction. if you received a delivery date, you can dispute the transaction from the date you expected to receive the goods. mastercard chargeback guidelines state that you must file the dispute within 120 days of either of these dates. a: first, try contacting the bank that owns the atm. this is the fastest way to get your money back. to help you out, here is some guidance on what you can say: dear xx,  i attempted to withdraw cash from an atm owned by your company, and i did not receive the cash, but was still charged. below, you can find information about the transaction:  amount: ‚Ç¨{insert amount}atm name: {insert atm/bank name} atmdate & time of transaction: dd/mm/yyyy at {insert time} (cet) atm location: {atm address - include the name of the street, shopping mall} please return the funds to my account, or i shall fill a chargeback with my bank.  if the bank which owns the atm is not helpful, you can follow the instructions above to initiate a dispute. be sure to include the transaction date, amount and merchant, and your reason for contesting this transaction, to allow us to have enough information. a: first, reach out to the merchant to see if they can help. this is the fastest way to get your money back. to help you out, here is a basic template you can use to raise this issue with the merchant:  dear xx,  i authorised a transaction to {merchant name}, but {merchant name} has subsequently charged me additionally, without my authorisation. below, you can find information about the transaction:  merchant name: {insert merchant name}  amount of original, authorised transaction: ‚Ç¨{insert amount} amount of non-authorised transaction: ‚Ç¨{insert amount} date & time of original, authorised transaction: dd/mm/yyyy at {insert time} (cet) date & time of non-authorised transaction: dd/mm/yyyy at {insert time} (cet) please return the funds to my account, or i shall fill a chargeback with my bank and a complaint to the police/authorities. if the merchant is unresponsive or uncooperative, you can follow the instructions above to initiate a dispute. be sure to include the transaction date, amount and merchant, and your reason for contesting this transaction, to allow us to have enough information.  a: your refund could take up to 15 calendar days from the date the merchant issued it. please be patient, and wait for this time frame to pass. if 15 days pass and you still see no refund in your account, you can follow the instructions at the top of this article to initiate a dispute. be sure to include the transaction date, amount, merchant and your reason for contesting this transaction to allow us to have enough information and identify the transaction.  a: at n26 we take every possible action to protect your account from fraud, including: the flexibility to choose when to block your card, activate and deactivate payments abroad, enable and disable online transactions and set up spending limits directly within your n26 appreceiving push notifications informing you of any activity occurring on your accountusing internal tools and card fraud prevention to detect and prevent frauddeveloping systems to reduce the risk of potential fraud occurring  a: there are 3 main types of card fraud: your card is skimmed & counterfeited, for example you used your card at a tampered atm which stole your card detailsyour card details are stolen online, for example:you ordered something from a fraudulent/fake websiteyour details were stolen from a legitimate purchase your online shopping account was hacked your physical is card stolen & used to make purchases a: below are a few ways you can protect your account from fraud: use trusted atms which are located within a bank branch order from trusted online retailers & websiteschange your passwords/pins regularly n26 will never ask for your card or account details outside the app or web app. don‚Äôt trust sms or emails that seem to come from n26 with odd links or which ask you to provide this information directly.change your card settings within your n26 app, for example: disabling online payments, atm withdrawals, payments abroad and setting spending limits based on your regular transactional behaviouravoid making magnetic stripe transactions if possible, as these are not as safe as chip based transactions or digital walletkeep your card in a safe place

question: how to declare my n26 account for my taxes in france?
answer: (applies to all french residents) according to the french general tax code, all french residents are required to declare any bank accounts they have opened, used, or closed within the year of declaring an income. this includes your n26 bank account. to do this: in your tax return, check the box foreign account opened, used or closed (8uu) (compte √©tranger ouvert, utilis√© ou ferm√©).complete the cerfa n¬∞ 3916(new tab) form and attach it to your tax return.

question: why can‚Äôt i see other n26 users on moneybeam?
answer: to carry out real-time transactions such as moneybeams, n26 checks your smartphone‚Äôs contact list and finds other n26 users based on saved phone numbers or emails. you can also enter someone‚Äôs contact details manually to send them a moneybeam. if you don‚Äôt see your friend‚Äôs name on moneybeam but you know they‚Äôre an n26 user, they most likely haven‚Äôt made themselves visible. indeed you can manage your visibility as an n26 user. most moneybeam transfers that fail between n26 users happen because there are multiple phone numbers or emails listed in the contact entry of a phone‚Äôs address book. to avoid this, make sure you have the email and phone number your friend uses in your phone book in order to send them moneybeams. if the contact details you have stored don‚Äôt match, you cannot send a moneybeam to your friend. want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to n26. learn more about our refer a friend program.

question: wie kann ich mein smartphone mit meinem konto verkn√ºpfen oder trennen?
answer: um dein n26 konto nutzen zu k√∂nnen, brauchst du ein smartphone: entweder ein iphone (5s oder neuer, mindestens ios 11) oder ein android-ger√§t (6.0 oder neuer - wir unterst√ºtzen keine custom-roms oder aftermarket-firmware von amazon fire oder oxygen os). jedes konto kann nur mit einem einzigen ger√§t verkn√ºpft werden. du musst dein smartphone verkn√ºpfen und/oder entkn√ºpfen, wenn du dein konto er√∂ffnest oder wenn du eine neue telefonnummer oder ein neues ger√§t verwendest. um dein smartphone mit deinem konto zu verkn√ºpfen, √∂ffne einfach die app auf deinem smartphone. du wirst aufgefordert, deine handynummer zu best√§tigen. gib den 4-stelligen code ein, den wir dir per sms senden und schon ist dein smartphone verkn√ºpft. wenn du ein neues ger√§t verkn√ºpfen m√∂chtest, musst du aus sicherheitsgr√ºnden die verbindung zu deinem alten ger√§t trennen. das kannst du in der app unter üë§ mein konto, dann einstellungen und sicherheit tun oder in der webapp(neuen tab) unter üë§ mein konto und sicherheitseinstellungen; falls du auf dein smartphone keinen zugriff mehr hast. du erh√§ltst dann eine e-mail mit weiteren anweisungen. wenn du dich nach dem entkn√ºpfen des alten handys auf deinem neuen handy in deine n26 app einloggst, erh√§ltst du 2 codes - einen 6-stelligen login-sms-code und einen 4-stelligen pairing-sms-code. mit dem login-code loggst du dich in dein konto ein und mit dem pairing-code verkn√ºpfst du dein neues ger√§t mit deinem konto.

question: how to top up by card, apple pay, and google pay
answer:
you can now add money by using a debit or credit card as well as apple or google pay. this is the fastest and easiest way to fund your n26 account. 
  adding money with a debit or credit card open your n26 app and navigate to the actions tabjust tap ‚Äúadd money‚Äù and select ‚Äúcard transfer‚Äùchoose an amount and enter your name on card, card number, expiration date and cvc (we never store your card information)follow the steps to confirm the paymentthe money is available on your account instantly   adding money with a apple or google pay open your n26 app and navigate to the actions tabjust tap ‚Äúadd money‚Äù and select ‚Äúapple pay‚Äù or ‚Äúgoogle pay‚Äùchoose an amount follow the steps to confirm the paymentthe money is available on your account instantly
 accepted cards:  debit cards.credit cards (except america express).prepaid cards (only for customers with italian terms & conditions). to find out more about the difference between debit, credit and prepaid cards read this article(new tab).
 cost:
whilst this is the fastest and easiest way to instantly add funds in your n26 account, for us, processing these instant top-up transactions is more expensive than other account funding methods(new tab) we offer.
 for both methods, the first deposit is always free but extra deposits are charged a fee of 3% of the deposit amount. by charging a card or digital wallet, your money is not sent to n26 instantly, and the fee covers additional costs associated with funding accounts before the money is received so that it is instantly available for your use.

question: what are ‚Äúmessages from n26‚Äù ?
answer: the security of your personal data is our priority. that‚Äôs why we created an inbox in the n26 app that allows us to share any communication. any content that includes personal data is communicated in messages from n26. we‚Äôll still use your email address to communicate general information. personal data is any information that relates to you as a person and identifies or could possibly identify you. it could be your account details, your address (email or postal), id documents, proof of residence, but also the notification about your accrued overdraft interest or your monthly standing order. when we send you a message to message from n26, you‚Äôll receive a push notification on your paired smartphone and an email to your registered email address. once connected to the webapp, you‚Äôll also be notified by an info card of any new messages. we‚Äôll send you a message that you can find in your messages from n26, and ask that you reply directly from there. this feature is available from both the n26 app and the webapp under my account -> support -> messages from n26. make sure you downloaded the latest app version.  you can‚Äôt initiate a conversation, but you‚Äôll be able to reply as soon as we send you the first message. if you need to provide us with a document, simply select add attachment. please make sure that the total file size of your attachments per message doesn‚Äôt exceed 25mb.    messages from n26 doesn‚Äôt replace our chat and you can still send us an email. if you need to get in touch with us first, visit our page how to contact n26? if we need to verify you, we‚Äôll ask you to open a chat with us.

question: how do i dispute a transaction?
answer: we can only process disputes for transactions that have settled into your account.  in order to properly process a dispute, we will ask you for details about the charge and the reason for the dispute: you‚Äôll need to provide all or some of the following information: the full name on the accountthe account numbername of merchantdate of the disputed chargeamount of the disputed chargereason for the dispute important:  if you believe a charge on your account is the result of fraud, or if you believe that your card has been lost or stolen, please block your card immediately and contact our customer support either by phone or by chat.

question: fatca - la raz√≥n por la que pedimos cierta informaci√≥n a nuestros clientes
answer: n26, al igual que toda instituci√≥n financiera, est√° obligado a informar al departamento del tesoro de los estados unidos y a su servicio de impuestos internos (irs, por sus siglas en ingl√©s) de cualquier cuenta bancaria a nombre de quienes denominan ¬´personas estadounidenses¬ª, que vienen a ser tanto los ciudadanos de dicha nacionalidad como los residentes fiscales en ee.uu. fatca es el acr√≥nimo de foreign account tax compliance act, o ley de cumplimiento tributario de las cuentas extranjeras, una normativa que lucha contra el fraude fiscal.  introducido por el irs, el prop√≥sito de fatca es incentivar el cumplimiento total de la ley de impuestos, previniendo que las personas estadounidenses utilicen bancos extranjeros u otras organizaciones financieras con el objetivo de declarar sus bienes y ganancias. encuentra m√°s informaci√≥n sobre fatca en la web del irs(pesta√±a nueva). ee.uu. cuenta con un sistema de impuestos que incluye tambi√©n a ciudadanos que no son residentes en ee.uu., a diferencia de la mayor√≠a de los pa√≠ses del mundo que solo cobran impuestos a los ciudadanos residentes, pero no a los ciudadanos que viven y trabajan en el extranjero.  para determinar si tienes que declarar tu cuenta al irs, tenemos que hacerte algunas preguntas adicionales: estar ‚Äò‚Äôsujeto a pagar impuestos‚Äô‚Äô en ee.uu. no significa necesariamente que tengas que pagar impuestos all√≠. significa que seg√∫n de ee.uu. tienes que rellenar un formulario y declarar tus impuestos internacionales al irs, incluso si no tienes que pagar los impuestos en ee.uu.  este n√∫mero(pesta√±a nueva) puede ser tanto tu n√∫mero de la seguridad social en ee.uu. (ssn) o tu n√∫mero individual de identificaci√≥n fiscal (itin).  adem√°s, si tu cuenta muestra ee.uu. como lugar de nacimiento, un n√∫mero de tel√©fono de ee.uu. o estableces una transferencia programada a ee.uu., tenemos que asumir, de acuerdo con la legislaci√≥n fatca, que est√°s sujeto a esta normativa, a no ser que nos confirmes de forma espec√≠fica lo contrario.  en caso de que tus circunstancias cambien, siempre puedes actualizar tu informaci√≥n fiscal en la app de n26. para esto, tras iniciar sesi√≥n ve a mi cuenta > configuraciones > configuraci√≥n personal > informaci√≥n de impuestos y actualiza tu informaci√≥n.

question: what are the benefits of n26 you?
answer:
once you upgrade to n26 you, you‚Äôll receive 10 additional spaces and the option to choose one of our five new card colours: rhubarb, ocean, sand, aqua, and slate.  n26 you customers are also covered under the premium account‚Äôs insurance package provided by allianz global assistance*, which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as: travel insurance: reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.
snow and mountain rescue. get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains. car, bike and scooter sharing. coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies. extra card. you can purchase an extra n26 you card for a one-off fee of 14‚Ç¨ through your n26 app (available in germany, spain, austria, italy).  if you‚Äôre an n26 you customer, or if you want to upgrade to n26 you, you‚Äôll have the possibility to choose one of our five new colors when ordering a new card:  keep these in mind when considering n26 you(new tab): the n26 you mastercard has no embossing: the card details, including the number, cvv code, and 10-digit token are printed on the back. if you upgrade to n26 you, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨9,90 will be deducted directly from your n26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. if you‚Äôre a new customer, the first fee will be deducted 15 days after you prove your identity. from then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on your sign-up date. meaning that, if you opened your account at the end of the month, the first two  monthly fees will be charged the following month. the minimum membership is one year. your contract automatically renews if you don‚Äôt cancel your membership at least 4 weeks before the contract expires. you can purchase an extra n26 you card for a one-off fee of 14‚Ç¨ through your n26 app.   *allianz global assistance europe trade name of awp p&c s.a. - dutch branch, and member of the allianz group. want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to n26. learn more about our refer a friend program.

question: where is my refund?
answer:
in most cases, your refund will be visible in the app on the day of the original transaction, not the refund date. scroll down your transaction list or download your previous balance statements to find it. to view and download pdfs of your (preliminary and previous) monthly balance statements: on the webapp(new tab): from transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach downloads then select bank statements.
on the mobile app: if you‚Äôre using an iphone, tap on the three dots to the right of your current balance from the main screen. a menu will pop up and will give you the option to access your balance statement. for androids, you‚Äôll find the option under statistics (just tap the 3 dots in the top right-hand corner). the amounts blocked as a car rental deposit can take up to 30 days to return to your account while a refund of a card payment will be automatically credited to your account within a maximum of 12 days.

question: how to get a n26 overdraft?
answer: ‚ÑπÔ∏è applies to germany and austria you can apply for an overdraft directly in the app. you‚Äôll know whether you qualify in real-time. no paperwork needed. go to the explore section then n26 financial products and you can apply for an overdraft from there. you can also cancel, change the limits of your overdraft, or view the interest you‚Äôve accumulated there at any time. we offer an 8.9% p.a. interest rate. at the end of every quarter, we‚Äôll deduct the interest from your account. you can find more information in our overdraft terms & conditions(new tab). prefer a video over text? watch the tutorial(new tab) on our n26 support youtube(new tab) channel. want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to n26. learn more about our refer a friend program.

question: how to prove my identity?
answer: as a licensed bank, it‚Äôs important that we know who our customers are. that‚Äôs why we request our customers to prove their identity with a supported id document when they open an account or use certain products. we would never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. we‚Äôve gathered other tips to help you protect your identity. there are two different ways you can show us your id, and we‚Äôve also collected some troubleshooting tips for each: photo and video. the method you can choose to show us your id depends on your nationality, your country of residence, and the type of id you use: i live in germany(new tab)i live in spain(new tab)i live in italy(new tab)i live in a different country(new tab) if your id isn‚Äôt on the list, it means we cannot offer you an account with us at the time. we take identity verification very seriously and our customer support will not be able to make an exception for you regarding the supported documents. but we‚Äôre always adding new documents to this list so it‚Äôs worth checking back to see if yours has been added. in case your residential address is in germany and you‚Äôre unable to complete your photo or video verification due to a disability, please start the registration process by entering your details and then contact our customer support. we‚Äôre happy to assist you. chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including sundays and bank holidays.

question: what are shared spaces?
answer: shared spaces is a new and easy way for n26 users to share money together. these spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative. shared spaces are available to n26 premium users (you / business you / metal), who can both create shared spaces and invite participants to their space. participants can be any n26 account holder regardless of their account type.the owner of the shared space owns the money inside it.the owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants for their space. similar to regular spaces, shared spaces have neither an iban nor a card attached to them.

question: how to connect or disconnect my smartphone to my account?
answer: in order to use your n26 account, you need a smartphone : either an iphone (5s or newer, at least ios 11) or an android (6.0 or newer - we do not support the customized versions of amazon fire and oxygen os). only one device can be paired per account. you‚Äôll need to pair and/or unpair your smartphone when you first create an account or if you get a new phone number or device. to pair your smartphone with your account, simply open the app on your smartphone. you will be asked to confirm your mobile phone number. enter the 4-digit code we send you via sms and your phone is paired.  if you want to pair a new device, you must unpair your old device for security reasons. you can do this in üë§ my account (mobile app) or in the web app(new tab) under üë§ my account then security settings if you don‚Äôt have access to your smartphone anymore. you‚Äôll receive an email from us with further instructions. if you log into your n26 account with a new device, you‚Äôll receive two codes ‚Äì a login sms code with 6 digits and pairing sms code with 4 digits. you‚Äôll need the login code to access your account and the pairing code for pairing your device.

question: why was i charged more than expected?
answer: all transactions take place in real-time. we‚Äôll alert you when any incoming or outgoing transaction happens via push message. sometimes a transaction could look suspicious because the final debited amount can differ from the original transaction amount for a few reasons: a merchant blocks a higher amount for a deposit (for example, at a gas station, or a car rental or hotel booking), and the difference is credited to your account once the deposit is no longer required.changes in exchange rates may result in slight differences in the total for transactions made in foreign currencies. in both cases, we don‚Äôt charge interest for the difference in amounts. but if you‚Äôre certain that a transaction is unauthorized by you, we could help get your money back.

question: custom audiences
answer: data processing in the framework of facebook custom audiences custom audiences allows us to exclude you, as an existing n26 customer, from our advertisements. we do not want to display irrelevant ads to you. furthermore, it allows us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other facebook users. these so called ‚Äúlookalike-audiences‚Äù are more similar to our customers than the average facebook user.  in order to profit from the benefits as described above we provide a hashed version of your n26 email address to facebook. the so-called ‚Äúhashing‚Äù is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. facebook then matches this email address against your potential facebook email address. after the matching, regardless of whether it was successful or not, any hashed email addresses are deleted within 6-8 hours by facebook. facebook does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. you can find this and further information in the terms of facebook custom audiences(new tab). you can revoke your consent according to art. 6 para. 1 lit. a gdpr to this data processing in the n26 web app at any time.

question: ¬øpor qu√© no me ha dado dinero el cajero autom√°tico?
answer: a veces pasa. vas al cajero autom√°tico, la cantidad solicitada se descuenta de tu saldo, pero el cajero no te da el efectivo. lo primero que debes hacer es comprobar los l√≠mites de tu tarjeta entrando en üë§mi cuenta y seleccionando configuraci√≥n de tarjeta. aseg√∫rate de que las retiradas de efectivo en cajeros est√°n activadas. aunque no podamos decir con certeza de qu√© se trata, s√≠ que podemos ayudarte a recuperar tu dinero. la cantidad que se ha restado de tu saldo disponible no es m√°s que una autorizaci√≥n (una reserva o cantidad bloqueada). como la transacci√≥n no finaliz√≥ con √©xito, la autorizaci√≥n caducar√° en unas horas o en un m√°ximo de 12 d√≠as h√°biles y el dinero volver√° a tu cuenta. si en 12 d√≠as el dinero no ha sido desbloqueado, por favor rellena el formulario de disputa y nosotros haremos todo lo que est√© en nuestras manos para recuperar tu dinero. mientras tanto, te sugerimos que pruebes con otro cajero autom√°tico de un operador diferente. rara vez se da esta situaci√≥n dos veces seguidas.

question: where does n26 invest my money?
answer: we strive to provide our clients‚Äô deposits for loans to our customers (provided that they have the appropriate credit rating). for the liquidity not required in the customer business, our investment strategy is low in risk. we invest our customers‚Äô money at short notice with the deutsche bundesbank and other european banks in the eurozone with only good risk classes. and we refinance public-law customers mainly in germany (cities and municipalities) and invest in euro government bonds. we‚Äôre not a trading book institute. that is: we do not trade for short-term profit. and we don‚Äôt engage in speculation, whether on food, foreign exchange, bitcoins or other asset classes.

question: how to manage my visibility as an n26 user?
answer: to grant you access to all our in-app features, n26 matches your contact data with other n26 users. in order to manage your consent to be seen as a n26 user, you can simply go to üë§ my account in the app and selecting settings then personal settings and personal information. then just check or uncheck the box ‚Äúi agree to be identifiable for other users as n26 customer‚Äù. all of your contacts who have an n26 account set to visible will show up in the in-app contact list. similarly, you‚Äôll also appear in the list of other n26 customers who have your contact information. your contact list is not permanently stored by n26 and is only used when accessing the respective n26 feature. you can access to all our in-app features, e.g. moneybeam, which carries out real-time transactions without typing in a 22-digit iban, but only by selecting a name from your contact list. vice versa, you can also request money from people in your contact list who then only have to accept (or decline) your request. also, being visible enables you to use shared spaces, a sub-account, which you can share with other n26 users selected from your contact list.

question: why was i charged an atm fee?
answer: atm fees could happen for a few reasons:  a ‚Ç¨2 fee applies to any additional withdrawal beyond our fair use policy. you can identify this fee in your transaction history as a separate transaction. we‚Äôll remind you via push message when you‚Äôre running low on free withdrawals. some atms may come with their own fees. this fee will appear within the same transaction in your transaction list, that is added on top of the withdrawal amount. we have no control over these fees and can‚Äôt reject or reverse them. you‚Äôll be informed before the end of a withdrawal if additional fees apply and will have the possibility of cancelling it.foreign currency atm withdrawals sometimes include fees. with the n26 account, there‚Äôs a fee of 1.7% of the withdrawal amount. this fee is waived for n26 you or n26 metal members. using your maestro for atm withdrawals. a ‚Ç¨2 fee applies to both domestic or international withdrawals. maestro is only available in germany, austria, or the netherlands.  good to know: to avoid certain fees, especially when travelling, you can use the(new tab) mastercard atm locator(new tab) to find free atms nearby by selecting no access fee.all atms that you can see in the atm finder support mastercard.you can find an overview of our plans and fees on our website(new tab).

question: how to declare my n26 account for my taxes in france?
answer: (applies to all french residents) according to the french general tax code, all french residents are required to declare any bank accounts they have opened, used, or closed within the year of declaring an income. this includes your n26 bank account. to do this: in your tax return, check the box foreign account opened, used or closed (8uu) (compte √©tranger ouvert, utilis√© ou ferm√©).complete the cerfa n¬∞ 3916(new tab) form and attach it to your tax return.

question: who can get a basiskonto?
answer: you can open a free n26 bank account through our website or by downloading our app.  the german payment accounts act (zahlungskontengesetz or zkg) also gives all consumers who legally reside in the european union the right to hold a basic payment account. this applies to those who live in a supported country. the n26 basiskonto comes with a monthly 6‚Ç¨ account management fee. you can find all other fees in our pricing lists.  if you don‚Äôt have a bank account at n26 or at any other financial institution in germany yet, you can apply. under some circumstances, n26 is allowed to reject your request.   please note that some products and services such as n26 overdraft, n26 credit, n26 you, or n26 metal are not accessible with an n26 basiskonto.

question: how does spaces work?
answer: set goals, create and personalize spaces, and transfer money between them instantly. spaces is available in the mobile and webapp(new tab). in addition to your main account (or primary space), you can create and delete additional spaces as often as you‚Äôd like but the number of active spaces at any one time depends on your account type: 2 additional spaces with an n26 or n26 business account or up to 10 additional spaces with n26 you, n26 business you and n26 metal.your primary account statements will include all transactions sent to a space or received from one. you can download balance statements from the confirmation page.only your primary space can be negative (if you are eligible for an overdraft). all other balances in spaces cannot be negative, meaning you can only transfer what is available in a particular space.you can only use the balance from your primary space toward your mastercard transactions. so consider transferring money before making a purchase if needed.move money from one space to another by holding down on your main account and dragging and dropping into your space. once the amount is confirmed the balance is updated right away.you can lock and unlock a space at anytime from your mobile and web app. you‚Äôll only need to confirm with your confirmation pin. if a space is locked, you‚Äôll still be able to transfer money to it. if you need to withdraw money from a locked space, you need first to unlock it.you‚Äôll be able to hide the amount within the space from your account‚Äôs total balance. just go into your space, tap the three dots in the top right corner and select ‚Äòhide space balance‚Äô. spaces includes a feature called rules which will help you manage your time and your finances effectively. want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to n26. learn more about our refer a friend program.

question: dove posso prelevare contanti gratuitamente?

la tua mastercard n26 consente di prelevare contanti gratuitamente presso gli sportelli automatici di qualsiasi banca, secondo la nostra fair policy use.

tuttavia, siamo stati informati che alcuni sportelli automatici di altre banche in spagna potrebbero addebitare una commissione di circa ‚Ç¨ 2 a quei clienti che hanno aperto il proprio conto in un altro paese. poich√© in questo momento non siamo in grado di impedire che questa commissione continui a essere addebitata, ti rimborseremo il denaro se ci contatti tramite la chat che trovi nella tua app.

nel frattempo, e per evitare complicazioni, eccoti un elenco delle banche dove sappiamo che la commissione non viene richiesta: evo banco, deutsche bank, ing, bankinter, unicaja, ibercaja, liberbank, triodos bank, kutxabank e cajasur .

question: what is cash26?
answer: ‚ÑπÔ∏è applies to german, austrian and italian t&c cash26 allows you to withdraw or deposit cash by creating and showing a barcode at our participating stores.  cash26 is available in: 11.918 rewe, penny, dm, real, budni, ludwig, eckert, on, adam‚Äôs, omv, barbarino or rossmann locations in germany, 2.019 participating dm, billa, merkur, and penny austria locations in austria 202 pam & panorama and 386 penny stores in italy. you can find your nearest location, including opening times and directions, on the cash26 map in the app‚Äîtap on the actions tab in the bottom right hand corner of your mobile app and select cash26. withdrawals: as soon as you create a withdrawal barcode, the amount will be deducted from your balance. if you change your mind, you can delete the code and the amount will instantly return to your account.if a barcode remains unused, the amount will be returned to your account after 10 minutes.you can withdraw up to ‚Ç¨900 (‚Ç¨200 per transaction) within 24 hours.withdrawals are always free. deposits: deposits made with cash26 are available on your account right away.you can deposit up to ‚Ç¨999 (minimum ‚Ç¨50 per deposit) within 24 hours.all cash26 deposits will come with a fee of 1.5%. you don‚Äôt need to buy anything in the store to make a withdrawal or deposit cash. prefer a video over text? watch the tutorial(new tab) on our n26 support youtube(new tab) channel. want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to n26. learn more about our refer a friend program.

question: when will my card arrive?
answer:
your card is immediately produced and processed for shipment once you have successfully completed the n26 account sign-up process.(new tab) it will be sent via usps and delivery can
take up to 5-7 business days. you can check on the status of your card in the n26 mobile application. to do so: log into the n26 mobile application.on the home screen, you can see the status of your card (ordered/shipped/received) as well as an estimate of when your card should arrive.   if you need to change your address after you have finished the account sign-up process, you will need to order a new card. our customer support team is available via chat or phone to assist you with this. if you need to replace your card for any reason except card expiration, you can do so through the n26 mobile application(new tab) or by contacting our customer support team(new tab). tips for successful delivery of your card: make sure to enter a residential address (we do not send cards to business addresses, p.o. boxes, or us territories).do not include any spaces when entering the zip code for your delivery address.make sure you include important delivery information (for example, your apartment number, the name on your mailbox).if you are staying somewhere temporarily (with a friend or in an airbnb), make sure to include the name on the mailbox that belongs to the main tenant of the apartment.

question: how to make a sepa transfer?
answer:
‚ÑπÔ∏è you can send debit transfers to any country within the sepa zone (if the receiving bank accepts euros). outgoing debit transfers can be made in either the n26 app or our web app. from the home screen choose the actions tab,
select send money followed by bank transfer and then ‚Äúadd a new recipient‚Äù,
enter the recipient‚Äôs name and iban and select continue,
choose the amount and select next,
add a message if required or select skip it,
check the transfer review screen (which sums up the transfer),
here you can also schedule the date of your transfer and save it as a standing order,
press send and confirm with your confirmation pin. you‚Äôll then need to either confirm or cancel the transfer via push notification in the app from your paired device. once the transfer was confirmed in the mobile app, we can‚Äôt reverse it or change the recipient‚Äôs details. if you cannot confirm your debit transfer within the app you need to: ensure that you have a stable internet connection.ensure that your mobile phone has push notifications enabled. this is done through the phone settings, not in our app.ensure that you use your paired device. once your debit transfer is sent you‚Äôll be able to download a pdf confirmation of it. to do so: go to your transactions list.
locate and select the specific debit transfer.
scroll down to the transaction information and tap pdf by selecting transfer confirmation.

question: how to earn money by inviting friends to n26?
answer: you can start inviting friends as soon as you have access to your account (in the app or the web app(new tab)). to know the amount you can get per referral, simply access the refer friends section: log into the n26 app.from the home screen, go to the explore tab (mobile app) or my account üë§ (n26 web app).select refer friends.tap on your referral code to copy it and select one of the options available for sharing.optionally, you can write a message to your friend or use the default. tap send! to receive your reward your friend must meet all our requirements: complete their sign up using your referral link or personal code.activate their mastercard.complete a first mastercard transaction worth at least the value of the referral reward (in-store, online or atm). once your friend has fulfilled the requirements, you‚Äôll receive the bonus within 60 days. you can check the status of your referral bonus in the mobile app or n26 web. in total,  you can get up to ‚Ç¨1500 out of referrals. if your referral bonus hasn‚Äôt arrived yet, we‚Äôve also collected a few reasons why. *the link does not expire and it can be used at any time. personal invite codes and links should only be used for personal and non-commercial purposes. this means you can share your invite link with your personal connections via social media as long as you are the primary content owner. n26 has the right to cancel the referral program at any time. currently, friend referral rewards are only available for customers in germany, austria, italy, france, spain, belgium, luxembourg, greece, portugal, ireland, the netherlands, finland, estonia, slovakia, slovenia, sweden, switzerland, norway, denmark, poland, iceland and liechtenstein. you can find more information in the refer a friend program t&cs(new tab).

question: how to set my card pin?
answer: we don‚Äôt send you a pin via post; you set the pin for your mastercard or maestro card once you‚Äôve successfully connected your smartphone to your account and activated your card(s). to set or change your card pin: go to the actions tab.select card settings and swipe to choose a card.select reset pin on the mobile or webapp(new tab).enter the 10-digit token number on your card.choose your new pin and confirm it. keep in mind that: if you live in france, spain, ireland, greece, finland, or estonia, you must make your first payment using chip and pin before you can use your card anywhere else. you can also first make a withdrawal or balance inquiry at atm instead.for security reasons we don‚Äôt accept any pin containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences (such as 1111, 1234, or 4321). if the number you‚Äôve chosen is not accepted please try again using a different combination.if a pin is entered incorrectly three times in a row, the card will automatically be blocked for security reasons. if this happens, please contact our customer support via chat so we can unblock it for you.your card pin is separate from your confirmation pin, however you can choose the same pin for both.

question: how to reorder a card?
answer: if you are already waiting for a card, please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed. you can check it on the home screen of your mobile app. if you need to reorder a card, please check your shipping details: üë§ my account > settings > personal settings > shipping address. it must be a residential address (business addresses are not accepted).your name must be on the mailbox (if a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the additional address info in your mobile app).enter your postal code without any spaces.if applicable, add your building number, stairwell number and door code to the additional address info in your mobile app.if your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.if you are moving soon then consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you will be moving. if your very first n26 card did not arrive within the estimated timeframe then please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app and we will help you from there. if you had an activated card before then follow these steps: go to the ‚Äôhome screen‚Äô and then ‚Äôactions‚Äôtap ‚Äôcard settings‚Äôfrom your list of cards, swipe until you see the card you wish to reorderfinally, select ‚Äôreorder‚Äô use your card before it physically arrives: before your n26 card even arrives in the mail, you can begin using it through your apple pay or google pay wallet. this way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants that support this payment method. learn more about this option in our dedicated article(new tab). standard delivery: n26 standard and n26 you cards: 10‚Ç¨n26 metal cards: 45‚Ç¨ express delivery: n26 standard and n26 you cards: 30‚Ç¨n26 metal: 65‚Ç¨ please note: if you‚Äôre waiting for your first card and your shipping address is correct then please contact our customer service.

question: how to open my n26 account?
answer: you can open an account in the app (on your smartphone) or in n26 for web(new tab) if you: are at least 18 years oldare a resident of a supported countryown a compatible smartphonehold a supported id (eligibility depends on whether you live in germany(new tab) or outside of germany(new tab))don‚Äôt already have an account with usare able to verify yourself in one of our supported languages: english, german, spanish, italian, or french. this is how the sign-up process for an n26 bank account works: after confirming your email, personal details, and shipping address, select the type of account you want. *prove your identity and connect your smartphone to your new account.as a new signup, you‚Äôll be able to top up your account via bank transfer or cash26 deposit (if you are in germany, austria or italy). after a few days, you‚Äôll receive your n26 mastercard by post. if you‚Äôd like more information, here‚Äôs how you can get in touch with us. *if you meet our minimum creditworthiness criteria, you can open an n26 account. if you don‚Äôt, we may offer you an n26 flex account (germany only). this decision is calculated through an automated process. we are available from 7:00 to 23:00 everyday, including sundays and public holidays. want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to n26. learn more about our refer a friend program.

question: how to create and manage standing orders?
answer: when setting up an outgoing transfer in either the n26 app or web app you‚Äôll have the option to make it a standing order. once you complete the outgoing transfer you‚Äôll then be prompted to tick a box which will create a standing order. after you‚Äôve inputted the amount of the transfer and its recipient, under the reference text field select "want to save this as a standing order?". from here you‚Äôll be able to set the start/end dates of the standing order and choose its payment intervals. to view your scheduled transfers and standing orders directly in the mobile app: go to your transaction list (the main screen).then tap on the 3 dots located in the upper right corner for android and on the top of the transaction list for ios. a small window will pop, where you will be able to select "standing orders". here you can cancel and/or modify the details of your standing order. to cancel it just tap the standing order you wish to delete and tap the trash icon in the top right-hand corner. ‚ÑπÔ∏è  please note, if a standing order fails due to insufficient funds we won‚Äôt attempt the transfer again - you‚Äôll need to manually send the transfer, however the next scheduled transfers will proceed as normal.

question: how to export a list of my transactions?
answer:
our web app(new tab) allows you to search within your transactions. you can also download a history of your transactions in csv format. to export your transaction list: from transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach downloads
under csv you can select the start date and end date and download csv you can also sort your transactions using categories and hashtags in the app. to view and download pdfs of your (preliminary and previous) monthly balance statements: in the web app(new tab): from transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach downloads then select bank statements.
in the mobile app: from the home screen, tap on the three bullet points in the top-right corner of the screen and choose balance statements.

question: why can‚Äôt i get a basiskonto?
answer: under some circumstances, n26 is allowed to reject your basiskonto request. that‚Äôs the case if you: live outside of a supported country.already have an n26 bank account or another bank account in germany and can use it to its full extent. were convicted of a crime against the bank, its employees, or its customers within the past 3 years. have already maintained a basiskonto at n26 in the past that was closed due to prohibited usage or a negative balance. you didn‚Äôt meet minimum requirements in accordance to the money laundering act and the credit services act.

question: why did my online purchase fail?
answer: some reasons why your online payment failed: if you are unable to confirm the push message within 5 minutes, simply restart the payment process on the merchant‚Äôs website.if you do not receive a push message, please make sure that your smartphone is connected and that push messages are enabled on your smartphone.ensure that online payments and payments abroad are enabled in your card settings.a stable internet connection is required.if you are using an ios device, make sure you turn off the do not disturb mode.if the amount on the merchant‚Äôs site is different from the one stated in the push message, this may be due to the conversion of a foreign currency into euros.make sure that you disable any adblockers running on your browser.your maestro card can‚Äôt be used for online purchases.

question: why isn‚Äôt my photo verification working?
answer: ‚ÑπÔ∏è applies to all regions except germany first, geolocation must be enabled. then review the guide(new tab) we‚Äôve created to help you take the best pictures. most photo verifications fail due to bad picture quality. complete the process in a bright environment and use a phone with a good camera.if you‚Äôre using an android, ensure a proper auto focus.enable or disable your flash according to the surrounding light (only with android)take your selfie with your id document at eye level (the camera and your document should be at the same height as your eyes).make sure you‚Äôre the only person in the photo. check your document. we only accept photos of your original id (photocopies or screenshots are not permitted).keep your document on a flat surface and make sure your document is fully visible and the information on it is readable.we only accept national ids and passports.make sure your document isn‚Äôt damaged in any way. if you take a picture of your id and a selfie and the first attempt doesn‚Äôt go through, you can just start over again. as soon as your verification is complete, we‚Äôll send you your n26 mastercard. deliveries take up to 10 days. chat is available monday to sunday from 07:00-23:00.

question: how do i return a sepa transfer to its sender?
answer: from the 17th march, customers from other banks can request‚Äîat their bank institution‚Äîthe return of a sepa transfer from an n26 customer. the sender of a sepa transfer can now request the recall of their funds from the receiving n26 account by reaching out to the sender bank. this request appears to n26 customers in the form of a push notification on their paired device. similarly to confirming a debit transfer in the n26 app, you‚Äôll then have the option to reject or accept the credit transfer recall. if you do not confirm or reject the transfer recall request after 15 days, the request is rejected automatically. once the transfer recall is accepted, the funds will leave your account and you cannot request them back. if you don‚Äôt have sufficient funds in your main account, you‚Äôll not be able to confirm the transfer recall.

question: how to pay taxes on n26 savings and n26 invest?
answer:
with n26 savings (germany and austria only) and n26 invest (germany only), our partner banks are legally required to pass on taxes to the relevant tax authorities. we‚Äôll have annual tax certificates ready for you in the app every april. you can find it in the savings & investment tab. if you need further documents for your tax return, we can provide you with an exemption order form for n26 invest or a loss certificate.you can apply for exemptions from capital gains tax and church tax. for n26 invest, the required documents are found in the documents section of the savings & investment tab of the mobile app.

question: what to do if my n26 iban is not accepted?
answer: your iban includes the 2 digit country code (e.g. de), a two-digit check number, the eight-digit bank sort code, and your ten-digit account number. for example: de xx 10011001 26xxxxxxxx. the participating countries of the sepa area (single euro payments area) have agreed on the iban system in order to simplify national and international payments, and to reduce the risk of error in the communication and processing of transactions. merchants or employers who do not accept ibans from other member states of the european economic area are violating european law as of 1 february 2016 (article 9 of regulation no 260/2012(new tab)). if you are ever affected by iban discrimination, please contact your relevant national authority(new tab) directly and notify them. provide your contact details, the name of the merchant or company that didn‚Äôt accept your iban, as well as a brief description of the incident (including a screenshot of the rejection or other documentation of your communication with them).

question: how to dispute a transaction?
answer:
is there a card transaction on your n26 monthly statement that you did not make? did you place an order online, but never receive it? don‚Äôt worry, this article will help you figure out how to resolve these issues. a chargeback is a service offered by n26 through mastercard, which allows you to dispute transactions which you did not make, or where something went wrong with the merchant. for example, if you ordered goods online and did not receive them by the allotted delivery date, you may be eligible to file a chargeback and ask for your money back.  if you need to dispute a transaction, you can do it in your n26 app by navigating to the transaction you want to dispute, then clicking report a problem. if you already closed your account and you do not have access to the app, you will need to contact customer service via email to support@n26.com. note: if your dispute is due to an unauthorised transaction, you need to block and reorder your card to prevent further fraud occurring, before we can process your request.  
common card dispute faqs:  a: go to your n26 app, and reorder your card as ‚Äúlost‚Äù or ‚Äústolen‚Äù based on your circumstances. if your card was in your possession at all times, please re-confirm that you did not make the transaction yourself. if that is the case, you can go ahead and reorder as ‚Äústolen‚Äù. this will prevent further unauthorised transactions occurring, and secure your account. report the fraud with the police, and follow the instructions above to initiate a dispute.   a: if you did not receive a delivery date, mastercard chargeback guidelines allow for customers to file a dispute 30 days after the date of the transaction. if you received a delivery date, you can dispute the transaction from the date you expected to receive the goods. mastercard chargeback guidelines state that you must file the dispute within 120 days of either of these dates. a: first, try contacting the bank that owns the atm. this is the fastest way to get your money back. to help you out, here is some guidance on what you can say: dear xx,  i attempted to withdraw cash from an atm owned by your company, and i did not receive the cash, but was still charged. below, you can find information about the transaction:  amount: ‚Ç¨{insert amount}atm name: {insert atm/bank name} atmdate & time of transaction: dd/mm/yyyy at {insert time} (cet) atm location: {atm address - include the name of the street, shopping mall} please return the funds to my account, or i shall fill a chargeback with my bank.  if the bank which owns the atm is not helpful, you can follow the instructions above to initiate a dispute. be sure to include the transaction date, amount and merchant, and your reason for contesting this transaction, to allow us to have enough information. a: first, reach out to the merchant to see if they can help. this is the fastest way to get your money back. to help you out, here is a basic template you can use to raise this issue with the merchant:  dear xx,  i authorised a transaction to {merchant name}, but {merchant name} has subsequently charged me additionally, without my authorisation. below, you can find information about the transaction:  merchant name: {insert merchant name}  amount of original, authorised transaction: ‚Ç¨{insert amount} amount of non-authorised transaction: ‚Ç¨{insert amount} date & time of original, authorised transaction: dd/mm/yyyy at {insert time} (cet) date & time of non-authorised transaction: dd/mm/yyyy at {insert time} (cet) please return the funds to my account, or i shall fill a chargeback with my bank and a complaint to the police/authorities. if the merchant is unresponsive or uncooperative, you can follow the instructions above to initiate a dispute. be sure to include the transaction date, amount and merchant, and your reason for contesting this transaction, to allow us to have enough information.  a: your refund could take up to 15 calendar days from the date the merchant issued it. please be patient, and wait for this time frame to pass. if 15 days pass and you still see no refund in your account, you can follow the instructions at the top of this article to initiate a dispute. be sure to include the transaction date, amount, merchant and your reason for contesting this transaction to allow us to have enough information and identify the transaction.  a: at n26 we take every possible action to protect your account from fraud, including: the flexibility to choose when to block your card, activate and deactivate payments abroad, enable and disable online transactions and set up spending limits directly within your n26 appreceiving push notifications informing you of any activity occurring on your accountusing internal tools and card fraud prevention to detect and prevent frauddeveloping systems to reduce the risk of potential fraud occurring  a: there are 3 main types of card fraud: your card is skimmed & counterfeited, for example you used your card at a tampered atm question: psd2 - secure open banking
answer:
payment services directive 2 (‚Äúpsd2‚Äù) is a revised european directive allowing you to access your account information and initiate payments through regulated third-party providers in a safe and secure manner. 
 
this means that you can permit regulated third party providers to access your account information through a dedicated interface:  you can enable an account information service (ais) to pull together data from different bank accounts you may have, and then aggregate and manage their details in the same place through certified third-party providers.you can securely pay at the checkout of any website that offers payment initiation services (pis).  the data exchange is handled in the background via our partner - token.io. if you begin using a third-party payment service like an account information service or a payment initiation service, you‚Äôll be redirected to your n26 app via token.io to confirm the access request. in our privacy policy(new tab) we inform you about the purposes, involved parties and legal bases of the necessary data processing involved to fulfil our obligations as part of the revised european payment services directive. faqs if a third party provider has not integrated with our dedicated interface, the third party provider will need to integrate with our dedicated interface via our partner token.io. you need to contact the respective third party provider and revoke the access permission directly with them.  *applies to all countries in the eea.

question: what is a n26 flex account?
answer: we‚Äôll offer you an n26 flex account if you don‚Äôt meet the minimum credit requirements to open an n26 bank account: we charge a monthly account management fee of ‚Ç¨6. we debit this fee directly from the account. the first fee is deducted 10 days after the account is opened. after that we‚Äôll deduct the amount every month on sign-up date. make sure you have sufficient funds in your account to cover these payments in order to avoid overdraft fees.cash withdrawals at atms or from one of our 9.000 cash26 retailer partners are ‚Ç¨2 each. both are debited immediately.n26 flex can‚Äôt be combined with n26 business, n26 business you, n26 you, or n26 metal.

question: how to manage my visibility as an n26 user?
answer: to grant you access to all our in-app features, n26 matches your contact data with other n26 users. in order to manage your consent to be seen as a n26 user, you can simply go to üë§ my account in the app and selecting settings then personal settings and personal information. then just check or uncheck the box ‚Äúi agree to be identifiable for other users as n26 customer‚Äù. all of your contacts who have an n26 account set to visible will show up in the in-app contact list. similarly, you‚Äôll also appear in the list of other n26 customers who have your contact information. your contact list is not permanently stored by n26 and is only used when accessing the respective n26 feature. you can access to all our in-app features, e.g. moneybeam, which carries out real-time transactions without typing in a 22-digit iban, but only by selecting a name from your contact list. vice versa, you can also request money from people in your contact list who then only have to accept (or decline) your request. also, being visible enables you to use shared spaces, a sub-account, which you can share with other n26 users selected from your contact list.

question: what if my balance is negative?
answer: your balance can be negative as long as you‚Äôre within your overdraft limit.  if you have a negative account balance, you‚Äôll be charged an overdraft interest rate of 8.9%. otherwise, you‚Äôll receive an email to notify you that the authorized limit of your account has been exceeded. this means you don‚Äôt have enough funds on your account to cover future charges. even if you haven‚Äôt used your account since you opened it, certain charges still apply (such as n26 you or n26 metal monthly fees or express delivery costs) and have resulted in a negative balance. so you‚Äôll need to top up your account via sepa transfer (choose international transfer if you‚Äôre making the transfer outside of germany) or cash26 (if you‚Äôre in germany or austria). your account will remain active for the next 60 days without doing so. at that point: you‚Äôll receive two additional reminders (each cost ‚Ç¨3).if you have an overdraft: it‚Äôll be cancelled after the second reminder and you‚Äôll have to repay that amount immediately (or you can set up a repayment plan).if you have an n26 you, n26 metal, or n26 business you account: all benefits will be cancelled after 60 days and your account will turn into a standard one.if you don‚Äôt respond after 60 days, we may close your account.

question: close and liquidate (cash out) your n26 invest portfolio
answer: on 17.09.2019 we‚Äôre removing n26 invest from our app. after this date you won‚Äôt be able to either access or manage your investment plan through n26. this is why we‚Äôre offering n26 invest customers the option to cancel their current investment plan and have the current value of their investment plan paid into their n26 main account. important risk notice:  depending on the actual market value of your portfolio at the time of liquidation in comparison to the amount originally invested, this closure can result in a financial loss. to close your invest portfolio: go to savings & investment section within the n26 mobile app.  tap on your current investment plan with vaamo, scroll down to ‚Äòdocuments‚Äô under your invest plan and download your documents for your record keeping and taxes.select close investment plan at the bottom of the menu.confirm that you‚Äôve downloaded your documents before proceeding to step 5.once your documents have been saved, select deactivate and cash out plan.input your confirmation pin.confirm the deletion of your n26 invest plan. your funds will be automatically paid into your n26 main account within a few days.

question: how do i enable push notifications?

question: what to do if i can't repay my overdraft or loan?
answer: we offer repayment plans if you can‚Äôt repay your overdraft or loan with n26 credit. this could happen because your overdraft was cancelled or you need more than two months to repay your negative amount. here‚Äôs how it works: chat with us and propose a detailed plan on how you‚Äôre going to pay back your overdraft or loan in instalments, such as a certain amount every month until your loan is paid off. we don‚Äôt accept offers of simply paying back the whole sum at a later date. we will then either accept, reject, or propose an alternative plan. it‚Äôs then up to you to confirm it. by the way: your account will be closed if it‚Äôs negative for an extended period of time. all closure dates are final unless you pay back your loan before this date. if not, your debt will go to a collection agency.

question: what is phishing?
answer: phishing is a simple and effective tool hackers use to deceive people into handing over sensitive personal information. once they have obtained this information, they can use it to perpetrate various types of fraud while impersonating their victims. if you‚Äôd like to learn more, please click here(new tab) to read our blog post about how to recognize and avoid phishing attacks. how to report suspicious emails and text messages n26 will never send text messages or emails containing time-critical warnings instructing you to log in to your account and share privileged user data. we‚Äôll never issue you with an ultimatum, nor will we ask you to authenticate yourself or verify your data outside of our secure communication channels. suspicious emails if you receive a suspicious email, do not click on any links or download any attachments. to help us in our investigation, we ask that you either: simply forward the suspicious email thread to us at: phishing@n26.com. or if possible, please save the suspicious email as an ‚Äòeml‚Äô file and send it to us. most email service providers will automatically save the file in this format when you download it. sending the suspicious message to us in this format allows us to determine the true origin of the suspicious message and report it to the relevant organizations. if you have any difficulty saving the email in this format, no problem. please simply forward the suspicious email thread to the address above.  please do not take screenshots and send them to us, as we can‚Äôt use this information. delete the email from your inbox. suspicious text messages if you receive a suspicious text message, do not click on any links or provide any data. to help us in our investigation, we ask that you do the following:  take a screenshot of the message you received and send it to: phishing@n26.com.ensure that the full message, including the sender‚Äôs phone number and the date/time, are all visible.after our confirmation that you have received a phishing text, block the phone number.delete the message from your mobile phone.  how to report a fake website at one point or another, you may find yourself on an illegitimate website that‚Äôs being used to falsely advertise services on behalf of n26. you may also see our logo displayed on alleged affiliate sites. they may be offering credit, or perhaps they‚Äôre offering limited-time promotional deals. it‚Äôs important to note that just because ‚Äún26‚Äù is part of the url, this doesn‚Äôt necessarily indicate that a site is legitimate. if you suspect you‚Äôre on a fraudulent site, we suggest that you pause for a moment and do the following: check the address bar and make sure the url reads: https://app.n26.com/login. if it doesn‚Äôt, copy the url and report it immediately to: phishing@n26.com.

question: what are shared spaces?

question: how to log in with two factor authentication?
answer: two-factor authentication is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. you‚Äôre probably familiar with using only  your personal password to sign in to your account, but with two-factor authentication you‚Äôll need either confirmation from a paired device or an sms code. go here for more information on two-factor authentication when you log into your n26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you‚Äôll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or, if this isn‚Äôt possible, you can request an sms code to be sent to your registered number, confirming your login attempt. this ensures that only you can log in to your n26 account. when you log into your n26 account from your paired device, two-factor authentication is already in motion. this means the process of logging into your n26 account from your paired device stays the same. first, you‚Äôll need to update your phone‚Äôs operating system and the n26 app to their latest versions. if you‚Äôre unable to login to your account, but still have access to your registered email address, try to reset your password. if you don‚Äôt have access to your registered email address, please contact us via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out. read more in our article on how to create a password. if you‚Äôve lost access to your paired device, but you still have access to your registered phone number, you‚Äôll be able to log into your n26 account and request an authentication code. to do this: login to the webappwhen prompted to confirm your login on your paired device, select helpchoose send sms codeonce you receive the sms code, input it into the webapp as you‚Äôve just confirmed the authentication code you‚Äôve successfully completed two-factor authentication, and can now pair your new device with your account. if you don‚Äôt have access to your registered phone number ‚Äì either because you have a new phone number, or your phone was lost or stolen ‚Äì please contact our customer service via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out. if you have an older smartphone that doesn‚Äôt support the latest app version, you won‚Äôt be able to access n26 via the mobile app anymore using that phone.  however, you can still use our webapp to view your account, to do this you‚Äôll need to confirm your login attempt via an sms verification code which we‚Äôll send to your account‚Äôs registered phone number. you‚Äôll still be able to complete card transactions and cash withdrawals as normal using your mastercard, but bear in mind that you won‚Äôt be able to perform any bank transfers or payments until you can confirm the transfer within the n26 app. read more in our article on strong customer authentification.

question: how to save the details of a transfer recipient?
answer: every time you make a transfer to a new recipient in the app (tap + then transfer and add new recipient), some details like the recipient‚Äôs name and iban are automatically saved in your transfer contact list for future transfers. you can also delete contacts or view your transaction history with them: ios: swipe a contact entry to the left in order to show the transaction history or delete the entry.android: tap and hold on a contact entry in order to show the transaction history or delete the entry. keep in mind that deleting a contact entry doesn‚Äôt delete your transaction history with them.

question: how to make transfers in foreign currencies?

question: psd2 - open banking for third party providers
answer:
dedicated interface

question: how to file a complaint?
answer:
looking for support or have a question
 if you don‚Äôt wish to make a complaint but you have questions about our products or need help with your account, we‚Äôre always happy to assist. you can email us at support@n26.com (new tab)(new tab), or just open a chat with us directly within the mobile app or webapp, that‚Äôs the fastest and simplest way to get in touch. raising a complaint
 we‚Äôre sorry you feel the need to raise a complaint, please see below for the ways you are able to do this. if you are dissatisfied with one of our products or services, you can send us an email from your registered email address* or send your complaint via post to the address to: n26 bank gmbh ‚Äì complaint management
klosterstra√üe 62, 10179 berlin, germany to submit your complaint via email please write to the following email address litiges@n26.com(new tab) (new tab). alternatively you can request to raise a complaint via our live support team and they will be happy to assist. when filing a complaint, please always include: your full name email and home addressthe product or service you‚Äôre unhappy happy witha description of your complaint and when this occurred. you can also include any supporting documentation you have in relation to your complaint  we‚Äôll contact you via email to confirm that we‚Äôve received your complaint and then begin our investigation. in case we need more information from you, our complaint management department will reach out directly via email with an explanation of the information required.
once our complaint management department has investigated your concerns we will provide you with a final decision via email.  if you are unhappy with the outcome of your complaint if you are not satisfied with the resolution provided, you can escalate your complaint to an independent third party. for example: an arbitration body is available to you at the german federal bank (deutsche bundesbank)or you could file a complaint with the german federal financial supervisory authority (bundesanstalt f√ºr finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht ‚Äì bafin)  the european commission has also set up the online dispute resolution platform to help consumers dispute out of court. we are committed to constantly improving our products and services and your feedback makes this possible. should you wish to provide us with feedback regarding anything, please write to us at ideas@n26.com(new tab) (new tab). * we can only discuss account related matters from an email address registered with the n26 account
