question: psd2 - strong customer authentication
answer: sca acts as an additional layer of security for all n26 customers by providing two-factor authentication (2fa). this is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. you‚Äôre probably familiar with using just your personal password to sign in to your account but with two-factor authentication you‚Äôll need either confirmation from a paired device or an sms code. when you log into your n26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you‚Äôll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or you can request an sms code to be sent to your registered number to confirm your login attempt. this ensures that only you can log into your n26 account.  when you log into your n26 account from your paired device, two-factor authentication is already in motion. therefore, the process of logging into your n26 account from your paired device stays the same. sca is being introduced as part of the revised european payments services directive (psd2) which applies to all european banks. the objective of psd2 is to enhance the security of the customers‚Äô data and account security. find out more about psd2 in our dedicated article about the psd2.  faqs first, try update your phone to the newest version. if you still cannot log into your account but still have access to your registered email address, please try to reset your password. if you don‚Äôt have access to your registered email address, please contact us via our live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out.  if you lost access to your paired device but you still have access to your registered phone number, please log into your n26 account and request an authentication code. to do this: login to the webappwhen prompted to confirm your login on your paired device, select help choose send sms codeonce you receive the sms code, input it into the webapp as you confirm the authentication code you‚Äôve completed two-factor authentication and you‚Äôll be able to pair your new device with your account again. if you don‚Äôt have access to your registered phone number - either because you have a new phone number or your phone was lost or stolen - please contact our customer service via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out.  if you have an older smartphone device that doesn‚Äôt support the latest app version,  you won‚Äôt be able to access n26 via the mobile app anymore using your phone.  you can still use our webapp to view your account, to do this you‚Äôll need to confirm your login attempt via an sms verification code which we‚Äôll send to your account‚Äôs registered phone number.  you‚Äôll still be able to complete card transactions and cash withdrawals as normal using your mastercard but bear in mind that you won‚Äôt be able to perform any bank transfers or payments until you can confirm the transfer within the n26 app.

question: why was i charged more than expected?
answer: all debit card transactions take place in real-time. we‚Äôll alert you via push notification when any incoming or outgoing transaction happens . sometimes a transaction can look suspicious because the final debited amount can differ from the original transaction amount. this can be because: a merchant blocks a higher amount for a deposit (for example, at a gas station, or a car rental or hotel booking), and the difference is credited to your account once the deposit is no longer required.changes in exchange rates may result in slight differences in the total for transactions made in foreign currencies. if the transaction was not authorized by you, we‚Äôre happy to help.  either call us at 1-888-n26-0-n26 (1-888-626-0626) or chat with us and we‚Äôll be happy to help you.

question: pourquoi ai-je √©t√© d√©bit√© d‚Äôun montant qui ne correspond pas √† ma transaction ?

question: how to make transfers in foreign currencies?
answer: we have partnered with transferwise to make foreign currency transfers easy. transferwise offers real-time exchange rates and no hidden fees. to initiate a transfer in a foreign currency start by logging into the mobile app:  from the home screen choose the actions tabselect send money followed by foreign currency transferselect the desired currency and enter the amount you would like to send in ‚Ç¨ (it will automatically convert into the foreign currency below). after that, you add a new recipient or select an existing payeefinalise the transfer with your confirmation pin you‚Äôll receive an email from transferwise to change your password and then you can use both log in details to perform the transfer from there. please note that in order for this process to work, you need to create a transferwise profile via the n26 app first, meaning that you need to try to go through the in-app foreign currency transfer flow. otherwise you won‚Äôt receive an email from transferwise to reset the password. please also note that foreign currency transfers in the app are not possible with the n26 business, business you or business metal account, nor are transfers to businesses. transferwise has its own transfer types and fees but this will all be indicated before you confirm the transfer. for detailed information about eligible recipients, please check transferwise‚Äôs available currencies(new tab). want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to n26. learn more about our refer a friend program.

question: how to get push messages?
answer: we send you push messages to finalize transfers (such as moneybeam) or to confirm a service (as with cash26- please note this is only available in germany, austria, italy). if you aren‚Äôt receiving these messages, first check that notifications are enabled for both your phone and the app. then try some of our troubleshooting suggestions, depending on your smartphone: ios: delete the app and restart your smartphone. download and install the latest version of the app from the apple app store and connect your smartphone again.check whether you‚Äôre logged into your n26 app.make sure messaging for the app has been activated in the general settings of your smartphone. android: delete the app and restart your smartphone. download and install the latest version of the app from the google play store and connect your smartphone again.go to your account settings and activate notification by tapping app settings then notifications.huawei and xiaomi: go to settings then advanced settings and battery settings. then set n26 as a protected app.oneplus: select battery optimization then the n26 app and then don‚Äôt optimize.oppo: disable battery optimization for the app and lock it in the recent apps overview.

question: suis-je imposable aux √©tats-unis ?
answer:
en tant que banque d√©tentrice d‚Äôune licence bancaire, nous sommes tenus de communiquer directement √† l‚Äô‚Äùinternal revenue service‚Äù (irs). nous leurs fournissons des renseignements sur les comptes bancaires d√©tenus par les contribuables am√©ricains, conform√©ment au fatca. cette loi a √©t√© √©tablie par le d√©partement du tr√©sor am√©ricain et l‚Äôirs pour favoriser une meilleure conformit√© fiscale. elle emp√™che les ressortissants am√©ricains de recourir aux banques et autres organismes financiers √©trangers pour √©viter de payer l‚Äôimp√¥t sur le revenu et les actifs. 
vous trouverez plus d‚Äôinformations √† propos du fatca ici(nouvel onglet).  
dans le cadre du fatca, un ressortissant am√©ricain est d√©fini comme : un citoyen des etats-unis (y compris les binationaux)un r√©sident des etats-unis, par exemple en tant que titulaire d‚Äôune carte verte en cours de validit√© ou en tant que personne ayant r√©ussi le "substantial presence test" (voir ci-dessous).
 si vous n‚Äô√™tes pas certain de savoir si vous √™tes un ressortissant des etats-unis, veuillez consulter un conseiller fiscal. 
‚Äúsubstantial presence test‚Äù signifie: que vous avez √©t√© physiquement pr√©sent aux √©tats-unis pendant 183 jours ou plus au cours de l‚Äôann√©e civile en cours ou que vous avez √©t√© physiquement pr√©sent aux √©tats-unis pendant 183 jours ou plus au cours des trois derni√®res ann√©es civiles : 
(31 jours ou plus dans l‚Äôann√©e civile en cours) + (le nombre de jours de pr√©sence physique aux √©tats-unis l‚Äôann√©e derni√®re) divis√© par 3 + (le nombre de jours de pr√©sence physique aux √©tats-unis l‚Äôavant-derni√®re ann√©e) divis√© par 6. 
de plus, si votre compte pr√©sente l‚Äôune des caract√©ristiques suivantes : citoyennet√© ou r√©sidence aux √©tats-unislieu de naissance aux √©tats-unisadresse postale ou de r√©sidence aux √©tats-unis, y compris les bo√Ætes postalesnum√©ro de t√©l√©phone aux √©tats-unisordres de virements permanents ou paiements r√©currents √† un compte domicili√© aux √©tats-unis
 dans ce cas nous sommes oblig√©s de vous consid√©rer comme ressortissant des etats-unis, √† moins que vous ne nous transmettiez les documents suivants :  un formulaire d‚Äôauto-certification w-8ben ou un document similaire agr√©√©, etun passeport ou une autre pi√®ce d‚Äôidentit√© d√©livr√©e par un autre gouvernement attestant votre citoyennet√© ou de votre nationalit√© dans un pays autre que les √©tats-unis.si vous √™tes n√© aux √©tats-unis, merci de nous transmettre une copie de votre certificat de perte de nationalit√©.

question: why did my sepa transfer fail?
answer: we accept transfers in eur done via sepa. we don‚Äôt support swift so if you need to make a foreign currency transfer, please use transferwise (in the app or from their website(new tab)). to get a transfer, you‚Äôll only need to provide the sender with your full name (as it‚Äôs written on the id you provided for verification) and your iban. you can find your iban on your balance statements and in üë§ my account (in the mobile app or webapp(new tab)). common reasons for failed transfers: the recipient‚Äôs name on the transfer order is different from the name on their account (must be their name as written on their id).the recipient‚Äôs name is a company name instead of a personal/account name (applies to n26 business).the iban is incorrect.you‚Äôre not receiving the push message to confirm your transfer.an inappropriate use was found. n26 has the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see gwg ¬ß 10(new tab)). as a result, we may ask for documentation to verify the origin or source of these transactions. this can result in the credit being delayed or not taking place.

question: why hasn't my referral bonus arrived?

question: what if my balance is negative?
answer: your balance can be negative as long as you‚Äôre within your overdraft limit.  if you have a negative account balance, you‚Äôll be charged an overdraft interest rate of 8.9%. otherwise, you‚Äôll receive an email to notify you that the authorized limit of your account has been exceeded. this means you don‚Äôt have enough funds on your account to cover future charges. even if you haven‚Äôt used your account since you opened it, certain charges still apply (such as n26 you or n26 metal monthly fees or express delivery costs) and have resulted in a negative balance. so you‚Äôll need to top up your account via sepa transfer (choose international transfer if you‚Äôre making the transfer outside of germany) or cash26 (if you‚Äôre in germany or austria). your account will remain active for the next 60 days without doing so. at that point: you‚Äôll receive two additional reminders (each cost ‚Ç¨3).if you have an overdraft: it‚Äôll be cancelled after the second reminder and you‚Äôll have to repay that amount immediately (or you can set up a repayment plan).if you have an n26 you, n26 metal, or n26 business you account: all benefits will be cancelled after 60 days and your account will turn into a standard one.if you don‚Äôt respond after 60 days, we may close your account.

question: how do i change my card limits?
answer: debit card limits are used to protect an account from fraud and are typically withdrawal or payment limits.  the overall maximum debit card limits are shown below and are set by n26 .  lower debit card limit amounts can be set by you, the account holder. point of sale (pos) daily:  $5,000atm daily:  $1,500maximum cumulative 30-day limit (cumulative total of all pos, atm and other withdrawals every 30-day period): $30,000 please note that:  limits can‚Äôt be raised above the maximum.  to set or change your daily withdrawal or payment limits simply: log into the mobile application.tap on "actions".tap on "card settings".tap on "daily limits".use the sliders to set your desired daily withdrawal and payment limits. these limits will then be applied instantly to your n26 debit card.

question: fatca - warum wir bestimmte informationen von dir ben√∂tigen
answer:
n26 ist als reguliertes finanzinstitut dazu verpflichtet, dem united states department of treasury sowie dem internal revenue service (irs) informationen √ºber kundenkonten von u.s. steuerzahlern oder ausl√§ndischen entit√§ten zur verf√ºgung zu stellen, die laut fatca f√ºr u.s. steuerzahler von erheblichem interesse sind. fatca steht f√ºr foreign account tax compliance act und ist ein gesetz zur bek√§mpfung von steuerhinterziehung. eingef√ºhrt vom irs erreicht fatca bessere steuerliche entsprechungen, indem er u.s. steuerzahler daran hindert, ausl√§ndische banken oder finanzinstitute daf√ºr zu nutzen, ihre verm√∂genswerte und einkommen der besteuerung zu entziehen. mehr √ºber fatca oder den irs erf√§hrst du auf: www.irs.gov. anders als die meisten l√§nder haben die vereinigten staaten ein steuersystem, das auch diejenigen us-staatsb√ºrger erfasst, deren wohnsitz nicht in den vereinigten staaten liegt. die meisten anderen l√§nder besteuern die weltweiten einkommen ihrer b√ºrger nur insofern, als letztere ihren wohnsitz im inland haben bzw. besteuern nicht diejenigen b√ºrger, die permanent im ausland leben und arbeiten. um zuverl√§ssig festzustellen, ob dein kundenkonto dem irs mitzuteilen ist, m√ºssen wir dir die folgenden 3 fragen stellen: hast du (auch) die us-amerikanische staatsangeh√∂rigkeit oder besitzt du eine green card?
bist du in den vereinigten staaten steuerpflichtig?
in den vereinigten staaten steuerpflichtig zu sein, hei√üt nicht ohne weiteres, dass du dort eine pers√∂nliche einkommensteuer zahlen musst. es bedeutet zun√§chst nur, dass du laut amerikanischem recht verpflichtet bist, eine steuererkl√§rung abgeben musst und dein (weltweites) einkommen dem irs angeben musst - selbst wenn du schlie√ülich keine steuern in den vereinigten staaten zahlen musst.
falls ja, wie lautet deine us-amerikanische steuer-identifikationsnummer (us-tin)?
als us-tin kannst du entweder deine us-sozialversicherungsnummer (ssn) oder deine us-steuer-identifikationsnummer (itin) benutzen. bitte beachte: falls in deinem konto eine amerikanische telefonnummer oder ein amerikanischer geburtsort registriert ist oder du einen dauerauftrag in die usa erstellst, haben wir nach fatca davon auszugehen, dass die in fatca festgelegten bestimmungen f√ºr dich geltung haben, bis du uns das gegenteil best√§tigst. falls sich deine lage ver√§ndert, kannst du deine steuerdaten jederzeit in deiner n26 app aktualisieren. logge dich dazu einfach in deine n26 app ein und gehe zu: 

mein konto > einstellungen > pers√∂nliche einstellungen > steuerdaten, und aktualisiere dort deine informationen.

question: how to close my account?
answer: we are sorry to see you go, but we appreciate the time you spent with us as a customer. you have convenient options to close your n26 account. if you have a de or es iban you can use the following methods to request account closure: option 1: click here(new tab) to be guided through our electronic account closure process: this option is the fastest way to close your account.you will need to login to authenticate yourself.you will be guided through the process to close your account. if you cannot log in or do not want to, please follow the steps for option 2. option 2: please contact us via live chat or via email to closure@n26.com(new tab) from your registered email address using our cancellation form(new tab) (the form will require the below information): a statement requesting the closure of your account on a specific date or asap.your name.your n26 iban.if you have a positive balance in your main account or your spaces, we also need an iban within sepa to transfer your remaining balance. if you have an it iban you can use the following method to request account closure: please send your request through live chat (click the start new support chat button below) or via email to closure@n26.com(new tab) from your registered email address using our cancellation form(new tab) (the form will require the below information): a statement requesting the closure of your account on a specific date or asap.your name.your n26 iban.if you have a positive balance in your main account or your spaces, we also need an iban within sepa to transfer your remaining balance. a few things to consider when closing your account: for a quick account closure: if you have a positive balance, please transfer your remaining balance yourself. if you have a negative balance, top up your account.destroy your cards by cutting them with scissors or a paper shredder. the chip, nfc antenna and the magnetic strip should all be cut into pieces and disposed of separately. (for cards that cannot be easily destroyed by cutting, please store your card in a safe place.)

question: continue with your existing portfolio via fil fondsbank gmbh (ffb)
answer: if you decide to take no action your existing investment portfolio will automatically continue through fil fondsbank gmbh (ffb). ffb is the bank that holds the invest depot for each n26 invest customer.  the existing monthly settings of your n26 investment are not automatically retrieved by ffb - they must be set again individually. please note that the fees according to ffb‚Äôs schedule of fees and services would apply to your n26 investment portfolio unless you decide to cancel your n26 invest plan and withdraw the funds from your investment portfolio or instruct moneyfarm to transfer your n26 invest portfolio to a new moneyfarm investment plan before the aforementioned date you‚Äôll automatically receive a letter via post containing your login details for ffb‚Äôs website(new tab), allowing you to access your existing investment portfolio via their website. in the event that you‚Äôve changed address since you‚Äôve opened your n26 invest portfolio, you‚Äôll need to contact ffb to inform them of your new address.  contact details for fil fondsbank gmbh (ffb): monday to friday from 8am to 6pm telephone: +49 (0) 69 770 60 - 200 fax: +49 (0) 69 770 60 - 555 please note: ffb‚Äôs website is only available in german.

question: shared spaces - what is a power of attorney?
answer: the legal model behind shared spaces is called power of attorney (kontovollmacht in german).  participants of a shared space do not have equal ownership of the account like a joint account in the traditional banking sense. after receiving power of attorney the participants obtain the right to act on behalf of the owner regarding any transfer of funds within the shared space. the person authorizing the other to act on his behalf is called the ‚Äúowner‚Äù, this person is the only account holder. the owner must be a n26 premium account holder e.g. n26 you, n26 metal and n26 business you. this means that whoever created the shared space is its legal owner. the owner of a shared space:  owns all the funds within a shared space. can transfer funds freely in and out of the account anytime. can invite people to the shared space by granting others power of attorney.can revoke the power of attorney of a participant at any time.can also close a shared space after removing a participant. (all funds in the shared space will be transferred to the owner‚Äôs main account) by granting a person power of attorney, they‚Äôll have full access to all the money held within a shared space. this means that each participant can also transfer funds freely in and out of the shared space.   n26 bank gmbh cannot be held liable for payments covered by the power of attorney. learn more

question: how to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?
answer: it‚Äôs important to keep your personal data up to date (for example, your phone number is necessary to connect your smartphone or to send and receive moneybeams). here‚Äôs how you can change your information: delivery address, password, or tax information: you can change this information yourself at any time in the app. just go to üë§ my account and select settings then personal settings.name and sex: chat with us and send two forms of id: a copy of your new id card or passport as well as an official document of the change (a marriage licence or updated birth certificate).  we can also re-order a card with your new name once your account has been updated.nationality: chat with us and send a copy of your new id card or passport.email address: you‚Äôll need to contact us via chat for this. we need to verify it‚Äôs really you changing your information so we can‚Äôt change any personal data over email.phone number: in germany, spain, france, and italy (ios app only), you can now change your phone number yourself at any time in the app. just go to üë§ my account and select settings then personal settings.note: to be able to update your phone number in the app, you must use your paired device, meaning the smartphone linked to your account.in other countries you‚Äôll need to contact us via chat for this. we need to verify it‚Äôs really you changing your information so we can‚Äôt change any personal data over email.

question: how to set rules for spaces?
answer: within your spaces, you can set your own rules! rules allow you to easily create automated transactions and standing orders to your spaces to save money and organise your finances.  if you want to set a rule through the web app, here‚Äôs what you need to know: process a spaces transfer and then enable the option to repeat the transfer.to delete a rule, click on the 3 dots indicating the settings. you‚Äôll see all the active rules. clicking on the trashcan icon will delete the rule.if you need to change a rule, delete it from the settings of the space you created the rule in, and then create a new one. if you want to set a rule through an android device, you have two options: from spaces > click on the three dots > create rule > enter amount > select space > choose frequency and date > confirm  2. after setting a space transfer > select repeat > choose frequency and date > confirm  if you want to set a rule through an ios device, this is what you need to do:      from spaces > create a new rule > choose frequency and date > confirm   please be aware that both spaces rules and standing orders are processed at the same time of day (0100 utc). this means if you have a rule and standing order set up for the same date, you will need enough funds on that day to cover both. if you have standing orders that are dependent on your rules having happened first, you will need to make sure the standing order is set for the day after the rule. this also means that if you want to prioritise your standing orders they need to be set for the day before your rules. please note that, if you have an activated overdraft, a rule will still be processed automatically even if your balance is negative.

question: how to dispute a transaction?
answer:
is there a card transaction on your n26 monthly statement that you did not make? did you place an order online, but never receive it? don‚Äôt worry, this article will help you figure out how to resolve these issues. a chargeback is a service offered by n26 through mastercard, which allows you to dispute transactions which you did not make, or where something went wrong with the merchant. for example, if you ordered goods online and did not receive them by the allotted delivery date, you may be eligible to file a chargeback and ask for your money back.  if you need to dispute a transaction, you can do it in your n26 app by navigating to the transaction you want to dispute, then clicking report a problem. if you already closed your account and you do not have access to the app, you will need to contact customer service via email to support@n26.com. note: if your dispute is due to an unauthorised transaction, you need to block and reorder your card to prevent further fraud occurring, before we can process your request.  
common card dispute faqs:  a: go to your n26 app, and reorder your card as ‚Äúlost‚Äù or ‚Äústolen‚Äù based on your circumstances. if your card was in your possession at all times, please re-confirm that you did not make the transaction yourself. if that is the case, you can go ahead and reorder as ‚Äústolen‚Äù. this will prevent further unauthorised transactions occurring, and secure your account. report the fraud with the police, and follow the instructions above to initiate a dispute.   a: if you did not receive a delivery date, mastercard chargeback guidelines allow for customers to file a dispute 30 days after the date of the transaction. if you received a delivery date, you can dispute the transaction from the date you expected to receive the goods. mastercard chargeback guidelines state that you must file the dispute within 120 days of either of these dates. a: first, try contacting the bank that owns the atm. this is the fastest way to get your money back. to help you out, here is some guidance on what you can say: dear xx,  i attempted to withdraw cash from an atm owned by your company, and i did not receive the cash, but was still charged. below, you can find information about the transaction:  amount: ‚Ç¨{insert amount}atm name: {insert atm/bank name} atmdate & time of transaction: dd/mm/yyyy at {insert time} (cet) atm location: {atm address - include the name of the street, shopping mall} please return the funds to my account, or i shall fill a chargeback with my bank.  if the bank which owns the atm is not helpful, you can follow the instructions above to initiate a dispute. be sure to include the transaction date, amount and merchant, and your reason for contesting this transaction, to allow us to have enough information. a: first, reach out to the merchant to see if they can help. this is the fastest way to get your money back. to help you out, here is a basic template you can use to raise this issue with the merchant:  dear xx,  i authorised a transaction to {merchant name}, but {merchant name} has subsequently charged me additionally, without my authorisation. below, you can find information about the transaction:  merchant name: {insert merchant name}  amount of original, authorised transaction: ‚Ç¨{insert amount} amount of non-authorised transaction: ‚Ç¨{insert amount} date & time of original, authorised transaction: dd/mm/yyyy at {insert time} (cet) date & time of non-authorised transaction: dd/mm/yyyy at {insert time} (cet) please return the funds to my account, or i shall fill a chargeback with my bank and a complaint to the police/authorities. if the merchant is unresponsive or uncooperative, you can follow the instructions above to initiate a dispute. be sure to include the transaction date, amount and merchant, and your reason for contesting this transaction, to allow us to have enough information.  a: your refund could take up to 15 calendar days from the date the merchant issued it. please be patient, and wait for this time frame to pass. if 15 days pass and you still see no refund in your account, you can follow the instructions at the top of this article to initiate a dispute. be sure to include the transaction date, amount, merchant and your reason for contesting this transaction to allow us to have enough information and identify the transaction.  a: at n26 we take every possible action to protect your account from fraud, including: the flexibility to choose when to block your card, activate and deactivate payments abroad, enable and disable online transactions and set up spending limits directly within your n26 appreceiving push notifications informing you of any activity occurring on your accountusing internal tools and card fraud prevention to detect and prevent frauddeveloping systems to reduce the risk of potential fraud occurring  a: there are 3 main types of card fraud: your card is skimmed & counterfeited, for example you used your card at a tampered atm which stole your card detailsyour card details are stolen online, for example:you ordered something from a fraudulent/fake websiteyour details were stolen from a legitimate purchase your online shopping account was hacked your physical is card stolen & used to make purchases a: below are a few ways you can protect your account from fraud: use trusted atms which are located within a bank branch order from trusted online retailers & websiteschange your passwords/pins regularly n26 will never ask for your card or account details outside the app or web app. don‚Äôt trust sms or emails that seem to come from n26 with odd links or which ask you to provide this information directly.change your card settings within your n26 app, for example: disabling online payments, atm withdrawals, payments abroad and setting spending limits based on your regular transactional behaviouravoid making magnetic stripe transactions if possible, as these are not as safe as chip based transactions or digital walletkeep your card in a safe place

question: which foreign exchange rate will i get?
answer:
when you use your n26 card to place transactions in foreign currencies, mastercard‚Äôs exchange rates will be applied to the full purchase amount. good news: n26 doesn‚Äôt charge any extra fees for foreign transactions! you can check mastercard‚Äôs rates here: https://www.mastercard.us/en-us/personal/get-support/convert-currency.html(new tab)


you can check the exchange rate and currency markup rate applied to a past transaction on n26 app and website via transaction details on the feed. please be aware that exchange rates are dynamic, so the transaction value can change until the final purchase amount is charged due to currency variation.

question: will my direct debit go through if i'm low on funds?

question: why did my transferwise account linking fail?
answer: we are sorry that you cannot currently link your existing transferwise account. the most common reason why this could have happened is due to incomplete personal details on your transferwise account.  if you have set up an account in the past directly with transferwise using the same email address as that registered on your n26 account, and you did not fill out all personal details, we will not be able to link your account within n26.  please log into your transferwise account at www.transferwise.com/login(new tab), or via their app, and ensure that your full name, address, date of birth and phone number are complete.  if you cannot remember your password, go to www.transferwise.com/login(new tab) and select ‚Äòforgot password‚Äô to reset your password and access your account. if you cannot remember creating an account with transferwise, you should still try to log in by resetting your password. it could be that it was created via another partner or some time ago.

question: ¬øc√≥mo mantener un registro de los gastos diarios?

question: come impostare il pin della carta?

question: how to use my card digitally?

question: how to activate my card?
answer:
once you receive your physical card, you‚Äôll need to activate it. you can do this in the app only after you connect your smartphone to your account. or you can activate it directly from the web app(new tab).  you‚Äôll need your 10-digit token number: it‚Äôs found below your name on the front of your card (or on the back if you have an n26 you, n26 metal, or maestro card).  to activate your card on the n26 app, from the home screen:go to the actions tab,select cards settings and swipe until you see the card you want to activate,tap activate.
to activate your card on the web app, just select activate card from the home screen. if you live in france, spain, ireland, greece, finland, or estonia you must make a first atm withdrawal to fully activate your card. if you have multiple cards (for example, you ordered your card more than once or your delivery was delayed), you can only activate your most recent card. all other cards will be disabled. you‚Äôll need to follow these activation steps every time you reorder a new card, like if your card is lost, stolen, broken, or you upgrade your account.    after you activate your card, the next step is choosing a card pin.

question: how can i protect my account?
answer: the security of your account and your personal data is our top priority. if you ever feel that your n26 login may be compromised or that someone is trying to initiate a chat on your behalf, it‚Äôs crucial to immediately change your n26 account password. you can do so via both our mobile and web applications.  on the web: log in and click on ‚Äúmy account‚Äù.click on ‚Äúsecurity settings‚Äù. enter your current password and enter a new secure password(new tab). please don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone. click on ‚Äúset new password‚Äù. in the mobile application: log in and go to ‚Äúmy account" > "settings" > "security‚Äù. tap on ‚Äúchange login password‚Äù. please choose a secure password(new tab). please don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone. it is important to remember that, as the account holder, you and only you should create and have access to your login details.   if you believe that your account has been compromised or tampered with in any way, you can get in touch with us immediately by phone at 1-888-n26-0-n26 (1-888-626-0626) or chat with us directly from the n26 mobile application or webapp(new tab).

question: why was i charged an atm fee?
answer: atm fees could happen for a few reasons:  a ‚Ç¨2 fee applies to any additional withdrawal beyond our fair use policy. you can identify this fee in your transaction history as a separate transaction. we‚Äôll remind you via push message when you‚Äôre running low on free withdrawals. some atms may come with their own fees. this fee will appear within the same transaction in your transaction list, that is added on top of the withdrawal amount. we have no control over these fees and can‚Äôt reject or reverse them. you‚Äôll be informed before the end of a withdrawal if additional fees apply and will have the possibility of cancelling it.foreign currency atm withdrawals sometimes include fees. with the n26 account, there‚Äôs a fee of 1.7% of the withdrawal amount. this fee is waived for n26 you or n26 metal members. using your maestro for atm withdrawals. a ‚Ç¨2 fee applies to both domestic or international withdrawals. maestro is only available in germany, austria, or the netherlands.  good to know: to avoid certain fees, especially when travelling, you can use the(new tab) mastercard atm locator(new tab) to find free atms nearby by selecting no access fee.all atms that you can see in the atm finder support mastercard.you can find an overview of our plans and fees on our website(new tab).

pubblico personalizzato - trattamento dei dati nell‚Äôambito di facebook, google e zeotap.  
pubblico personalizzato √® uno strumento online, che offre la possibilit√† di trovare corrispondenze di vario tipo tra gli utenti con lo scopo di creare un pubblico per il quale la visualizzazione di determinati annunci pubblicitari possa essere gradita. 
nell‚Äôambito di n26, questo strumento permette ai nostri attuali clienti di visualizzare offerte promozionali o aggiornamenti di prodotti ma non, ad esempio, annunci pubblicitari relativi all‚Äôapertura di un conto n26. per poter creare lookalike audiences mettiamo a disposizione di facebook, google e zeotap una versione hashed dell‚Äôindirizzo e-mail dei nostri utenti oppure dell‚Äôid della loro applicazione mobile.  il cosiddetto "hashing" permette di criptare l‚Äôindirizzo e-mail o l‚Äôid dell‚Äôapplicazione mobile dell‚Äôutente in modo che quest‚Äôultimo non possa pi√π essere identificato. la versione criptata dell‚Äôindirizzo e-mail o dell‚Äôid dell‚Äôapplicazione mobile viene associata all‚Äôindirizzo e-mail o all‚Äôid dell‚Äôapplicazione mobile gi√† in possesso di facebook, google e zeotap. la versione hashed viene cancellata entro le successive 48 ore. condividere i dati con terzi oppure fornire a terzi l‚Äôaccesso ai dati degli utenti non √® consentito. puoi trovare maggiori informazioni informazioni in merito nel sito di facebook(nuova tabella),  di google(nuova tabella)  e  di zeotap(nuova tabella). ai sensi dell‚Äôart. 6 comma. 1 lit. a gdpr, puoi revocare il tuo consenso a questo trattamento dei dati tramite la webapp di n26 in qualsiasi momento.

question: how to block my n26 card?
answer: you can block and unblock your cards at any time in the app. go to the actions tab and select card settings. there you can decide if you want to temporarily limit or disable your atm withdrawals, online payments or payments abroad, or block your card entirely. this way, you have full control of your card and can protect yourself against unauthorized transactions. you should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. you can always unblock it later.  if you do not have access to your n26 mobile app or your n26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in english) .

question: when will my card arrive?
answer: standard delivery takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge if it‚Äôs your first card after opening the account or upgrading to a premium membership. to stay up-to-date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your n26 mobile app. express delivery takes up to 3 working days and comes with an additional fee of 20‚Ç¨. in addition to the banner on the home screen of your n26 mobile app, you will also receive an email with a tracking link to stay up-to-date on the progress of your card delivery. learn more in our dedicated article about express delivery. please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed before taking further action. your first card after opening the account or upgrading to a premium membership is always free. for the following ones, a replacement fee may apply. you need to verify your identity when opening an n26 account. please be sure you have completed this process by logging into your account. once this process is complete your account is activated and you can receive your n26 card. check your shipping details: üë§ my account > settings > personal settings > shipping address. it must be a residential address (businesses are not accepted).your name must be on the mailbox. if a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the ‚Äôadditional info‚Äô in your mobile app.enter your postal code without any spaces.if applicable, add your building number, floor number and door code to the ‚Äôadditional address info‚Äô in your mobile app.if your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.if you‚Äôre moving soon please consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you‚Äôll move to. incase your details were incorrect, please update them directly in the mobile app. if it is your very first n26 card, please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app. if you had an activated card before, please reorder it directly in the app. 3. your first card after opening your account or upgrading to a premium membership is free of charge! you only need to reach a minimum account balance in order to trigger the production and delivery of your card. the one-time minimum balance depends on your account type: n26 standard account: minimum 10‚Ç¨n26 you account: minimum 9.90‚Ç¨n26 metal account: minimum 16.90‚Ç¨ as soon as your account balance reaches the minimum requirement your n26 card will be automatically produced and shipped. you will be notified in the app via messages from n26 and through a banner on the home screen that will show you the delivery progress. please note: the one time minimum balance is not a fee but a necessary requirement to trigger the production and delivery of your card.for premium account holders your first monthly fees are charged on the 15th day of your subscription and will be deducted from your account.for express delivery the fee of 20‚Ç¨ will be deducted from your account as soon as the card is shipped. please make sure that your account balance covers these fees in addition to the one-time minimum balance. use your card before it physically arrives: before the card arrives in the mail you can begin using it through your apple pay or google pay wallet. this way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants who support this payment method. you can learn more about how to use your card digitally. simply double check the estimated delivery date in the home screen of the n26 app or web app. if the estimated delivery date has been exceeded, please contact us via live chat from within the app or web app.

question: how much does an n26 account cost?
answer: your n26 account comes with no minimum balance fees and no account maintenance fees. for further details, please check out your consumer account agreement and disclosures(new tab). all fee amounts will be automatically withdrawn from your account, except where prohibited by law. any time your remaining balance is less than the fee amount being assessed, the balance of your account will be applied to the fee amount, resulting in a negative balance on your account.

question: where is my refund?
answer:
in most cases, your refund will be visible in the app on the day of the original transaction, not the refund date. scroll down your transaction list or download your previous balance statements to find it. to view and download pdfs of your (preliminary and previous) monthly balance statements: on the webapp(new tab): from transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach downloads then select bank statements.

question: why does n26 do checks on transactions?
answer:
we have the responsibility to run routine checks on accounts and transactions in order to ensure your account‚Äôs security (see gwg ¬ß 10(new tab)). these checks are automatically initiated by our systems.  as a result, we may ask you to provide some documents. if you receive such a request, please send the requested documents via messages from n26. there are no exceptions or evasion for such checks.  this practice is a standard banking procedure and ensures the safety of our customers. both the process and the result are confidential and handled internally. here are some tips to speed up the process: the document that we need you to provide will be exactly named in the message you‚Äôll receive from n26. you can send us scanned documents, pictures, or screenshots, as long as the original content of the document is easily readable. please make sure to also provide a detailed description. be precise in your answers, details, and documents. after we receive your required proof and description, we will let you know if your reply fulfills our check. in a few cases, we might ask for further clarification which could prolong the process.reply as soon as possible, always before the deadline stated in the message you received from n26. use that email to reply and send attachments. our customer support doesn‚Äôt have any additional information on this subject.you must provide valid documentation depending on your situation. 
 find here some examples: you‚Äôve received financial help from your family to complete projects or have inherited land or money from deceased relatives.
a granting/loan contract, an official document of inheritance, or an official document of the source of the loan (such as the sales documents of a sold property to finance the loan or bank statements of granting relatives).you‚Äôve sold a property or your shares on the stock market.
the contract showing the agreed transactions or the official notarial documentation of the transfer of property.you‚Äôve received or sent money to pay bills or buy a product.
documents showing the balance statements confirming the source of this money or documents showing the use of the money and its purpose.you‚Äôve received a final payout from your previous employer.
documents proving the end of your employment, detailing the payment and/or a bank statement from your previous employer.

question: how to cancel my n26 you or n26 metal membership?
answer: n26 you(new tab) or n26 metal(new tab) contracts have a term of one year. this contract automatically renews for another year unless you cancel it.  in this article you will find the difference between revocation, cancellation of the membership and cancellation of the renewal of your membership. you have 3 options: revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation periodcancel your membership at any time up to 1 month before your contract endsstop your membership‚Äôs renewal up to 1 month before it expires find in details how to do so below.  revocation you can revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period. simply open a chat with us and we‚Äôll assist you from there. keep in mind that if you cancel your contract before it ends, you won‚Äôt be able to sign up for the same membership plan in the future. cancel your membership at any time* if you want to terminate your membership at any time up to *1 month before your contract ends and after the 14-day revocation period, please contact us. if you choose this option all your n26 you or n26 metal benefits will end, which includes your insurance coverage. stop the renewal of your membership  you have up to 4 weeks before your membership expires to cancel the renewal of your n26 you or n26 metal membership. to do so: log into the mobile app and go to üë§ my accountselect n26 you/metaltap membership details followed by cancel membership you can also see your membership expiration date hereconfirm the cancellation via the push message we send you you can continue to use your n26 you or will work like a standard card without the benefits. we‚Äôll send you a standard card before your contract ends. no need to contact us about it. we‚Äôll notify you of the renewal via email 8 weeks before your anniversary date. if you want to definitely close your account, visit our article how to close my n26 account.

question: how can i protect my identity?
answer: to protect and help avoid the misuse of your personal data, please keep in mind that: we will never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. this includes verifications for apartment rental contracts, lines of credit, or job offers (including jobs with n26). only complete the verification process if you want to open an n26 account for yourself.as the account owner, only you should create and have access to your login credentials. never create an n26 account with a predefined email address and password. if you use login credentials that were given to you, these credentials may be used to reach your personal and legal information. also, never log into an n26 account that is not yours.do not send your social security number to unknown or unverified recipients.we may ask for certain documents when your transaction is subject to a routine check. only send valid documentation to verified n26 email accounts.we will never ask for your username, password, or pin codes outside the n26 app. never provide this information in an external website or app, even if it looks n26-related.mail is another easy target for thieves. if you are traveling out of town, it may be a good idea to have your mail held or to consider obtaining a u.s. postal service-approved lockable mailbox. all bank statements should be shredded, as well. take care to monitor your financial statements. make sure you recognize every transaction, no matter how small.  if you received a suspicious request from a third party, or think your n26 login may be compromised, please do not hesitate to contact us(new tab).

question: psd2 - secure open banking
answer:
payment services directive 2 (‚Äúpsd2‚Äù) is a revised european directive allowing you to access your account information and initiate payments through regulated third-party providers in a safe and secure manner. 
 
this means that you can permit regulated third party providers to access your account information through a dedicated interface:  you can enable an account information service (ais) to pull together data from different bank accounts you may have, and then aggregate and manage their details in the same place through certified third-party providers.you can securely pay at the checkout of any website that offers payment initiation services (pis).  the data exchange is handled in the background via our partner - token.io. if you begin using a third-party payment service like an account information service or a payment initiation service, you‚Äôll be redirected to your n26 app via token.io to confirm the access request. in our privacy policy(new tab) we inform you about the purposes, involved parties and legal bases of the necessary data processing involved to fulfil our obligations as part of the revised european payment services directive. faqs if a third party provider has not integrated with our dedicated interface, the third party provider will need to integrate with our dedicated interface via our partner token.io. you need to contact the respective third party provider and revoke the access permission directly with them.  *applies to all countries in the eea.

question: how to order my card with express delivery?
answer: express delivery is a good option if you need your card in a hurry or if postal deliveries have sometimes failed to reach you for whatever reason. you‚Äôll be given the option to select express delivery when choosing a delivery method for your first card or if you reorder a card. you‚Äôll then receive a tracking link by email. if you‚Äôre not home during the delivery and your mailbox can‚Äôt be accessed, the card will be left at a nearby access point (you can find it through the provided tracking link). the card only stays at the access point for a limited amount of time. after that, it‚Äôll be returned to us. we‚Äôll inform you by email if that happens. if you order via express delivery, keep in mind that: your new standard, n26 you or metal mastercard will be delivered within 2-3 working days. deliveries take place between 08:00 and 12:00. deliveries can be made by dhl express to all of our supported countries within europe. it‚Äôs currently not possible to make deliveries to other countries.it‚Äôs not possible to cancel or change an express delivery once it‚Äôs been selected as the delivery method.to close an account, you must pay for the express delivery of your card. if your card hasn‚Äôt arrived within 3-5 working days of placing your order, please check the tracking link for an update. you can also use the tracking link to inform dhl directly about the details of your delivery address or to redirect the shipment if you can‚Äôt be there at the time of delivery. n26 standard and n26 you cards have a fee of ‚Ç¨10 for standard shipping and ‚Ç¨30 for express shipping (which includes the ‚Ç¨10 card replacement fee).

question: can n26 close my account?
answer: in short: yes. we can close your account in 3 ways (with 2 months notice, 14 days notice, or immediately). these cancellations are final: our customer support can‚Äôt provide any information about the background of individual cancellations nor can they reverse the decision. you‚Äôre also able to terminate your business relationship with us at any time, immediately, and without a reason. 2 months notice: we have the right to terminate any business relationship with 2 months notice without a cause (see section 19 (1) of our t&cs(new tab) or ¬ß 675h of the german civil code). 14 days notice: we can also terminate any business relationship with 14 days notice (see section 19 (3) of our t&cs(new tab)) if reasonable cause is given due to the breach of contractual duties. these include: using a personal account for business purposes. according to our t&cs, a private account may only be used for personal use. any credit transfers that relate to professional fees for provided services and/or sold products are considered business transactions. if you‚Äôd like to use your account for this purpose, please sign up for an n26 business, n26 business you or n26 business metal account.providing incorrect or insufficient information for a routine background check. we‚Äôre a bank so we sometimes run checks on transactions. if you don‚Äôt provide correct and/or sufficient information about the transaction in question, we have the right to terminate the business relationship in order to be compliant with german financial regulations.displaying abusive behaviour towards n26 employees. we don‚Äôt tolerate abusive behaviour towards our employees. the threat of physical harm or general abusive behaviour may be considered a criminal offense according to german law and will be reported to the respective authority without exception. immediate cancellation we may also terminate any business relationship on an extraordinary basis (see section 19 (3) of our t&cs(new tab)). that means: at any time, without prior notice, and without a cancellation period when there is reasonable cause for such termination. these include: providing incorrect statements to n26 about your financial situation, especially when you apply for a credit.failure to repay your loan or any debt toward n26.failure to comply with n26‚Äôs requests about your loan (see provision or increase of security, section 13 (2) of our t&c‚Äôs(new tab)).

question: how to contact n26?

if you want to reach out, you can open a chat with us directly within the mobile or webapp, or from certain support center(new tab) articles. as an online bank we don‚Äôt have branches. first of all, make sure you‚Äôre up-to-date with the newest version of the app. if not, update your app in the apple app store(new tab) or the google play store(new tab). when accessing your account from our webapp(new tab), you can find the chat in the bottom right corner.

question: why did my online purchase fail?

question: what to do if my account was hacked?
answer:
if you suspect possible fraudulent activity on your account, please contact us as soon as possible. our chat function is available in the app, on the n26 website(new tab), and at the end of some of our support center articles, such as this one. just click on start a chat.  if you‚Äôd rather speak on the phone, you can request this during the chat. we‚Äôll arrange a callback within the hour so we can discuss the matter further with you. once in contact with one of our agents, please thoroughly explain the situation to us.  every detail here is important.  
please be assured that we‚Äôll take all necessary measures to assist you in this situation.  in addition to our legal obligations for fraud prevention, and in order to continually improve our security safeguards, we have a dedicated team who analyzes each fraud case individually. the fraud cases themselves are often relatively complicated and have to be dealt with in detail. depending on the complexity, this can take a few days, but in some cases it can take several weeks. finally, if you have evidence or strong feelings that the account might have been hacked, we recommend that you file a police report as well. to learn more about how we protect your account in case of fraud, visit our blog article(new tab). visit our page about security at n26(new tab) to discover our commitment to protect your funds and your account. chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including sundays and bank holidays. if you do not have access to your n26 mobile app or your n26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in english) .

question: how to set my card pin?
answer: we don‚Äôt send you a pin via post; you set the pin for your mastercard or maestro card once you‚Äôve successfully connected your smartphone to your account and activated your card(s). to set or change your card pin: go to the actions tab.select card settings and swipe to choose a card.select reset pin on the mobile or webapp(new tab).enter the 10-digit token number on your card.choose your new pin and confirm it. keep in mind that: if you live in france, spain, ireland, greece, finland, or estonia, you must make your first payment using chip and pin before you can use your card anywhere else. you can also first make a withdrawal or balance inquiry at atm instead.for security reasons we don‚Äôt accept any pin containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences (such as 1111, 1234, or 4321). if the number you‚Äôve chosen is not accepted please try again using a different combination.if a pin is entered incorrectly three times in a row, the card will automatically be blocked for security reasons. if this happens, please contact our customer support via chat so we can unblock it for you.your card pin is separate from your confirmation pin, however you can choose the same pin for both.

question: how to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?

question: perch√© mi √® stata addebitata una commissione sui prelievi atm?
answer: le commissioni bancomat possono avvenire per vari motivi: si applica una commissione di 2 ‚Ç¨ su qualsiasi prelievo aggiuntivo oltre la nostra politica di utilizzo. riceverai una notifica push quando stai per esaurire i prelievi gratuiti.alcuni bancomat potrebbero applicare commissioni individuali. non abbiamo alcun controllo su queste commissioni e non possiamo rifiutarle o annullarle. se si applicano commissioni aggiuntive sarai informato prima di completare il prelievo e potrai annullarlo.i prelievi atm in valuta estera a volte includono commissioni. con il conto n26, si applica una commissione dell‚Äô1,7% dell‚Äôimporto del prelievo. questa commissione non si applica ai possessori di n26 you e n26 metal.utilizzo della carta maestro per i prelievi atm. i prelievi nazionali o internazionali sono soggetti a una commissione di 2 ‚Ç¨. maestro √® disponibile solo in germania, austria e paesi bassi. per evitare le commissioni, soprattutto in viaggio, puoi utilizzare il localizzatore di atm mastercard(nuova tabella) per trovare i dispositivi da cui prelevare gratuitamente nelle tue vicinanze. trovi una panoramica delle nostre commissioni nel listino prezzi(nuova tabella).

question: can n26 close my account?
answer: in short: yes. we can close your account in 3 ways (with 2 months notice, 14 days notice, or immediately). these cancellations are final: our customer support can‚Äôt provide any information about the background of individual cancellations nor can they reverse the decision. you‚Äôre also able to terminate your business relationship with us at any time, immediately, and without a reason. 2 months notice: we have the right to terminate any business relationship with 2 months notice without a cause (see section 19 (1) of our t&cs(new tab) or ¬ß 675h of the german civil code). 14 days notice: we can also terminate any business relationship with 14 days notice (see section 19 (3) of our t&cs(new tab)) if reasonable cause is given due to the breach of contractual duties. these include: using a personal account for business purposes. according to our t&cs, a private account may only be used for personal use. any credit transfers that relate to professional fees for provided services and/or sold products are considered business transactions. if you‚Äôd like to use your account for this purpose, please sign up for an n26 business, n26 business you or n26 business metal account.providing incorrect or insufficient information for a routine background check. we‚Äôre a bank so we sometimes run checks on transactions. if you don‚Äôt provide correct and/or sufficient information about the transaction in question, we have the right to terminate the business relationship in order to be compliant with german financial regulations.displaying abusive behaviour towards n26 employees. we don‚Äôt tolerate abusive behaviour towards our employees. the threat of physical harm or general abusive behaviour may be considered a criminal offense according to german law and will be reported to the respective authority without exception. immediate cancellation we may also terminate any business relationship on an extraordinary basis (see section 19 (3) of our t&cs(new tab)). that means: at any time, without prior notice, and without a cancellation period when there is reasonable cause for such termination. these include: providing incorrect statements to n26 about your financial situation, especially when you apply for a credit.failure to repay your loan or any debt toward n26.failure to comply with n26‚Äôs requests about your loan (see provision or increase of security, section 13 (2) of our t&c‚Äôs(new tab)).

question: how to protect my identity?
answer: to protect and help avoid the misuse of your personal data, please keep in mind that: we will never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. this includes verifications for apartment rental contracts, lines of credit, or job offers (including jobs with n26). only complete the verification process if you want to open an n26 bank account for yourself.as the account owner, only you should create and have access to your login details. never create an n26 bank account with a predefined email address and password. if you use login credentials that were given to you, these credentials may be used to reach your personal and legal information. also, never log into an n26 account that is not yours.do not send your id or passport to unknown or unverified recipients.we may ask for certain documents when your transaction is subject to a routine check. only send valid documentation to verified n26 email accounts.we will never ask for your username, password, or pin codes outside the n26 app. never provide this information in an external website or app, even if it looks n26-related. if you ever feel in doubt, have received a suspicious request from a third party, or think your n26 login may be compromised, please do not hesitate to contact us.

question: how do i reorder a card?
answer: if you have a previously activated card and need to order a new one for whatever reason, you can easily reorder a card directly from within our mobile application. to order a new card: 1. log in and tap on actions. 2. tap on card settings, then reorder.  3. if you‚Äôve never activated your card, please contact us so that we can order a card for you. you can reach us by phone at 1-888-n26-0-n26 (1-888-626-0626) or chat in our mobile application or via the webapp. (new tab) once your new card arrives, you‚Äôll need to activate it in the mobile application.

question: how to upgrade to metal?
answer: ‚ÑπÔ∏è available in germany, austria, france, spain, italy, belgium, estonia, finland, greece, ireland, latvia, lithuania, luxembourg, netherlands, portugal, slovakia, slovenia, poland, sweden, denmark, norway, iceland, liechtenstein. n26 metal is available during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you already have a n26 bank account or a n26 you membership.  to upgrade to n26 metal from the mobile app, simply go to the explore tab and select get n26 metal. and choose between a charcoal black, quartz rose, or slate grey card. check the conditions of the delivery and accept the n26 metal t&cs(new tab). once you confirm your request by entering your confirmation pin, your new card will be on the way. standard deliveries take up to 10 business days.the membership fee of ‚Ç¨16,90 will be deducted directly from your account every month on the date of your upgrade.the minimum contract period for the n26 metal membership is one year. your membership will automatically renew unless you cancel it up to four weeks before the contract ends.all purchases and travel booked using your n26 you mastercard will remain insured.if you‚Äôre already a n26 you member, you don‚Äôt have to pay the fees for the n26 you membership on top.you can purchase an extra n26 you card for a one-off fee of 14‚Ç¨ through your n26 app.  want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to n26. learn more about our refer a friend program.

we automatically sort your transactions and display our findings in statistics (top-right corner of the mobile app) by sorting your: categories: we collect information on retailers and payment reasons in order to improve our categorization (such as atm, food & groceries, or shopping). for example, if you send a moneybeam with the reference text lunch, we‚Äôll put it in the bars & restaurants category. if you feel like a category doesn‚Äôt fit, you can just change it by selecting the transaction and choosing a category from the drop-down list.

question: why did my sepa transfer fail?
answer: we accept transfers in eur done via sepa. we don‚Äôt support swift so if you need to make a foreign currency transfer, please use transferwise (in the app or from their website(new tab)). to get a transfer, you‚Äôll only need to provide the sender with your full name (as it‚Äôs written on the id you provided for verification) and your iban. you can find your iban on your balance statements and in üë§ my account (in the mobile app or webapp(new tab)). common reasons for failed transfers: the recipient‚Äôs name on the transfer order is different from the name on their account (must be their name as written on their id).the recipient‚Äôs name is a company name instead of a personal/account name (applies to n26 business).the iban is incorrect.you‚Äôre not receiving the push message to confirm your transfer.an inappropriate use was found. n26 has the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see gwg ¬ß 10(new tab)). as a result, we may ask for documentation to verify the origin or source of these transactions. this can result in the credit being delayed or not taking place.

question: how to export a list of my transactions?

our web app(new tab) allows you to search within your transactions. you can also download a history of your transactions in csv format. to export your transaction list: from transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach downloads

question: why is my transfer still pending in the n26 app?

question: how long does it take to send money with transferwise?

question: how to file a complaint?

looking for support or have a question if you don‚Äôt wish to make a complaint but you have questions about our products or need help with your account, we‚Äôre always happy to assist. you can email us at support@n26.com(new tab) (new tab), or just open a chat with us directly within the mobile app or webapp, that‚Äôs the fastest and simplest way to get in touch. raising a complaint we‚Äôre sorry you feel the need to raise a complaint, please see below for the ways you are able to do this.  if you are dissatisfied with one of our products or services, you can send us an email from your registered email address* or send your complaint via post to the address to: n26 bank gmbh ‚Äì complaint management

question: crs - why we require certain information from our customers
answer:
n26 as a financial institution is (according to crs) required to report information directly to tax authorities in the european union concerning financial accounts held by customers who are tax resident in another country. crs stands for common reporting standard. the crs has been developed by the organization for economic cooperation and development (oecd) and is a global reporting standard for the automatic exchange of information (aeoi). the goal of crs is to allow tax authorities to obtain a clearer understanding of financial assets held abroad by their residents for tax purposes in order to fight tax evasion. more than 90 countries have agreed to share information on residents‚Äô assets and incomes in conformation with crs. in order for us to be able to accurately determine whether an account is to be reported to the tax authorities for crs purposes, we need to ask you: in which country(ies) are you a tax resident? 

you are normally a ‚Äútax resident‚Äù and therefore subject to tax on your worldwide income in the country where you have a residential address. if you have a place to live in more than one country, then there are normally ‚Äútie-breaker rules‚Äù included in double tax treaties and tax laws of the relevant countries that help determine where you are a tax resident. it may be that you are tax resident in more than one country during a year and, if so, we‚Äôd need to know both the country and your taxpayer identification number for each of them in order to accurately report the information to the relevant tax authorities. 
what is your taxpayer identification number (‚Äútin‚Äù) for each country?

the issuance and format of a tin differs by country. for eu countries, the european commission has published guidance on tins in each eu country(new tab), which may help you in identifying your individual tin(s) in these countries.  in case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the n26 app. to do this, simply log in to the n26 app and go to: my account > settings > personal settings > tax information

question: what to do if my n26 iban is not accepted?
answer: your iban includes the 2 digit country code (e.g. de), a two-digit check number, the eight-digit bank sort code, and your ten-digit account number. for example: de xx 10011001 26xxxxxxxx. the participating countries of the sepa area (single euro payments area) have agreed on the iban system in order to simplify national and international payments, and to reduce the risk of error in the communication and processing of transactions. merchants or employers who do not accept ibans from other member states of the european economic area are violating european law as of 1 february 2016 (article 9 of regulation no 260/2012(new tab)). if you are ever affected by iban discrimination, please contact your relevant national authority(new tab) directly and notify them. provide your contact details, the name of the merchant or company that didn‚Äôt accept your iban, as well as a brief description of the incident (including a screenshot of the rejection or other documentation of your communication with them).

question: how to protect my identity?
answer: to protect and help avoid the misuse of your personal data, please keep in mind that: we will never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. this includes verifications for apartment rental contracts, lines of credit, or job offers (including jobs with n26). only complete the verification process if you want to open an n26 bank account for yourself.as the account owner, only you should create and have access to your login details. never create an n26 bank account with a predefined email address and password. if you use login credentials that were given to you, these credentials may be used to reach your personal and legal information. also, never log into an n26 account that is not yours.do not send your id or passport to unknown or unverified recipients.we may ask for certain documents when your transaction is subject to a routine check. only send valid documentation to verified n26 email accounts.we will never ask for your username, password, or pin codes outside the n26 app. never provide this information in an external website or app, even if it looks n26-related. if you ever feel in doubt, have received a suspicious request from a third party, or think your n26 login may be compromised, please do not hesitate to contact us.

question: why was i charged more than expected?
answer: all transactions take place in real-time. we‚Äôll alert you when any incoming or outgoing transaction happens via push message. sometimes a transaction could look suspicious because the final debited amount can differ from the original transaction amount for a few reasons: a merchant blocks a higher amount for a deposit (for example, at a gas station, or a car rental or hotel booking), and the difference is credited to your account once the deposit is no longer required.changes in exchange rates may result in slight differences in the total for transactions made in foreign currencies. in both cases, we don‚Äôt charge interest for the difference in amounts. but if you‚Äôre certain that a transaction is unauthorized by you, we could help get your money back.

question: how to activate my card?
answer:
once you receive your physical card, you‚Äôll need to activate it. you can do this in the app only after you connect your smartphone to your account. or you can activate it directly from the web app(new tab).  you‚Äôll need your 10-digit token number: it‚Äôs found below your name on the front of your card (or on the back if you have an n26 you, n26 metal, or maestro card).  to activate your card on the n26 app, from the home screen:go to the actions tab,select cards settings and swipe until you see the card you want to activate,tap activate.
to activate your card on the web app, just select activate card from the home screen. if you live in france, spain, ireland, greece, finland, or estonia you must make a first atm withdrawal to fully activate your card. if you have multiple cards (for example, you ordered your card more than once or your delivery was delayed), you can only activate your most recent card. all other cards will be disabled. you‚Äôll need to follow these activation steps every time you reorder a new card, like if your card is lost, stolen, broken, or you upgrade your account.    after you activate your card, the next step is choosing a card pin.

question: why is n26 secure?
answer: to protect your account, we use a three-layered security architecture: secure login. your login details of both the mobile and webapp(new tab) consist of a username and password or fingerprint/face recognition (depending on your smartphone). please choose a secure password and don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone.confirmation pin. this 4-digit code is required every time you make a transfer or connect/disconnect your phone. you first set it up once you have successfully connected your smartphone to your account. you can then change it in the app yourself after that.push messages. for every incoming and outgoing payment, a push message will be sent to your connected smartphone. it‚Äôs also used to confirm and finalize your transactions. we‚Äôve also added 3d secure to protect you from online card fraud. every time you contact us we‚Äôll ask you some security questions to make sure it‚Äôs really you. but we‚Äôll never ask for your debit card number, card verification code (cvv), password, or your card or confirmation pins. we‚Äôve also taken steps to protect your data: we store as little information about you as possible, only for as long as we are legally obligated to, and we delete data when it is no longer required for a product or service. you can download your personal data up to 6 months after you close your account. find more information in our privacy policy(new tab).

dedicated interface

question: how to top up by card, apple pay, and google pay
answer:
you can now add money by using a debit or credit card as well as apple or google pay. this is the fastest and easiest way to fund your n26 account. 
  adding money with a debit or credit card open your n26 app and navigate to the actions tabjust tap ‚Äúadd money‚Äù and select ‚Äúcard transfer‚Äùchoose an amount and enter your name on card, card number, expiration date and cvc (we never store your card information)follow the steps to confirm the paymentthe money is available on your account instantly   adding money with a apple or google pay open your n26 app and navigate to the actions tabjust tap ‚Äúadd money‚Äù and select ‚Äúapple pay‚Äù or ‚Äúgoogle pay‚Äùchoose an amount follow the steps to confirm the paymentthe money is available on your account instantly
 accepted cards:  debit cards.credit cards (except america express).prepaid cards (only for customers with italian terms & conditions). to find out more about the difference between debit, credit and prepaid cards read this article(new tab).
 cost:
whilst this is the fastest and easiest way to instantly add funds in your n26 account, for us, processing these instant top-up transactions is more expensive than other account funding methods(new tab) we offer.
 for both methods, the first deposit is always free but extra deposits are charged a fee of 3% of the deposit amount. by charging a card or digital wallet, your money is not sent to n26 instantly, and the fee covers additional costs associated with funding accounts before the money is received so that it is instantly available for your use.

question: all about perks
answer: "do you need an n26 card to take advantage of these perks?" yes, you need an active n26 card to take advantage of these perks. "will i be able to enroll in perks as soon as i open an n26 account, or will i need to wait some time?" perks will be available to you as soon as you activate your card, and will always be available for you as long as your card is active. "can i access perks through the web app?" no, you cannot.  perks are only available through the mobile app. "what is the difference between a cashback and a discount perk?" the main difference between the two perks is that the cashback perk is a subscription-based benefit, where you get a refund on your monthly subscription payment, from n26.  a discount perk is a purchase based benefit where you are able to purchase items at a reduced price - a discount.  in general, discounts are applied instantly while cashbacks may take up to a couple of business days to get credited to your account. "do i need a minimum balance in order to enroll in perks?"  while you do not need a minimum balance to enroll in perks,  you must have a minimum balance to cover the selected subscription amount for your monthly cashback perk or to purchase the goods/services associated with your discount perk.
