question: how to use my card digitally?
answer: you can make purchases with your smartphone: simply add your n26 card to your apple pay or google pay wallet in order to make purchases at merchants who support this payment method. you can enable this feature before your card arrives in the mail to start using your n26 account straight away but also once you have received your card and activated it. to add your card to your wallet follow these steps: login to your n26 accountgo to ‚Äôactions‚Äôselect ‚Äôcard settings‚Äô and swipe to select the card you want to addselect ‚Äôadd to apple pay‚Äô or ‚Äôadd to google pay‚Äô good to know: whilst waiting for your card to arrive this feature is available for 30 days after your physical card is being produced. if you don‚Äôt activate your card within the timeframe then this feature will be suspended. once you activate your card you will be able to continue using it digitally again.this feature is not enabled if you reorder your card or upgrade to a premium membership without blocking your current card. in these cases your current card will continue working with ‚Äôapple pay‚Äô or ‚Äôgoogle pay‚Äô until you activate your new card. if you need your card details but aren‚Äôt carrying your card with you at the moment then don‚Äôt worry. n26 allows you to view your complete card details in the mobile app if you have an active card and paired device. to view your card follow these steps: login to the n26 mobile appgo to ‚Äôactions‚Äôfrom your card list swipe until you see the card you want to usetap ‚Äôcard details‚Äôconfirm with your fingerprint, face id or phone lock pin you will be able to view your complete card details for 1 minute. please note, you won‚Äôt be able to take screenshots whilst your card details are being displayed.

question: how to get my money back in case of fraud?
answer: if you don‚Äôt recognize a transaction or you‚Äôre sure you didn‚Äôt authorize it, blocking your card won‚Äôt be enough. in these cases you should immediately: request new card(new tab) and indicate that the old one has been stolen. please tear up the card by cutting it with scissors, for example. both the chip, the nfc antenna and the magnetic stripe must be cut into pieces.then fill out the dispute form(new tab). from there we will do everything we can to get your money back. you can continue using your account for bank transfers until your new card arrives. if you‚Äôre in germany or austria, you can also use cash26 for cash withdrawals. you should keep in mind that changes in the final amount debited from your account don‚Äôt necessarily indicate fraud.

question: how long does it take to send money with transferwise?
answer: once you‚Äôve initiated your transfer via transferwise you‚Äôll be given an estimated time frame. when making a transfer, ensure that the recipients name exactly matches the name on their bank account!  if a transferwise transfer fails, we‚Äôll notify you via push message. the amount will automatically be returned to your account a few days later. you can‚Äôt personally cancel a transfer, but if you get in touch with transferwise support this way they can cancel the transfer for you. keep in mind that the transfer can only be cancelled up until the point transferwise pays out your funds. once the money has been sent to the recipient, it‚Äôs not possible to cancel the transfer anymore. the recipients details can only be changed up until the point that transferwise has paid out your money. after your money has been paid out, the recipients details can no longer be changed. you can get in touch with transferwise this way. transferwise doesn‚Äôt charge extra fees for a returned payment and neither do we. however, some participating banks do charge fees, in which case transferwise will deduct this amount from the money returned under their conditions of use(new tab). common reasons for a failed transfer: error in the transfer details (for example, when entering the recipient‚Äôs name or account information).special characters or too many characters in the recipient‚Äôs name or reference field.limits have been reached or online payments aren‚Äôt active in card settings.foreign currency transfers aren‚Äôt possible with n26 business or n26 business you or if the recipient is a business account.

question: how to find my iban or account number?
answer: you can find your iban and bic number on your balance statements or in üë§ my account from the mobile app or webapp(new tab) (if you haven‚Äôt activated your card and need to top up your account). all our ibans start with de (germany), it (italy), or es (spain) followed by the check digits (two numbers), then our bank code 10011001 and end with your 10-digit account number (start at 26). you can easily share your information through the share button in üë§ my account. or you can download your bank account information as a pdf by logging into the webapp(new tab) and selecting the cloud icon on the top-right corner of transactions. prefer a video over text? watch the tutorial(new tab) on our n26 support youtube(new tab) channel.

question: how to create a password?
answer: if you forgot your password or want to change it, select forgot? in the app or forgot your password?(new tab) in the webapp(new tab) during login. we‚Äôll send a link to your registered email address so you can create a new password. make sure your new password meets our requirements: we do not have a specific set of requirements for our passwords. we measure their strength on the fly and only accept passwords that are considered robust by our underlying algorithm. we tend to recommend to go with a ‚Äúpassphrase‚Äù rather than a password, and thus go by the common phrase ‚Äúhard to guess, easy to remember‚Äù.  if your password is not accepted by our system, try to add more special characters, numbers, and vary between upper- and lowercase letters. if you enter your password incorrectly six times in a row, you‚Äôll be temporarily blocked from your account. if this happens, try logging in again after 30 minutes. chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including sundays and bank holidays.

question: how to get a loan?
answer: (applies to germany and france) with n26 credit, we‚Äôve partnered with auxmoney (in germany) and younited credit (in france) to offer personal loans between ‚Ç¨1.000 to ‚Ç¨50.000 with repayment terms of 6 to 84 months. request a loan at any time directly in the app into the explore section then n26 financial products: we‚Äôll ask you a few questions about the loan and your creditworthiness (you‚Äôll need to provide additional online banking information for your main account if you‚Äôve used n26 for less than 6 months).prove your identity: we‚Äôll need to see your id card or passport in germany and possibly your proof of residence (in the form of a utility bill or similar). and if you‚Äôre a non-eu citizen, you‚Äôll need to send us a photo of your residency permit.edit your answers during the application process: once you‚Äôre happy with your loan application, send it to us in real-time and we‚Äôll make you a binding offer that you can delete or accept. otherwise applications expire in 90 days and you won‚Äôt be able to request another loan during that time.confirm your loan: if you accept our offer, you‚Äôll either have to sign the contract electronically through a video call or confirm via sms message.receive a push message as soon as the payment has been made: in germany, the loan amount will be credited to your n26 account within 5-7 working days. in france, payouts take a week. we offer interest rates between 1.99% and 19% p.a. apart from the interest, there are no other charges. however, if you change your plan or are in default of your monthly payments, additional fees may apply. for more information, see the n26 credit t&cs(new tab).

question: where can i use my maestro card?
answer: ‚ÑπÔ∏è applies to germany, austria, and the netherlands let‚Äôs get a couple of things out of the way: your maestro can‚Äôt be used for online purchases and it‚Äôs not an ec or girocard (in germany). but you can use your card in atms or shops where the maestro symbol is displayed. each atm transaction using your maestro is ‚Ç¨2 (plus a fee of 1,7% of the amount for foreign currency withdrawals). you can order your maestro card directly in the app only if you live in germany, austria or the netherlands and have received a transfer of at least 100 ‚Ç¨ from one of these 3 countries. if you‚Äôre having issues using your maestro, first check that your card settings are activated. if nothing is blocked, contact customer support via chat and we‚Äôll look into it for you. want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to n26. learn more about our refer a friend program.

question: how to set rules for spaces?
answer: within your spaces, you can set your own rules! rules allow you to easily create automated transactions and standing orders to your spaces to save money and organise your finances.  if you want to set a rule through the web app, here‚Äôs what you need to know: process a spaces transfer and then enable the option to repeat the transfer.to delete a rule, click on the 3 dots indicating the settings. you‚Äôll see all the active rules. clicking on the trashcan icon will delete the rule.if you need to change a rule, delete it from the settings of the space you created the rule in, and then create a new one. if you want to set a rule through an android device, you have two options: from spaces > click on the three dots > create rule > enter amount > select space > choose frequency and date > confirm  2. after setting a space transfer > select repeat > choose frequency and date > confirm  if you want to set a rule through an ios device, this is what you need to do:      from spaces > create a new rule > choose frequency and date > confirm   please be aware that both spaces rules and standing orders are processed at the same time of day (0100 utc). this means if you have a rule and standing order set up for the same date, you will need enough funds on that day to cover both. if you have standing orders that are dependent on your rules having happened first, you will need to make sure the standing order is set for the day after the rule. this also means that if you want to prioritise your standing orders they need to be set for the day before your rules. please note that, if you have an activated overdraft, a rule will still be processed automatically even if your balance is negative.

question: custom audiences
answer: data processing in the framework of facebook custom audiences custom audiences allows us to exclude you, as an existing n26 customer, from our advertisements. we do not want to display irrelevant ads to you. furthermore, it allows us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other facebook users. these so called ‚Äúlookalike-audiences‚Äù are more similar to our customers than the average facebook user.  in order to profit from the benefits as described above we provide a hashed version of your n26 email address to facebook. the so-called ‚Äúhashing‚Äù is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. facebook then matches this email address against your potential facebook email address. after the matching, regardless of whether it was successful or not, any hashed email addresses are deleted within 6-8 hours by facebook. facebook does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. you can find this and further information in the terms of facebook custom audiences(new tab). you can revoke your consent according to art. 6 para. 1 lit. a gdpr to this data processing in the n26 web app at any time.

question: what if my balance is negative?
answer: your balance can be negative as long as you‚Äôre within your overdraft limit.  if you have a negative account balance, you‚Äôll be charged an overdraft interest rate of 8.9%. otherwise, you‚Äôll receive an email to notify you that the authorized limit of your account has been exceeded. this means you don‚Äôt have enough funds on your account to cover future charges. even if you haven‚Äôt used your account since you opened it, certain charges still apply (such as n26 you or n26 metal monthly fees or express delivery costs) and have resulted in a negative balance. so you‚Äôll need to top up your account via sepa transfer (choose international transfer if you‚Äôre making the transfer outside of germany) or cash26 (if you‚Äôre in germany or austria). your account will remain active for the next 60 days without doing so. at that point: you‚Äôll receive two additional reminders (each cost ‚Ç¨3).if you have an overdraft: it‚Äôll be cancelled after the second reminder and you‚Äôll have to repay that amount immediately (or you can set up a repayment plan).if you have an n26 you, n26 metal, or n26 business you account: all benefits will be cancelled after 60 days and your account will turn into a standard one.if you don‚Äôt respond after 60 days, we may close your account.

question: fatca - why we require certain information from our customers
answer:
as a financial institution, n26 is required to report information about financial accounts held by u.s. taxpayers or by foreign entities (in which u.s. taxpayers hold a substantial ownership interest according to fatca) to the united states department of treasury and the internal revenue service (‚Äúirs‚Äù). fatca is an acronym for foreign account tax compliance act and is a legislation designed to prevent tax evasion. another purpose of fatca is to encourage better tax compliance by preventing u.s. persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid u.s. taxation on their income and assets. you can find more information about fatca on the irs website(new tab). the u.s. tax system includes u.s. citizens who are not presently residing in the u.s. in comparison. so in order for us to be able to accurately determine whether your account is to be reported to the irs, we‚Äôll need to ask you: are you (also) a citizen or green card holder of the united states? 
are you subject to tax in the u.s?

being ‚Äúsubject to tax‚Äù in the u.s. does not necessarily mean that you‚Äôre also paying personal income tax in the u.s. it means that u.s. tax law requires you to file a tax return and declare your (worldwide) income to the irs, even if you don‚Äôt end up paying any u.s. tax.
if so, what is your u.s. taxpayer identification number?

as a u.s. tin you can either use your u.s. social security number (‚Äússn‚Äù) or your u.s. individual taxpayer identification number (itin). you can find more information about tin on the irs‚Äô website(new tab). additionally, if your account shows: a u.s. place of birth, a u.s. telephone number,a standing order to the u.s. then we are required by fatca legislation to initially assume that you are subject to fatca until you can specifically confirm to us otherwise. in case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the n26 app. to do this, simply log in to the n26 app and go to: my account > settings > personal settings > tax information

answer: eine insolvenz bezeichnet die situation eines schuldners, der nicht mehr in der lage ist, seine zahlungsverpflichtungen gegen√ºber einem gl√§ubiger zu erf√ºllen. das hat folgen f√ºr dein n26 konto, die vom status deines kontos und vom stadium des insolvenzverfahrens abh√§ngen. dein konto kann ein p-konto sein (oder nicht) und das insolvenzverfahren kann im stadium des antragsverfahrens oder er√∂ffnungsverfahrens sein.  faq dein konto ist gesperrt, weil uns ein pf√§ndungs- und √ºberweisungsbeschluss f√ºr dein konto zugestellt wurde. kommt die pf√§ndung von einem deiner insolvenzgl√§ubiger, dann muss uns der insolvenzverwalter dar√ºber in kenntnis setzen und die sperre wird aufgehoben. wenn es sich um eine forderung handelt, die erst nach nach beendigung des insolvenzverfahrens entstanden ist, dann ist die pf√§ndungsma√ünahme zul√§ssig und die sperre bleibt aufrechterhalten. da wir wir nicht sicher sind, ob die neue pf√§ndungsma√ünahme g√ºltig ist oder aufgrund des insolvenzverfahrens zur√ºckzuweisen ist, bleibt dein konto wieder gesperrt, bis wir vom insolvenzverwalter eine schriftliche freigabeerkl√§rung f√ºr dein konto erhalten haben.  um die sperre aufzuheben, ben√∂tigen wir ein offizielles schreiben von dem insolvenzverwalter. es kann sein, dass es einige tage dauert, bis der insolvenzverwalter uns dieses schreiben zusendet und es bei uns eingeht. bis dahin bleibt dein konto gesperrt. falls du ein p-konto hast, kannst du √ºber dein guthaben im rahmen des pf√§ndungsfreibetrages verf√ºgen. du kannst jederzeit den pf√§ndungsschutz von deinem konto entfernen. wir empfehlen dir zuvor sicher zu stellen, dass uns eine freigabe deines insolvenzverwalters f√ºr dein konto vorliegt. die ausf√ºhrung des √ºberweisungsauftrages kann nur mit zustimmung des insolvenzverwalters erfolgen.

question: what does n26 do with my tax information?
answer: the oecd requires certain tax information to be shared by means of the common reporting standard(new tab) (ecr). to carry out our obligations, we must establish which country you‚Äôre taxable in. we do this through your tax identification or national insurance number.  we forward this information via the german federal tax office to tax authorities in other countries if:  you live in a ecr participating country.you have a postbox or a second registered address in another ecr participating country.when registering you gave a telephone number belonging to another ecr participating country.you have a standing order, or make regular payments, to an account located in another ecr participating country. we also forward data to the u.s. internal revenue service(new tab) (irs) according to the foreign account tax compliance act(new tab) (fatca). we may request your social security number (ssn) in order to check your tax status in the u.s. because: you are a citizen of the u.s (including dual citizenship).when registering you gave a telephone number belonging to the u.s.you were born in the u.s. (or in a u.s. embassy located abroad).you‚Äôre married to a u.s. national.you gave us an address in the u.s.you make regular payment transfers to the u.s. to update your tax identification or social security number in the n26 app: go to  my account and tap on settings and account settingsselect personal settings then tax informationselect the country in which you‚Äôre tax-liableenter either your tax identification number or your social security number important information in germany, we need your steueridentifikationsnummer (11 digits) not your steuernummer (9 digits).if you‚Äôre not tax-liable in another country, contact us so we can confirm your tax status.in each and every case your personal data will be securely stored and only used for the fulfillment of ecr and fatca requirements.we‚Äôre unable to advise you on your tax status. if you‚Äôre unsure of your status please discuss the matter with a tax advisor.if you‚Äôve entered the country in which you are liable for tax but not your tax identification number, please remove the country from the list shown to you in the app, reenter the country, and enter your tax identification number again.

question: why does n26 do checks on transactions?
answer:
we have the responsibility to run routine checks on accounts and transactions in order to ensure your account‚Äôs security (see gwg ¬ß 10(new tab)). these checks are automatically initiated by our systems.  as a result, we may ask you to provide some documents. if you receive such a request, please send the requested documents via messages from n26. there are no exceptions or evasion for such checks.  this practice is a standard banking procedure and ensures the safety of our customers. both the process and the result are confidential and handled internally. here are some tips to speed up the process: the document that we need you to provide will be exactly named in the message you‚Äôll receive from n26. you can send us scanned documents, pictures, or screenshots, as long as the original content of the document is easily readable. please make sure to also provide a detailed description. be precise in your answers, details, and documents. after we receive your required proof and description, we will let you know if your reply fulfills our check. in a few cases, we might ask for further clarification which could prolong the process.reply as soon as possible, always before the deadline stated in the message you received from n26. use that email to reply and send attachments. our customer support doesn‚Äôt have any additional information on this subject.you must provide valid documentation depending on your situation. 
 find here some examples: you‚Äôve received financial help from your family to complete projects or have inherited land or money from deceased relatives.
a granting/loan contract, an official document of inheritance, or an official document of the source of the loan (such as the sales documents of a sold property to finance the loan or bank statements of granting relatives).you‚Äôve sold a property or your shares on the stock market.
the contract showing the agreed transactions or the official notarial documentation of the transfer of property.you‚Äôve received or sent money to pay bills or buy a product.
documents showing the balance statements confirming the source of this money or documents showing the use of the money and its purpose.you‚Äôve received a final payout from your previous employer.
documents proving the end of your employment, detailing the payment and/or a bank statement from your previous employer.

answer: 3d secure protects you from online card fraud. it‚Äôs automatically activated when you activate your card in the app. no additional passwords are required. whenever you make an online payment using your mastercard, 3d secure confirms the transaction with you within 5 minutes via a push message. if you don‚Äôt see the transaction, try some of the troubleshooting tips we‚Äôve collected. if you make a purchase using your smartphone, you‚Äôll see a pending transaction in the app. tap on the bell icon and the push message will appear for you to confirm and finalize your purchase. then go back to the merchant‚Äôs website. you should see a confirmation of your successful purchase within a few moments. want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to n26. learn more about our refer a friend program.

question: custom audiences
answer: datenverarbeitung im rahmen von facebook custom audiences custom audiences erm√∂glicht uns, dich als bestehenden n26 kunden von unseren werbema√ünahmen auszuschlie√üen. wir m√∂chten dir keine irrelevante werbung anzeigen. dar√ºber k√∂nnen wir eine relevante zielgruppe definieren, f√ºr welche die angezeigte werbung relevanter ist als f√ºr andere facebook-nutzer. diese sog. ‚Äúlookalike-audiences‚Äù sind unseren eigenen kunden √§hnlicher als der durchschnittliche facebook-nutzer.  um die oben beschrieben vorteile nutzen zu k√∂nnen, stellen wir facebook eine ‚Äúgehashte‚Äù version deiner n26 e-mail-adresse zur verf√ºgung. das sog. ‚Äúhashing‚Äù ist eine form der pseudonymisierung durch die deine email-adresse verschl√ºsselt wird, sodass du anhand dieser gehashten e-mail-adresse nicht mehr identifiziert werden kannst. deine gehashte e-mail-adresse wird von facebook dahingehend abgeglichen, ob diese auch bei facebook hinterlegt ist. nach dem abgleich, unabh√§ngig davon ob dieser erfolgreich war oder nicht, werden s√§mtliche gehashte e-mail-adressen innerhalb von 6-8 stunden gel√∂scht. facebook teilt diese daten nicht mit dritten oder anderen werbetreibenden oder gew√§hrt diesen zugang zu deinen daten. diese und weitere informationen kannst du den agb von facebook custom audiences(neuen tab) entnehmen. du kannst deine einwilligung zu dieser verarbeitung deiner daten gem√§√ü art. 6 abs. 1 bst. a dsgvo jederzeit in der n26 web app widerrufen.

question: how to download my personal data?
answer: the general data protection regulation (gdpr) is a european regulation on data protection and privacy that went into effect on may 25th, 2018. we‚Äôve added a data export option to the webapp(new tab) as a response to art. 20 gdpr. and, as with everything we do, getting your personal data you provided to us is transparent and simple, and you‚Äôre in complete control: go to üë§ my account then personal settings and your personal data. the right to data portability under art. 20 gdpr covers personal data you provided to us. art. 20 gdpr shall enable you to easily switch the service provider in case you want to use these data to open a bank account at another bank. this is why art. 20 gdpr requires to provide these data in a machine-readable format to you.  it‚Äôs important to keep in mind that the file is to be used for data portability purposes only and your computer might not be able to read a json file. also, if you can open the json file the data might be difficult to understand as it is not intended to be human-readable, but machine-readable. the file we provide has the only purpose of being transmitted to another bank.  as a mobile bank, we know the importance of data security. for this reason we take additional security measures before you can download your data, which are described below. we do so in order to make sure that you, the account holder, is in fact the person who downloads the data.   how to download your data you can request to download the personal data you provided for a current or previous account with us up to 6 months after account closure date. it will come in a machine-readable format so you can share it with a third party if you choose to. current customers: please request your data through our web form(new tab). you will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. this link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. and please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request. former customers: you can download personal data you provided up to 6 months after account closure date. to request this information, complete a data request form(new tab) and make sure that the information you provide correctly matches all your previous account information. you‚Äôll need to know: the first and last name, personal id number, and expiration date of the identification document (national id card or passport) you used to verify the account,the registered email address of the account,the date (month and year) you created and closed your account (check your verification email). for security reasons, we have to make sure it‚Äôs really you downloading the data: if any field is inaccurate or missing, your request will not be successful. you will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. this link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. and please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request. if you want more information about the collection, use, and processing of your personal data, please visit our updated privacy policy (deu(new tab)) (eu(new tab)).

question: why was i charged twice?
answer: we offer you banking in real-time. this means you‚Äôre able to see the processes going on behind your account that you otherwise wouldn‚Äôt see. there are two main transaction types that take place during an in-store or online purchase: authorizations. a block or reserved amount made by a retailer or merchant. this includes anything from your morning cup of coffee to hotel or car rental bookings (including security deposits).presentments. the actual amount that is deducted from your account. again, that cup of coffee is finally cleared from your account or you can get your security deposit back once that hotel room or car is returned safe and sound. once an authorization has been confirmed, we can‚Äôt cancel or reverse it. at that point, a few things can happen to your authorization: it turns into a presentment, it‚Äôs rejected, or it expires (and automatically returns to your account after 12 days at the latest. car rental deposits may need up to 30 days to return to your account). keep in mind: sometimes you‚Äôll see both the authorization and the presentment if they become disconnected or due to technical issues at the payment terminal. eventually the authorization will expire. if it doesn‚Äôt, we can help get your money back.verification authorizations (usually very small amounts) are used to check whether your card is active. this money will return to your account.the amount of an authorization can differ from the final presentment for a variety of reasons.

question: how to create and manage standing orders?
answer: when setting up an outgoing transfer in either the n26 app or web app you‚Äôll have the option to make it a standing order. once you complete the outgoing transfer you‚Äôll then be prompted to tick a box which will create a standing order. after you‚Äôve inputted the amount of the transfer and its recipient, under the reference text field select "want to save this as a standing order?". from here you‚Äôll be able to set the start/end dates of the standing order and choose its payment intervals. to view your scheduled transfers and standing orders directly in the mobile app: go to your transaction list (the main screen).then tap on the 3 dots located in the upper right corner for android and on the top of the transaction list for ios. a small window will pop, where you will be able to select "standing orders". here you can cancel and/or modify the details of your standing order. to cancel it just tap the standing order you wish to delete and tap the trash icon in the top right-hand corner. ‚ÑπÔ∏è  please note, if a standing order fails due to insufficient funds we won‚Äôt attempt the transfer again - you‚Äôll need to manually send the transfer, however the next scheduled transfers will proceed as normal.

question: ¬ød√≥nde invierte n26 mi dinero?
answer: como regla general, nos esforzamos para que los dep√≥sitos de nuestros clientes sean otorgados en forma de pr√©stamo a nuestros propios clientes (siempre y cuando dispongan de una solvencia apropiada). en cuanto a la liquidez que no se utiliza para los clientes, nuestra estrategia de inversi√≥n es de bajo riesgo. invertimos el dinero de nuestros clientes con el deutsche bundesbank (banco federal alem√°n) y otros bancos europeos dentro de la eurozona, √∫nicamente con un buen tipo de riesgo y a corto plazo. adem√°s, refinanciamos colectivos de derecho p√∫blico principalmente en alemania (ciudades y municipios) e invertimos en bonos de estado en euros. no somos una instituci√≥n de trading y por lo tanto no comerciamos para obtener beneficios a corto plazo. no nos involucramos en la especulaci√≥n; ni con comida, divisas extranjeras, bitcoins u otras clases de activos.

question: how to protect my account?

question: how to top up my account?

question: why was i charged an atm fee?
answer: atm fees could happen for a few reasons:  a ‚Ç¨2 fee applies to any additional withdrawal beyond our fair use policy. you can identify this fee in your transaction history as a separate transaction. we‚Äôll remind you via push message when you‚Äôre running low on free withdrawals. some atms may come with their own fees. this fee will appear within the same transaction in your transaction list, that is added on top of the withdrawal amount. we have no control over these fees and can‚Äôt reject or reverse them. you‚Äôll be informed before the end of a withdrawal if additional fees apply and will have the possibility of cancelling it.foreign currency atm withdrawals sometimes include fees. with the n26 account, there‚Äôs a fee of 1.7% of the withdrawal amount. this fee is waived for n26 you or n26 metal members. using your maestro for atm withdrawals. a ‚Ç¨2 fee applies to both domestic or international withdrawals. maestro is only available in germany, austria, or the netherlands.  good to know: to avoid certain fees, especially when travelling, you can use the(new tab) mastercard atm locator(new tab) to find free atms nearby by selecting no access fee.all atms that you can see in the atm finder support mastercard.you can find an overview of our plans and fees on our website(new tab).

question: how to save the details of a transfer recipient?

question: how to make transfers in foreign currencies?
answer: we have partnered with transferwise to make foreign currency transfers easy. transferwise offers real-time exchange rates and no hidden fees. to initiate a transfer in a foreign currency start by logging into the mobile app:  from the home screen choose the actions tabselect send money followed by foreign currency transferselect the desired currency and enter the amount you would like to send in ‚Ç¨ (it will automatically convert into the foreign currency below). after that, you add a new recipient or select an existing payeefinalise the transfer with your confirmation pin you‚Äôll receive an email from transferwise to change your password and then you can use both log in details to perform the transfer from there. please note that in order for this process to work, you need to create a transferwise profile via the n26 app first, meaning that you need to try to go through the in-app foreign currency transfer flow. otherwise you won‚Äôt receive an email from transferwise to reset the password. please also note that foreign currency transfers in the app are not possible with the n26 business, business you or business metal account, nor are transfers to businesses. transferwise has its own transfer types and fees but this will all be indicated before you confirm the transfer. for detailed information about eligible recipients, please check transferwise‚Äôs available currencies(new tab). want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to n26. learn more about our refer a friend program.

question: how to make a sepa transfer?
answer:
‚ÑπÔ∏è you can send debit transfers to any country within the sepa zone (if the receiving bank accepts euros). outgoing debit transfers can be made in either the n26 app or our web app. from the home screen choose the actions tab,

enter the recipient‚Äôs name and iban and select continue,

here you can also schedule the date of your transfer and save it as a standing order,
press send and confirm with your confirmation pin. you‚Äôll then need to either confirm or cancel the transfer via push notification in the app from your paired device. once the transfer was confirmed in the mobile app, we can‚Äôt reverse it or change the recipient‚Äôs details. if you cannot confirm your debit transfer within the app you need to: ensure that you have a stable internet connection.ensure that your mobile phone has push notifications enabled. this is done through the phone settings, not in our app.ensure that you use your paired device. once your debit transfer is sent you‚Äôll be able to download a pdf confirmation of it. to do so: go to your transactions list.
locate and select the specific debit transfer.
scroll down to the transaction information and tap pdf by selecting transfer confirmation.

question: how to declare my n26 account for my taxes in france?
answer: (applies to all french residents) according to the french general tax code, all french residents are required to declare any bank accounts they have opened, used, or closed within the year of declaring an income. this includes your n26 bank account. to do this: in your tax return, check the box foreign account opened, used or closed (8uu) (compte √©tranger ouvert, utilis√© ou ferm√©).complete the cerfa n¬∞ 3916(new tab) form and attach it to your tax return.

answer: consejos y sugerencias para una transacci√≥n exitosa: si no puedes confirmar la transacci√≥n mediante la notificaci√≥n push en 5 minutos, simplemente empieza de nuevo el proceso de pago en la p√°gina web del comerciante.si no recibes el mensaje push, aseg√∫rate de que tu smartphone est√© vinculado y los mensajes push est√°n activados en los ajustes.comprueba tambi√©n que los pagos m√≥viles y los pagos en el extranjero est√°n activados en los ajustes de tu tarjeta.requiere buena conexi√≥n a internet. prueba cambiando de wifi a 3g/4g o viceversa.si utilizas un dispositivo ios, aseg√∫rate de que el modo no molestar est√° desactivado.si el importe que muestra la p√°gina del comerciante es diferente del que se muestra en el mensaje push, puede ser debido al tipo de cambio de una divisa diferente a euros.aseg√∫rate tambi√©n de desactivar los adblokers que se ejecuten en tu navegador.

question: do i need to declare my n26 account?
answer: n26 is a german bank operating in italy through an italian branch since 26th march 2020 in order to offer its customers an account with an italian iban. therefore, if you opened an n26 account after 26th march 2020 and reside in italy, you‚Äôre the holder of an italian n26 account and won‚Äôt need to submit any particular tax declaration.  please note that: if you‚Äôve an annual average account balance of ‚Ç¨5,000 or above, and are subject to the ordinary stamp duty on your statements, we‚Äôll automatically debit your account to the extent required by law. alternatively, it will be at our expense according to any existing promotions. in addition to this, your account remains protected by the german deposit protection fund up to ‚Ç¨100,000.  if you opened an n26 account before 26th march 2020 with an italian address, your account is considered a foreign account. opening an account abroad is entirely legal‚Äîyou  simply need to comply with the regulations of your country of residence and the country where the account is held. for individuals residing in italy, foreign accounts with an average annual balance of ‚Ç¨5,000 or above must be declared to the italian tax authorities. it‚Äôll be necessary to fill out the dedicated rw section of the tax return form and pay vat, a fixed amount of ‚Ç¨34.20. if your balance exceeds ‚Ç¨15,000 even for just one day during the year, in addition to paying vat, you‚Äôll need to fill out the rw section of the tax return form for the purposes of tax monitoring as required by law no.186/2014.  for more detailed and personalized information, please refer to a tax expert. please note that the italian tax authorities have the possibility to identify undeclared foreign current accounts and to trace the relevant transactions back to the holder (directive 2011/16/eu).

question: how to change my card limits?

question: bin ich in den usa steuerpflichtig?
answer: als lizenzierte bank sind wir gem√§√ü fatca verpflichtet, dem ‚Äúinternal revenue service‚Äù (irs) alle konten zu melden, die von personen gef√ºhrt werden, die in den usa steuerpflichtig sind. dieses gesetz wurde vom amerikanischen finanzministerium verabschiedet, um eine bessere einhaltung von steuervorschriften zu erreichen. so soll verhindert werden, dass amerikanische staatsangeh√∂rige ausl√§ndische banken und andere finanzinstitute dazu verwenden, steuern auf ihr einkommen und kapital zu vermeiden.  mehr informationen zu fatca findest du hier.(neuen tab) laut fatca ist ein amerikanischer staatsangeh√∂riger unter anderem so definiert: staatsangeh√∂riger der usa (auch bei doppelter staatsangeh√∂rigkeit)einwohner der usa, beispielsweise inhaber einer g√ºltigen u.s. greencard oder person, die den ‚Äúsubstantial presence test‚Äù erf√ºllt (siehe unten). falls du dir nicht sicher bist, ob du ein amerikanischer staatsangeh√∂riger bist, wende dich bitte an einen steuerberater. ‚Äúsubstantial presence test‚Äù bedeutet: du warst im aktuellen kalenderjahr 183 oder mehr tage in den usa physisch anwesend. oder du warst innerhalb der letzten 3 kalenderjahre 183 tage in den usa physisch anwesend. (31 tage oder mehr im aktuellen kalenderjahr) + (anzahl der tage, die du im letzten jahr in den usa physisch anwesend warst) geteilt durch 3 + (anzahl der tage, die du im vorletzten jahr in den usa physisch anwesend warst) geteilt durch 6.  dar√ºber hinaus auch, wenn dein konto die diese angaben enth√§lt: us-amerikanische staatsangeh√∂rigkeit oder wohnsitz in den usageburtsort in den usapostanschrift oder postfach in den usaus-amerikanische rufnummerdauerauftr√§ge an eine us-amerikanischen adresse oder ein konto, das in den usa verwaltet wird f√ºr den fall, dass wir folgende dokumente nicht von dir erhalten, sind wir weiterhin dazu verpflichtet, dich als us staatsangeh√∂rigen anzusehen: ein w-8ben formular oder eine √§hnliche eigenerkl√§rung undeinen nicht us-amerikanischen pass oder einen anderen regierungsamtlichen ausweis, der deine staatsangeh√∂rigkeit oder nationalit√§t eines anderen landes als den usa nachweist.falls du in den usa geboren bist, eine kopie der best√§tigung √ºber den verlust deiner staatsb√ºrgerschaft.

question: n26 forms

question: how to top up my account?
answer: once you are successfully verified, you‚Äôll be able to top up your account in several ways. to do so, simply go to the n26 app and select ‚Äôadd money‚Äô to see the available options: 1. sepa transfer (up to 2 business days): the transfer must be in eur and within the sepa zone.you will need to provide your iban and your name as it is written on the id you used to create your account.if you have a business account, please keep in mind that we do not accept company names. 2. debit or credit card (instant): you can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 150‚Ç¨.the first deposit is free. the following deposits charge a fee of 3% of the deposit amount.simply enter the card details from the sending account. please note, prepaid cards and american express credit cards are not accepted. 3. apple pay or google pay (instant): you can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 150‚Ç¨.the first deposit is free. the following deposits charge a fee of 3% of the deposit amount.simply enter the card details (credit or debit) linked to the apple pay or google pay account. please note, prepaid cards and american express credit cards are not accepted. 4. moneybeam (instant): you can receive money from other n26 users. 5. cash26 (instant): available in germany, austria and italy.deposit cash through our partner stores once your card is activated and with your paired device.

question: how to earn money by inviting friends to n26?
answer: you can start inviting friends as soon as you have access to your account (in the app or the web app(new tab)). to know the amount you can get per referral, simply access the refer friends section: log into the n26 app.from the home screen, go to the explore tab (mobile app) or my account üë§ (n26 web app).select refer friends.tap on your referral code to copy it and select one of the options available for sharing.optionally, you can write a message to your friend or use the default. tap send! to receive your reward your friend must meet all our requirements: complete their sign up using your referral link or personal code.activate their mastercard.complete a first mastercard transaction worth at least the value of the referral reward (in-store, online or atm). once your friend has fulfilled the requirements, you‚Äôll receive the bonus within 60 days. you can check the status of your referral bonus in the mobile app or n26 web. in total,  you can get up to ‚Ç¨1500 out of referrals. if your referral bonus hasn‚Äôt arrived yet, we‚Äôve also collected a few reasons why. *the link does not expire and it can be used at any time. personal invite codes and links should only be used for personal and non-commercial purposes. this means you can share your invite link with your personal connections via social media as long as you are the primary content owner. n26 has the right to cancel the referral program at any time. currently, friend referral rewards are only available for customers in germany, austria, italy, france, spain, belgium, luxembourg, greece, portugal, ireland, the netherlands, finland, estonia, slovakia, slovenia, sweden, switzerland, norway, denmark, poland, iceland and liechtenstein. you can find more information in the refer a friend program t&cs(new tab).

question: what are ‚Äúmessages from n26‚Äù ?
answer: the security of your personal data is our priority. that‚Äôs why we created an inbox in the n26 app that allows us to share any communication. any content that includes personal data is communicated in messages from n26. we‚Äôll still use your email address to communicate general information. personal data is any information that relates to you as a person and identifies or could possibly identify you. it could be your account details, your address (email or postal), id documents, proof of residence, but also the notification about your accrued overdraft interest or your monthly standing order. when we send you a message to message from n26, you‚Äôll receive a push notification on your paired smartphone and an email to your registered email address. once connected to the webapp, you‚Äôll also be notified by an info card of any new messages. we‚Äôll send you a message that you can find in your messages from n26, and ask that you reply directly from there. this feature is available from both the n26 app and the webapp under my account -> support -> messages from n26. make sure you downloaded the latest app version.  you can‚Äôt initiate a conversation, but you‚Äôll be able to reply as soon as we send you the first message. if you need to provide us with a document, simply select add attachment. please make sure that the total file size of your attachments per message doesn‚Äôt exceed 25mb.    messages from n26 doesn‚Äôt replace our chat and you can still send us an email. if you need to get in touch with us first, visit our page how to contact n26? if we need to verify you, we‚Äôll ask you to open a chat with us.

question: how to top up by card, apple pay, and google pay
answer:
you can now add money by using a debit or credit card as well as apple or google pay. this is the fastest and easiest way to fund your n26 account. 
  adding money with a debit or credit card open your n26 app and navigate to the actions tabjust tap ‚Äúadd money‚Äù and select ‚Äúcard transfer‚Äùchoose an amount and enter your name on card, card number, expiration date and cvc (we never store your card information)follow the steps to confirm the paymentthe money is available on your account instantly   adding money with a apple or google pay open your n26 app and navigate to the actions tabjust tap ‚Äúadd money‚Äù and select ‚Äúapple pay‚Äù or ‚Äúgoogle pay‚Äùchoose an amount follow the steps to confirm the paymentthe money is available on your account instantly
 accepted cards:  debit cards.credit cards (except america express).prepaid cards (only for customers with italian terms & conditions). to find out more about the difference between debit, credit and prepaid cards read this article(new tab).
 cost:
whilst this is the fastest and easiest way to instantly add funds in your n26 account, for us, processing these instant top-up transactions is more expensive than other account funding methods(new tab) we offer.
 for both methods, the first deposit is always free but extra deposits are charged a fee of 3% of the deposit amount. by charging a card or digital wallet, your money is not sent to n26 instantly, and the fee covers additional costs associated with funding accounts before the money is received so that it is instantly available for your use.

question: can i open an account if i live outside the eurozone?
answer: if you live in poland, sweden, denmark, norway, liechtenstein, switzerland or iceland you may open an account with us. we offer: the choice between a standard bank account or n26 business.accounts in ‚Ç¨, a german iban, and transfers with sepa or moneybeam.good currency conversion with your mastercard debit card.free shipping of your mastercard or ‚Ç¨25 for express.foreign currency transfers with transferwise (with the standard account).3 to 5* free atm withdrawals in ‚Ç¨ in the eu (1.7% markup on foreign currencies withdrawals).0.1% cashback on all card payments (for business accounts).2 spaces in addition to the main account.a bonus for every friend you successfully invite to n26 with our refer a friend program.contactless payment with google pay and apple pay. tips for incoming and outgoing transfers: we recommend choosing your local currency to get the best exchange rate when using your mastercard for purchases or to withdraw cash (if not, additional fees may apply).to top up your account using your local currency, we recommend converting your currency via sepa transfer either using transferwise (on their website(new tab)) or using your local bank.for outgoing transfers to ‚Ç¨ accounts, simply use the app‚Äôs internal sepa transfer. for outgoing transfers to non-‚Ç¨ accounts, use transferwise in the app.* *please note: transferwise is unavailable for n26 business accounts (only sepa transfers in eur).

question: all about allpoint
answer:
we have partnered with the allpoint atm network to provide you with unlimited free atm withdrawals at over 55,000 locations across the us, canada, puerto rico, australia, mexico, and the uk. with access to an expansive retail network including target, walgreens, cvs, speedway, and kroger, you‚Äôll never need to pay to withdraw cash again!  you can quickly and easily find allpoint atms via the atm map feature in our mobile application for ios and android (see related topics below for more information). not on your smartphone? no problem, you can also find nearby allpoint atms using the web application(new tab). can‚Äôt find a convenient allpoint atm near you? no problem. enjoy 2 free atm withdrawals per month from any network, anytime, anywhere in the us.  (note: at this time, n26 customers can only use atms to withdraw cash, not to make deposits. check back here for updates.) related topics "will there be an in-app allpoint atm locator?" yes! we are very excited to announce that we have an atm map
feature in our mobile application. this easy-to-use application will make
finding your nearest fee-free allpoint atm quick and convenient. here‚Äôs how to
use it: 1. on the home screen, tap on the "actions" icon. 2. tap on the "find an atm" button under the "atm map" menu. 3. if prompted, allow the application to access your location. without access to your location, the application will not be able to show you the nearest atms. 4. tapping on any of the nearby atms (indicated by green locator pins) will bring up more information about that atm location, including the address. tap on "get directions" and choose your favorite routing application to be given directions to the atm location.  5. moving to another area of the map will bring up the "search this area" button, which will allow you to see other nearby atms in the new location. 6. tap on the information icon (the "i" in a circle at the top-right corner of the screen) to get more details about allpoint atms, participating retail locations, and a reminder that you get two fee-free cash withdrawals per month from any out-of-network atms in the us.  "do atm fees apply when withdrawing from an allpoint atm?" nope! atm fees do not apply when withdrawing from an allpoint atm in the us, uk, canada, mexico, or australia. standard atm fees apply when used in other countries, however. "what will the transaction look like in the app?" allpoint atm transactions will look the same as any other atm transaction in the n26 mobile app or website. "when i withdraw money from an allpoint atm, does a fee display on the atm screen during the transaction?"  yes, a fee will display on the atm screen. you should accept the fee, but the fee will not be charged to your n26 account! "is allpoint available outside of the us?"  yes! there are over 55,000 allpoint locations across the us, canada, puerto rico, australia, mexico, and the uk. "if i used an allpoint atm before allpoint partnered with n26, will the atm fees that i incurred be reimbursed?" we regret that we cannot retroactively refund any atm usage fees. "will the allpoint transactions be included in the two free transactions per month?" nope! when an allpoint atm is accessed in the us, uk, canada, mexico, and australia, you are not charged a fee. it is not counted as part of your two free atm transactions per month! "can i check my balance at an allpoint atm?" yes! you can check your n26 account balance at an allpoint atm. "can i withdraw money from my spaces account using an allpoint atm?" account withdrawals can only be made from your main n26 account. spaces is a sub-account. if you want to withdraw money that you‚Äôve set aside in spaces, please move it into your main account first. "can i make a deposit to my n26 account at an allpoint atm?" at this time, you can only withdraw cash from an allpoint atm. no cash or check deposits can be made.

question: how to create and manage standing orders?
answer: when setting up an outgoing transfer in either the n26 app or web app you‚Äôll have the option to make it a standing order. once you complete the outgoing transfer you‚Äôll then be prompted to tick a box which will create a standing order. after you‚Äôve inputted the amount of the transfer and its recipient, under the reference text field select "want to save this as a standing order?". from here you‚Äôll be able to set the start/end dates of the standing order and choose its payment intervals. to view your scheduled transfers and standing orders directly in the mobile app: go to your transaction list (the main screen).then tap on the 3 dots located in the upper right corner for android and on the top of the transaction list for ios. a small window will pop, where you will be able to select "standing orders". here you can cancel and/or modify the details of your standing order. to cancel it just tap the standing order you wish to delete and tap the trash icon in the top right-hand corner. ‚ÑπÔ∏è  please note, if a standing order fails due to insufficient funds we won‚Äôt attempt the transfer again - you‚Äôll need to manually send the transfer, however the next scheduled transfers will proceed as normal.

question: where does n26 invest my money?
answer: we strive to provide our clients‚Äô deposits for loans to our customers (provided that they have the appropriate credit rating). for the liquidity not required in the customer business, our investment strategy is low in risk. we invest our customers‚Äô money at short notice with the deutsche bundesbank and other european banks in the eurozone with only good risk classes. and we refinance public-law customers mainly in germany (cities and municipalities) and invest in euro government bonds. we‚Äôre not a trading book institute. that is: we do not trade for short-term profit. and we don‚Äôt engage in speculation, whether on food, foreign exchange, bitcoins or other asset classes.

question: ¬øqu√© pasa si tengo un saldo negativo?
answer: el balance de tu cuenta puede ser negativo siempre y cuando est√©s dentro de tu l√≠mite de descubierto (disponible solo en alemania y austria). si no, recibir√°s un email para notificarte que has sobrepasado tu l√≠mite de descubierto autorizado, lo que significa que no tienes fondos suficientes en tu cuenta n26 para hacer frente a futuros cargos. incluso si no has usado tu cuenta n26 desde que la abriste, hay algunos cargos que podr√≠an aplicar (como la cuota mensual de n26 you o n26 metal, o los costes del env√≠o expr√©s) y dejar√≠an como resultado un saldo negativo. en el caso de quedarte con saldo negativo, se cargar√° a tu cuenta un inter√©s del 7,5% de forma cuatrimestral. en ese caso, tendr√≠as que ingresar dinero en tu cuenta n26 desde otra cuenta bancaria mediante una transferencia sepa. para hacer una transferencia puedes encontrar tu iban en la app de n26. recuerda que si la haces desde una cuenta de otro pa√≠s, tendr√°s que hacerla como una transferencia internacional, ya que somos un banco alem√°n. tu cuenta seguir√° estando activa durante los pr√≥ximos 60 d√≠as sin pagar. a partir de ah√≠: recibir√°s dos recordatorios m√°s, que costar√°n 3‚Ç¨ cada uno.si tienes una cuenta premium, las ventajas se cancelar√°n tras 60 d√≠as y tu cuenta se convertir√° en cuenta est√°ndar.si no haces nada al respecto, podremos cerrar tu cuenta tras 60 d√≠as.

question: chi sono le persone politicamente esposte?
answer:
le persone politicamente esposte sono persone fisiche che occupano o hanno cessato di occupare da meno di un anno importanti cariche pubbliche. sono da includere in questa categoria anche i loro familiari e le persone con le quali intrattengono stretti legami d‚Äôaffari. per persone fisiche che occupano o hanno cessato di occupare da meno di un anno importanti cariche pubbliche si intendono: presidente della repubblica, presidente del consiglio, ministro, vice-ministro e sottosegretario, presidente di regione, assessore regionale, sindaco di capoluogo di provincia o citt√† metropolitana, sindaco di comune con popolazione non inferiore a 15.000 abitanti e cariche analoghe in stati esteri;deputato, senatore, parlamentare europeo, consigliere regionale e cariche analoghe in stati esteri;membro degli organi direttivi centrali di partiti politici;giudice della corte costituzionale, magistrato della corte di cassazione o della corte dei conti, consigliere di stato, altri componenti del consiglio di giustizia amministrativa per la regione siciliana e cariche analoghe in stati esteri;membro degli organi direttivi delle banche centrali e delle autorit√† indipendenti;ambasciatore, incaricato d‚Äôaffari e cariche equivalenti in stati esteri, ufficiale di grado apicale delle forze armate e cariche analoghe in stati esteri;componente degli organi di amministrazione, direzione o controllo delle imprese controllate, anche indirettamente, dallo stato italiano o da uno stato estero o controllate, in misura prevalente o totalitaria, dalle regioni, da comuni capoluoghi di provincia e citta‚Äô metropolitane e da comuni con popolazione complessivamente non inferiore a 15.000 abitanti;direttore generale di asl e di azienda ospedaliera, di azienda ospedaliera universitaria e degli altri enti del servizio sanitario nazionale.direttore, vicedirettore e membro dell‚Äôorgano di gestione o soggetto svolgenti funzioni equivalenti in organizzazioni internazionali; vengono identificati come familiari di persone politicamente esposte:  i genitori; il coniuge o la persona legata in unione civile o convivenza di fatto;i figli e i loro coniugi e le persone legate ai figli in unione civile o convivenza di fatto. 
i soggetti con i quali le pep intrattengono notoriamente stretti rapporti sono: le persone fisiche legate alla persona politicamente esposta per via della titolarit√† effettiva congiunta di enti giuridici o di altro stretto rapporto di affari;le persone fisiche che detengono solo formalmente il controllo totalitario di un‚Äôentit√† notoriamente costituita, di fatto, nell‚Äôinteresse e a beneficio di una persona politicamente esposta.

question: what to do if my account was hacked?
answer:
if you suspect possible fraudulent activity on your account, please contact us as soon as possible. our chat function is available in the app, on the n26 website(new tab), and at the end of some of our support center articles, such as this one. just click on start a chat.  if you‚Äôd rather speak on the phone, you can request this during the chat. we‚Äôll arrange a callback within the hour so we can discuss the matter further with you. once in contact with one of our agents, please thoroughly explain the situation to us.  every detail here is important.  
please be assured that we‚Äôll take all necessary measures to assist you in this situation.  in addition to our legal obligations for fraud prevention, and in order to continually improve our security safeguards, we have a dedicated team who analyzes each fraud case individually. the fraud cases themselves are often relatively complicated and have to be dealt with in detail. depending on the complexity, this can take a few days, but in some cases it can take several weeks. finally, if you have evidence or strong feelings that the account might have been hacked, we recommend that you file a police report as well. to learn more about how we protect your account in case of fraud, visit our blog article(new tab). visit our page about security at n26(new tab) to discover our commitment to protect your funds and your account. chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including sundays and bank holidays. if you do not have access to your n26 mobile app or your n26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in english) .

question: what are shared spaces?
answer: shared spaces is a new and easy way for n26 users to share money together. these spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative. shared spaces are available to n26 premium users (you / business you / metal), who can both create shared spaces and invite participants to their space. participants can be any n26 account holder regardless of their account type.the owner of the shared space owns the money inside it.the owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants for their space. similar to regular spaces, shared spaces have neither an iban nor a card attached to them.

question: how does spaces work?
answer: set goals, create and personalize spaces, and transfer money between them instantly. spaces is available in the mobile and webapp(new tab). in addition to your main account (or primary space), you can create and delete additional spaces as often as you‚Äôd like but the number of active spaces at any one time depends on your account type: 2 additional spaces with an n26 or n26 business account or up to 10 additional spaces with n26 you, n26 business you and n26 metal.your primary account statements will include all transactions sent to a space or received from one. you can download balance statements from the confirmation page.only your primary space can be negative (if you are eligible for an overdraft). all other balances in spaces cannot be negative, meaning you can only transfer what is available in a particular space.you can only use the balance from your primary space toward your mastercard transactions. so consider transferring money before making a purchase if needed.move money from one space to another by holding down on your main account and dragging and dropping into your space. once the amount is confirmed the balance is updated right away.you can lock and unlock a space at anytime from your mobile and web app. you‚Äôll only need to confirm with your confirmation pin. if a space is locked, you‚Äôll still be able to transfer money to it. if you need to withdraw money from a locked space, you need first to unlock it.you‚Äôll be able to hide the amount within the space from your account‚Äôs total balance. just go into your space, tap the three dots in the top right corner and select ‚Äòhide space balance‚Äô. spaces includes a feature called rules which will help you manage your time and your finances effectively. want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to n26. learn more about our refer a friend program.

question: shared spaces - trusted beneficiary
answer: a trusted beneficiary of a shared space can: transfer money from their own spaces (including other shared spaces of which they are a participant) to a shared space. access and freely transfer the funds of a shared space at any time.leave a shared space at any time. transfers between a trusted beneficiary and a shared space do not need to be authenticated via pin and push notification. this means that beneficiaries can seamlessly drag-and-drop money via the n26 app and web app similarity to how normal space transactions work. european banking law regulates how bank transfers must be authorised.  in this law strong customer authentication (sca) is a requirement to make online payments more secure.  one exception to this is the classification of a person in a shared space as a ‚Äútrusted beneficiary‚Äù so that transfers to this person do not require sca. learn more

question: custom audiences
answer: data processing in the framework of facebook custom audiences custom audiences allows us to exclude you, as an existing n26 customer, from our advertisements. we do not want to display irrelevant ads to you. furthermore, it allows us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other facebook users. these so called ‚Äúlookalike-audiences‚Äù are more similar to our customers than the average facebook user.  in order to profit from the benefits as described above we provide a hashed version of your n26 email address to facebook. the so-called ‚Äúhashing‚Äù is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. facebook then matches this email address against your potential facebook email address. after the matching, regardless of whether it was successful or not, any hashed email addresses are deleted within 6-8 hours by facebook. facebook does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. you can find this and further information in the terms of facebook custom audiences(new tab). you can revoke your consent according to art. 6 para. 1 lit. a gdpr to this data processing in the n26 web app at any time.

question: why didn't an atm give me cash?
answer: it happens: you go to an atm doesn‚Äôt give you cash and, and in some cases, the amount is still deducted from your account. first, check your card limits in your card settings and make sure atm withdrawals are active.make sure that you personal limits are set higher than the amount you want to withdraw.please be aware that you can only withdraw as many funds as you have deposited on your account. otherwise, if you don‚Äôt have an overdraft, the withdrawal will be rejected.the fixed maximum daily (24 hours rolling) limit for withdrawals is 2500‚Ç¨. some atms have their own limits in place, so it can happen that you can‚Äôt withdraw your daily limit at once. if you didn‚Äôt receive cash from the atm, but the amount was still charged from your account, we‚Äôre happy to help you: the amount that was deducted from your balance is only an authorization, meaning that the amount is blocked or reserved to be debited by the merchant. when the merchant debits the amount, it‚Äôs called a settlement of the transaction. if your transaction was not successful the authorization normally expires within a matter of hours - or a maximum of 12 working days - and is then automatically credited to your account again. only in case the transaction has been settled we can charge back the amount from the merchant. you can see whether a transaction has been settled when it appears on your downloadable monthly statement (not only in your transaction list in the app). this means: if the amount appears on your monthly statement and/or hasn‚Äôt been credited back to your account after 12 working days, you can file a chargeback with us. in the meantime, we suggest you try another atm from a different operator. this rarely happens twice in a row.

question: how to get my money back in case of fraud?
answer: if you don‚Äôt recognize a transaction or you‚Äôre sure you didn‚Äôt authorize it, blocking your card won‚Äôt be enough. in these cases you should immediately: request new card(new tab) and indicate that the old one has been stolen. please tear up the card by cutting it with scissors, for example. both the chip, the nfc antenna and the magnetic stripe must be cut into pieces.then fill out the dispute form(new tab). from there we will do everything we can to get your money back. you can continue using your account for bank transfers until your new card arrives. if you‚Äôre in germany or austria, you can also use cash26 for cash withdrawals. you should keep in mind that changes in the final amount debited from your account don‚Äôt necessarily indicate fraud.

question: how to top up by card, apple pay, and google pay
answer:
you can now add money by using a debit or credit card as well as apple or google pay. this is the fastest and easiest way to fund your n26 account. 
  adding money with a debit or credit card open your n26 app and navigate to the actions tabjust tap ‚Äúadd money‚Äù and select ‚Äúcard transfer‚Äùchoose an amount and enter your name on card, card number, expiration date and cvc (we never store your card information)follow the steps to confirm the paymentthe money is available on your account instantly   adding money with a apple or google pay open your n26 app and navigate to the actions tabjust tap ‚Äúadd money‚Äù and select ‚Äúapple pay‚Äù or ‚Äúgoogle pay‚Äùchoose an amount follow the steps to confirm the paymentthe money is available on your account instantly
 accepted cards:  debit cards.credit cards (except america express).prepaid cards (only for customers with italian terms & conditions). to find out more about the difference between debit, credit and prepaid cards read this article(new tab).
 cost:
whilst this is the fastest and easiest way to instantly add funds in your n26 account, for us, processing these instant top-up transactions is more expensive than other account funding methods(new tab) we offer.
 for both methods, the first deposit is always free but extra deposits are charged a fee of 3% of the deposit amount. by charging a card or digital wallet, your money is not sent to n26 instantly, and the fee covers additional costs associated with funding accounts before the money is received so that it is instantly available for your use.

question: how long do transfers take?
answer: all incoming ach payments are completed within one banking day. due to the opening times of the participating banks, one banking day may stretch over two working days. if your incoming transfer is outside of these estimated time frames, please contact the sender (bank) for a payment investigation as we cannot track incoming transfers. related topics "why hasn‚Äôt my money arrived?" there are a few reasons why this may have happened. please double check with the payment sender that the correct account and routing number were used. ensure that the payment sender put your correct name as it is written on your id. a correct account and routing number are not sufficient.

question: why can‚Äôt i see other n26 users on moneybeam?
answer: to carry out real-time transactions such as moneybeams, n26 checks your smartphone‚Äôs contact list and finds other n26 users based on saved phone numbers or emails. you can also enter someone‚Äôs contact details manually to send them a moneybeam. if you don‚Äôt see your friend‚Äôs name on moneybeam but you know they‚Äôre an n26 user, they most likely haven‚Äôt made themselves visible. indeed you can manage your visibility as an n26 user. most moneybeam transfers that fail between n26 users happen because there are multiple phone numbers or emails listed in the contact entry of a phone‚Äôs address book. to avoid this, make sure you have the email and phone number your friend uses in your phone book in order to send them moneybeams. if the contact details you have stored don‚Äôt match, you cannot send a moneybeam to your friend. want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to n26. learn more about our refer a friend program.

question: how to protect my identity?
answer: to protect and help avoid the misuse of your personal data, please keep in mind that: we will never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. this includes verifications for apartment rental contracts, lines of credit, or job offers (including jobs with n26). only complete the verification process if you want to open an n26 bank account for yourself.as the account owner, only you should create and have access to your login details. never create an n26 bank account with a predefined email address and password. if you use login credentials that were given to you, these credentials may be used to reach your personal and legal information. also, never log into an n26 account that is not yours.do not send your id or passport to unknown or unverified recipients.we may ask for certain documents when your transaction is subject to a routine check. only send valid documentation to verified n26 email accounts.we will never ask for your username, password, or pin codes outside the n26 app. never provide this information in an external website or app, even if it looks n26-related. if you ever feel in doubt, have received a suspicious request from a third party, or think your n26 login may be compromised, please do not hesitate to contact us.

question: why did my sepa transfer fail?
answer: we accept transfers in eur done via sepa. we don‚Äôt support swift so if you need to make a foreign currency transfer, please use transferwise (in the app or from their website(new tab)). to get a transfer, you‚Äôll only need to provide the sender with your full name (as it‚Äôs written on the id you provided for verification) and your iban. you can find your iban on your balance statements and in üë§ my account (in the mobile app or webapp(new tab)). common reasons for failed transfers: the recipient‚Äôs name on the transfer order is different from the name on their account (must be their name as written on their id).the recipient‚Äôs name is a company name instead of a personal/account name (applies to n26 business).the iban is incorrect.you‚Äôre not receiving the push message to confirm your transfer.an inappropriate use was found. n26 has the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see gwg ¬ß 10(new tab)). as a result, we may ask for documentation to verify the origin or source of these transactions. this can result in the credit being delayed or not taking place.

question: why is n26 secure?
answer: to protect your account, we use a three-layered security architecture: secure login. your login details of both the mobile and webapp(new tab) consist of a username and password or fingerprint/face recognition (depending on your smartphone). please choose a secure password and don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone.confirmation pin. this 4-digit code is required every time you make a transfer or connect/disconnect your phone. you first set it up once you have successfully connected your smartphone to your account. you can then change it in the app yourself after that.push messages. for every incoming and outgoing payment, a push message will be sent to your connected smartphone. it‚Äôs also used to confirm and finalize your transactions. we‚Äôve also added 3d secure to protect you from online card fraud. every time you contact us we‚Äôll ask you some security questions to make sure it‚Äôs really you. but we‚Äôll never ask for your debit card number, card verification code (cvv), password, or your card or confirmation pins. we‚Äôve also taken steps to protect your data: we store as little information about you as possible, only for as long as we are legally obligated to, and we delete data when it is no longer required for a product or service. you can download your personal data up to 6 months after you close your account. find more information in our privacy policy(new tab).

question: how to log in with two factor authentication?

account, but with two-factor authentication you‚Äôll need either confirmation from a paired device or an sms code. go here for more information on two-factor authentication when you log into your n26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you‚Äôll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or, if this isn‚Äôt possible, you can request an sms code to be sent to your registered number, confirming your login attempt. this ensures that only you can log in to your n26 account. when you log into your n26 account from your paired device, two-factor authentication is already in motion. this means the process of logging into your n26 account from your paired device stays the same. first, you‚Äôll need to update your phone‚Äôs operating system and the n26 app to their latest versions. if you‚Äôre unable to login to your account, but still have access to your registered email address, try to reset your password. if you don‚Äôt have access to your registered email address, please contact us via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out. read more in our article on how to create a password. if you‚Äôve lost access to your paired device, but you still have access to your registered phone number, you‚Äôll be able to log into your n26 account and request an authentication code. to do this: login to the webappwhen prompted to confirm your login on your paired device, select helpchoose send sms codeonce you receive the sms code, input it into the webapp as you‚Äôve just confirmed the authentication code you‚Äôve successfully completed two-factor authentication, and can now pair your new device with your account. if you don‚Äôt have access to your registered phone number ‚Äì either because you have a new phone number, or your phone was lost or stolen ‚Äì please contact our customer service via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out. if you have an older smartphone that doesn‚Äôt support the latest app version, you won‚Äôt be able to access n26 via the mobile app anymore using that phone.  however, you can still use our webapp to view your account, to do this you‚Äôll need to confirm your login attempt via an sms verification code which we‚Äôll send to your account‚Äôs registered phone number. you‚Äôll still be able to complete card transactions and cash withdrawals as normal using your mastercard, but bear in mind that you won‚Äôt be able to perform any bank transfers or payments until you can confirm the transfer within the n26 app. read more in our article on strong customer authentification.

question: why do i pay the church tax?
answer: we‚Äôre legally required to request data relating to church tax deductions and to make the deductions where applicable. this happens every year from september 1st to october 31st. you‚Äôre entitled to appeal against the passing of information about your religious affiliation through an erkl√§rung zum sperrvermerk(new tab) form. you can do this before june 30th each year. if you file an objection, your local tax office will request that you submit a church tax declaration yourself. further information is available on the website of the german federal central office for taxation(new tab).

question: how does n26 protect my money?
