question: how to cancel my n26 you or n26 metal membership?
answer: n26 you(new tab) or n26 metal(new tab) contracts have a term of one year. this contract automatically renews for another year unless you cancel it.  in this article you will find the difference between revocation, cancellation of the membership and cancellation of the renewal of your membership. you have 3 options: revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation periodcancel your membership at any time up to 1 month before your contract endsstop your membership‚Äôs renewal up to 1 month before it expires find in details how to do so below.  revocation you can revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period. simply open a chat with us and we‚Äôll assist you from there. keep in mind that if you cancel your contract before it ends, you won‚Äôt be able to sign up for the same membership plan in the future. cancel your membership at any time* if you want to terminate your membership at any time up to *1 month before your contract ends and after the 14-day revocation period, please contact us. if you choose this option all your n26 you or n26 metal benefits will end, which includes your insurance coverage. stop the renewal of your membership  you have up to 4 weeks before your membership expires to cancel the renewal of your n26 you or n26 metal membership. to do so: log into the mobile app and go to üë§ my accountselect n26 you/metaltap membership details followed by cancel membership you can also see your membership expiration date hereconfirm the cancellation via the push message we send you you can continue to use your n26 you or n26 metal mastercard fully until your membership expires. that means you‚Äôll keep your insurance coverage as long as you‚Äôre still required to pay your membership fee. after that, your mastercard will work like a standard card without the benefits. we‚Äôll send you a standard card before your contract ends. no need to contact us about it. we‚Äôll notify you of the renewal via email 8 weeks before your anniversary date. if you want to definitely close your account, visit our article how to close my n26 account.

question: how do contactless payments work?
answer: it‚Äôs not possible to deactivate contactless payments. if you‚Äôre experiencing issues with your contactless payments, keep in mind that:   to activate contactless payments, you must first use your card at an atm or payment terminal. transactions up to ‚Ç¨50 don‚Äôt require a card pin*. for amounts over ‚Ç¨50, you‚Äôll need to enter your card pin.  *if the merchant‚Äôs payment system supports this option. make sure your card is held directly onto an nfc-compatible payment terminal. if you remove your card too fast or didn‚Äôt hold it close enough, just try again. n26 metal cards only have nfc on the back side of the card. make sure to hold the back side of the card against the terminal to use nfc (using the front won‚Äôt work). if contactless is not working, please always try to use the chip and pin method to complete your payment.

question: where does n26 invest my money?
answer: we strive to provide our clients‚Äô deposits for loans to our customers (provided that they have the appropriate credit rating). for the liquidity not required in the customer business, our investment strategy is low in risk. we invest our customers‚Äô money at short notice with the deutsche bundesbank and other european banks in the eurozone with only good risk classes. and we refinance public-law customers mainly in germany (cities and municipalities) and invest in euro government bonds. we‚Äôre not a trading book institute. that is: we do not trade for short-term profit. and we don‚Äôt engage in speculation, whether on food, foreign exchange, bitcoins or other asset classes.

question: shared spaces - trusted beneficiary
answer: a trusted beneficiary of a shared space can: transfer money from their own spaces (including other shared spaces of which they are a participant) to a shared space. access and freely transfer the funds of a shared space at any time.leave a shared space at any time. transfers between a trusted beneficiary and a shared space do not need to be authenticated via pin and push notification. this means that beneficiaries can seamlessly drag-and-drop money via the n26 app and web app similarity to how normal space transactions work. european banking law regulates how bank transfers must be authorised.  in this law strong customer authentication (sca) is a requirement to make online payments more secure.  one exception to this is the classification of a person in a shared space as a ‚Äútrusted beneficiary‚Äù so that transfers to this person do not require sca. learn more

question: how does spaces work?
answer: set goals, create and personalize spaces, and transfer money between them instantly. spaces is available in the mobile and webapp(new tab). in addition to your main account (or primary space), you can create and delete additional spaces as often as you‚Äôd like but the number of active spaces at any one time depends on your account type: 2 additional spaces with an n26 or n26 business account or up to 10 additional spaces with n26 you, n26 business you and n26 metal.your primary account statements will include all transactions sent to a space or received from one. you can download balance statements from the confirmation page.only your primary space can be negative (if you are eligible for an overdraft). all other balances in spaces cannot be negative, meaning you can only transfer what is available in a particular space.you can only use the balance from your primary space toward your mastercard transactions. so consider transferring money before making a purchase if needed.move money from one space to another by holding down on your main account and dragging and dropping into your space. once the amount is confirmed the balance is updated right away.you can lock and unlock a space at anytime from your mobile and web app. you‚Äôll only need to confirm with your confirmation pin. if a space is locked, you‚Äôll still be able to transfer money to it. if you need to withdraw money from a locked space, you need first to unlock it.you‚Äôll be able to hide the amount within the space from your account‚Äôs total balance. just go into your space, tap the three dots in the top right corner and select ‚Äòhide space balance‚Äô. spaces includes a feature called rules which will help you manage your time and your finances effectively. want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to n26. learn more about our refer a friend program.

question: espacios compartidos - ¬øqu√© es un poder notarial?
answer: el modelo legal que cumplen los espacios compartidos se llama poder notarial (kontovollmacht in german).  un espacio compartido no es lo mismo que una cuenta compartida en el sentido tradicional, donde cada persona es propietaria parcialmente del dinero de la cuenta. en el caso del espacio compartido, cuando los participantes reciben el poder notarial, obtienen el derecho de actuar en nombre del administrador, como por ejemplo para recibir y realizar transferencias.  la persona que autoriza a las dem√°s a actuar en su nombre es el administrador y es el √∫nico propietario de la cuenta. el administrador tiene que ser un usuario con cuenta de n26 premium (n26 you, n26 metal o n26 business you). esto significa, que el creador del espacio compartido es su due√±o legal.  el due√±o del espacio compartido:  - tiene posesi√≥n de todos los fondos dentro del espacio.  - puede transferir fondos a la cuenta o desde la cuenta siempre que los necesite.  - puede invitar a otros usuarios a su espacio compartido d√°ndoles poder notarial. - puede revocar el poder notarial del resto de los participantes siempre que quiera. - puede cerrar el espacio compartido (todos los fondos se transferir√°n a la cuenta principal del administrador). cuando se le concede poder notarial a una persona, esta tendr√° acceso a todo el dinero del espacio compartido. esto significa que cada participante enviar y recibir dinero en ese espacio compartido.  n26 bank gmbh no se hace responsable de los pagos cubiertos por el poder notarial.  m√°s sobre espacios compartidos

question: fatca - warum wir bestimmte informationen von dir ben√∂tigen
answer:
n26 ist als reguliertes finanzinstitut dazu verpflichtet, dem united states department of treasury sowie dem internal revenue service (irs) informationen √ºber kundenkonten von u.s. steuerzahlern oder ausl√§ndischen entit√§ten zur verf√ºgung zu stellen, die laut fatca f√ºr u.s. steuerzahler von erheblichem interesse sind. fatca steht f√ºr foreign account tax compliance act und ist ein gesetz zur bek√§mpfung von steuerhinterziehung. eingef√ºhrt vom irs erreicht fatca bessere steuerliche entsprechungen, indem er u.s. steuerzahler daran hindert, ausl√§ndische banken oder finanzinstitute daf√ºr zu nutzen, ihre verm√∂genswerte und einkommen der besteuerung zu entziehen. mehr √ºber fatca oder den irs erf√§hrst du auf: www.irs.gov. anders als die meisten l√§nder haben die vereinigten staaten ein steuersystem, das auch diejenigen us-staatsb√ºrger erfasst, deren wohnsitz nicht in den vereinigten staaten liegt. die meisten anderen l√§nder besteuern die weltweiten einkommen ihrer b√ºrger nur insofern, als letztere ihren wohnsitz im inland haben bzw. besteuern nicht diejenigen b√ºrger, die permanent im ausland leben und arbeiten. um zuverl√§ssig festzustellen, ob dein kundenkonto dem irs mitzuteilen ist, m√ºssen wir dir die folgenden 3 fragen stellen: hast du (auch) die us-amerikanische staatsangeh√∂rigkeit oder besitzt du eine green card?
bist du in den vereinigten staaten steuerpflichtig?
in den vereinigten staaten steuerpflichtig zu sein, hei√üt nicht ohne weiteres, dass du dort eine pers√∂nliche einkommensteuer zahlen musst. es bedeutet zun√§chst nur, dass du laut amerikanischem recht verpflichtet bist, eine steuererkl√§rung abgeben musst und dein (weltweites) einkommen dem irs angeben musst - selbst wenn du schlie√ülich keine steuern in den vereinigten staaten zahlen musst.
falls ja, wie lautet deine us-amerikanische steuer-identifikationsnummer (us-tin)?
als us-tin kannst du entweder deine us-sozialversicherungsnummer (ssn) oder deine us-steuer-identifikationsnummer (itin) benutzen. bitte beachte: falls in deinem konto eine amerikanische telefonnummer oder ein amerikanischer geburtsort registriert ist oder du einen dauerauftrag in die usa erstellst, haben wir nach fatca davon auszugehen, dass die in fatca festgelegten bestimmungen f√ºr dich geltung haben, bis du uns das gegenteil best√§tigst. falls sich deine lage ver√§ndert, kannst du deine steuerdaten jederzeit in deiner n26 app aktualisieren. logge dich dazu einfach in deine n26 app ein und gehe zu: 

mein konto > einstellungen > pers√∂nliche einstellungen > steuerdaten, und aktualisiere dort deine informationen.

question: was kann ich tun, wenn meine iban nicht akzeptiert wird?
answer: deine iban enth√§lt die de-l√§nderkennzahl, eine zweistellige pr√ºfnummer, die achtstellige bankleitzahl und deine zehnstellige kontonummer.  zum beispiel: de xx 10011001 26xxxxxxxx. die teilnehmenden l√§nder des sepa-raums (single euro payments area) haben sich auf das iban-system geeinigt, um nationale und internationale zahlungen zu vereinfachen und das fehlerrisiko bei der kommunikation und abwicklung von transaktionen zu reduzieren. h√§ndler oder arbeitgeber, die ibans aus anderen mitgliedstaaten des europ√§ischen wirtschaftsraums nicht akzeptieren, versto√üen ab 1. februar 2016 gegen europ√§isches recht (artikel 9 der verordnung nr. 260/2012(neuen tab)). wenn du jemals von einer iban-diskriminierung betroffen bist, wende dich bitte direkt an deine zust√§ndige nationale beh√∂rde(neuen tab) und informiere diese √ºber den vorfall. gib deine kontaktdaten sowie den namen des h√§ndlers oder unternehmens an, der deine iban nicht akzeptiert hat, und lege eine kurze beschreibung des vorfalls bei (einschlie√ülich eines screenshot der ablehnung oder einen anderen kommunikationsbeleg).

question: warum hat mir ein geldautomat kein bargeld ausgezahlt?
answer: es kann passieren: ein geldautomat zahlt dir kein bargeld aus und in manchen f√§llen wird dein konto trotzdem belastet. pr√ºfe zun√§chst deine kartenlimits in deinen karteneinstellungen und stelle sicher, dass bargeldabhebungen aktiviert sind. √ºberpr√ºfe auch, dass dein individuell einstellbares limit f√ºr bargeldabhebungen mindestens so hoch ist, wie der betrag, den du abheben wolltest. beachte, dass du nur soviel geld abheben kannst, wie du guthaben auf deinem konto hast. wenn du keinen dispokredit hast, wird die abhebung sonst abgelehnt.das maximal einstellbare tageslimit liegt bei 2500‚Ç¨ pro 24 stunden. dennoch haben viele automaten ihre eigene limits, sodass es vorkommen kann, dass du an einem automaten nicht dein ganzes tageslimit auf einmal abheben kannst. falls du vom automaten kein geld erhalten hast, aber dein konto trotzdem belastet wurde, helfen wir dir gerne weiter: der betrag, der von deinem guthaben abgezogen wurde, ist zun√§chst einmal nur eine autorisierung, d.h. eine reservierung oder ein gesperrter betrag. da die transaktion nicht erfolgreich war, verf√§llt dieser reservierte betrag normalerweise nach wenigen stunden - maximal 12 werktagen - und wird deinem konto wieder gutgeschrieben. nur wenn der betrag tats√§chlich abgebucht wird, k√∂nnen wir ihn reklamieren. der betrag gilt erst als abgebucht, wenn er auf deinen herunterladbaren kontoausz√ºgen erscheint, (nicht nur in der umsatzanzeige in der app). das bedeutet: wenn der betrag auf deinen herunterladbaren kontoausz√ºgen erscheint und/oder nach 12 werktagen noch nicht deinem konto wieder gutgeschrieben wird, helfen wir dir gerne dabei, den betrag zu reklamieren. bis dahin empfehlen wir dir, es mit einem geldautomaten eines anderen geldinstituts zu versuchen. es ist sehr selten, dass auszahlungen zweimal hintereinander fehlschlagen.

question: shared spaces - trusted beneficiary
answer: a trusted beneficiary of a shared space can: transfer money from their own spaces (including other shared spaces of which they are a participant) to a shared space. access and freely transfer the funds of a shared space at any time.leave a shared space at any time. transfers between a trusted beneficiary and a shared space do not need to be authenticated via pin and push notification. this means that beneficiaries can seamlessly drag-and-drop money via the n26 app and web app similarity to how normal space transactions work. european banking law regulates how bank transfers must be authorised.  in this law strong customer authentication (sca) is a requirement to make online payments more secure.  one exception to this is the classification of a person in a shared space as a ‚Äútrusted beneficiary‚Äù so that transfers to this person do not require sca. learn more

question: why is n26 secure?
answer: to protect your account, we use a three-layered security architecture: secure login. your login details of both the mobile and webapp(new tab) consist of a username and password or fingerprint/face recognition (depending on your smartphone). please choose a secure password and don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone.confirmation pin. this 4-digit code is required every time you make a transfer or connect/disconnect your phone. you first set it up once you have successfully connected your smartphone to your account. you can then change it in the app yourself after that.push messages. for every incoming and outgoing payment, a push message will be sent to your connected smartphone. it‚Äôs also used to confirm and finalize your transactions. we‚Äôve also added 3d secure to protect you from online card fraud. every time you contact us we‚Äôll ask you some security questions to make sure it‚Äôs really you. but we‚Äôll never ask for your debit card number, card verification code (cvv), password, or your card or confirmation pins. we‚Äôve also taken steps to protect your data: we store as little information about you as possible, only for as long as we are legally obligated to, and we delete data when it is no longer required for a product or service. you can download your personal data up to 6 months after you close your account. find more information in our privacy policy(new tab).

question: come fare un reclamo?
answer:
se non vuoi fare un reclamo, ma hai domande sui nostri prodotti o hai bisogno di supporto con il tuo conto, saremo felici di aiutarti. inviaci un‚Äôemail a support@n26.com(nuova tabella) (nuova scheda), oppure scrivici direttamente nella chat tramite app nella versione mobile o web, per metterti in contatto con noi nel modo pi√π semplice e veloce. 
 ci dispiace che tu voglia presentare un reclamo. qui di seguito trovi le opzioni a tua disposizione per farlo.

 se non sei soddisfatto di uno dei nostri prodotti o servizi, puoi inviarci un‚Äôemail dal tuo indirizzo email registrato* o inviare il tuo reclamo per posta all‚Äôindirizzo:  n26 bank gmbh ‚Äì complaint management
klosterstra√üe 62, 10179 berlin, germany   per inviarci il tuo reclamo via email, scrivici al seguente indirizzo reclami@n26.com(nuova tabella) (nuova scheda) o inviaci un messaggio di posta elettronica certificata (pec) a reclami@pec.n26.com(nuova tabella) (nuova scheda).  in alternativa, puoi dire che vuoi presentare un reclamo al nostro team del servizio clienti in diretta, che sar√† lieto di aiutarti.   quando presenti un reclamo, includi sempre: il tuo nome completo, il tuo indirizzo email e l‚Äôindirizzo di casail prodotto o il servizio di cui non sei soddisfattouna descrizione del tuo reclamo e a quando questo risalepuoi anche allegare qualsiasi documentazione di supporto relativa al tuo reclamo  qualora il reclamo venga presentato tramite un rappresentante, deve esservi accluso il modulo apposito di procura autenticato.  ti contatteremo via email per confermare la ricezione del reclamo, dopodich√© inizieremo a svolgere un‚Äôindagine interna. nel caso in cui avessimo bisogno di ulteriori informazioni da parte tua, il nostro complaint management ti contatter√† direttamente via email spiegandoti di quali informazioni abbiamo bisogno. una volta che il nostro complaint management avr√† effettuato le dovute indagini sul tuo caso, ti comunicheremo la nostra decisione finale tramite email.  n26 si impegna a rispondere entro: 30 giorni di calendario per reclami relativi a transazioni, servizi bancari e finanziari15 giorni lavorativi per reclami relativi a servizi di pagamento come bonifici, ordini di pagamento permanenti, addebiti su carte di debito e altro ancora. nel caso in cui non sia possibile rispettare il termine di 15 giorni, n26 invier√† una risposta provvisoria indicando i motivi del ritardo e il termine entro il quale sar√† fornita la risposta definitiva, in ogni caso entro e non oltre il termine massimo di 35 giorni lavorativi.  se non sei soddisfatto della soluzione proposta, puoi inoltrare il tuo reclamo a una terza parte indipendente. ad esempio: puoi presentare un reclamo all‚Äôarbitro bancario finanziariopuoi cercare di raggiungere una composizione amichevole della controversia con l‚Äôaiuto del conciliatore bancario finanziariopuoi anche rivolgerti ad un altro ente specializzato nella risoluzione amichevole delle controversie in materia di servizi bancari e finanziari, a condizione che tale ente sia iscritto nell‚Äôapposito registro tenuto dal ministero della giustizia  i clienti con un iban tedesco (de) che non sono soddisfatti della risposta al reclamo possono contattare uno dei seguenti organi arbitrali. ad esempio: puoi contattare un organo arbitrale presso la banca federale tedesca (deutsche bundesbank)in alternativa, puoi presentare un reclamo all‚Äôautorit√† federale tedesca di vigilanza finanziaria (bundesanstalt f√ºr finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht - bafin)  inoltre, la commissione europea ha creato una piattaforma per la risoluzione online delle controversie per aiutare i consumatori a risolverle in via extragiudiziale. 
 
ci impegniamo a migliorare costantemente i nostri prodotti e servizi, per questo il tuo feedback √® molto importante. se desideri darci un feedback su qualsiasi tema, scrivici all‚Äôindirizzo ideas@n26.com(nuova tabella) (nuova scheda). relazioni annuali rendiconto sull‚Äôattivit√† di gestione dei reclami per l‚Äôanno 2019(nuova tabella) (nuova scheda)

question: how to protect my identity?
answer: to protect and help avoid the misuse of your personal data, please keep in mind that: we will never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. this includes verifications for apartment rental contracts, lines of credit, or job offers (including jobs with n26). only complete the verification process if you want to open an n26 bank account for yourself.as the account owner, only you should create and have access to your login details. never create an n26 bank account with a predefined email address and password. if you use login credentials that were given to you, these credentials may be used to reach your personal and legal information. also, never log into an n26 account that is not yours.do not send your id or passport to unknown or unverified recipients.we may ask for certain documents when your transaction is subject to a routine check. only send valid documentation to verified n26 email accounts.we will never ask for your username, password, or pin codes outside the n26 app. never provide this information in an external website or app, even if it looks n26-related. if you ever feel in doubt, have received a suspicious request from a third party, or think your n26 login may be compromised, please do not hesitate to contact us.

question: how do i create or reset a password?
answer: if you forgot your password or want to change it follow these easy steps: during login, select "forgot?" in the n26 mobile application or forgot your password(new tab)? on the n26 website.a link will be sent to your registered email address.check your email and click on the link to create a new password.log into the n26 mobile application or the n26 website by using your new password. we do not have a specific set of requirements for passwords. however, for security purposes, we only accept passwords that are considered robust by our underlying algorithm. if your password is not accepted, try to add special characters / numbers and vary between uppercase and lowercase letters. if you enter your password incorrectly six times in a row, you will be temporarily blocked from logging into your account. if this happens, try logging in again after 30 minutes.

question: why can't i use my card in certain countries?
answer: certain countries are sanctioned by the u.s. treasury‚Äôs office of foreign assets control ("ofac"), and your n26 debit card cannot be used in those ofac-sanctioned regions. more information about ofac can be found on the u.s treasury‚Äôs website.(new tab)

question: warum wurde mir etwas doppelt berechnet?
answer: wir bieten dir banking in echtzeit. das bedeutet, dass du prozesse hinter deinem konto sehen kannst, die du sonst nicht sehen w√ºrdest. es gibt zwei haupttransaktionsarten, die bei einem kauf in einem gesch√§ft oder im internet stattfinden: autorisierungen. ein betrag, der von einem einzelh√§ndler oder verk√§ufer blockiert oder reserviert wurde. dies kann alles von der morgendlichen tasse kaffee bis hin zu hotel- oder mietwagenbuchungen (einschlie√ülich kautionen) sein.buchungen. der tats√§chliche betrag, der von deinem konto abgeht. die tasse kaffee wurde endg√ºltig von deinem konto abgebucht, du hast deine kaution nach dem auschecken im hotel zur√ºckerhalten oder das auto unversehrt zur√ºckgegeben. sobald eine autorisierung best√§tigt wurde, k√∂nnen wir sie nicht mehr stornieren oder r√ºckg√§ngig machen. an diesem punkt k√∂nnen mit deiner autorisierung ein paar dinge passieren: sie wird zu einer buchung, sie wird abgelehnt oder sie verf√§llt (und kehrt nach sp√§testens 12 tagen automatisch auf dein konto zur√ºck. bei kautionen f√ºr autovermietungen kann es bis zu 30 werktage dauern.) nicht vergessen: manchmal siehst du sowohl die autorisierung als auch die endg√ºltige buchung, wenn es am zahlungsterminal technische probleme gibt oder die verbindung w√§hrend des vorgangs unterbrochen wurde. letztlich erlischt diese autorisierung. wenn das nach 12 tagen nicht passiert ist, k√∂nnen wir dir helfen, dein geld zur√ºckzubekommen.verifizierungsautorisierungen (in der regel sehr kleine betr√§ge) werden verwendet, um zu pr√ºfen, ob deine karte aktiv ist (z.b. beim google play store). dieses geld wird auf dein konto zur√ºck√ºberwiesen.die h√∂he einer autorisierung kann aus verschiedenen gr√ºnden von der endg√ºltigen vorlage abweichen.

question: how to set my card pin?

question: custom audiences
answer: data processing in the framework of facebook custom audiences custom audiences allows us to exclude you, as an existing n26 customer, from our advertisements. we do not want to display irrelevant ads to you. furthermore, it allows us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other facebook users. these so called ‚Äúlookalike-audiences‚Äù are more similar to our customers than the average facebook user.  in order to profit from the benefits as described above we provide a hashed version of your n26 email address to facebook. the so-called ‚Äúhashing‚Äù is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. facebook then matches this email address against your potential facebook email address. after the matching, regardless of whether it was successful or not, any hashed email addresses are deleted within 6-8 hours by facebook. facebook does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. you can find this and further information in the terms of facebook custom audiences(new tab). you can revoke your consent according to art. 6 para. 1 lit. a gdpr to this data processing in the n26 web app at any time.

question: warum ist n26 sicher?
answer: zum schutz deines kontos verwenden wir eine dreistufige sicherheitsarchitektur: sichere anmeldung: die zugangsdaten der mobilen app und der webapp(neuen tab) bestehen aus einem benutzernamen und einem passwort oder einer fingerabdruck-/gesichtserkennung (abh√§ngig von deinem smartphone). bitte w√§hle ein sicheres passwort und gib deine zugangsdaten nicht an dritte weiter.best√§tigungs-pin: dies ist ein 4-stelliger code, den du jedes mal ben√∂tigst, wenn du eine √ºberweisung durchf√ºhrst oder dein smartphone verkn√ºpfst/trennst. du richtest diese pin erstmalig ein, wenn du dein smartphone erfolgreich mit deinem konto verkn√ºpft hast. danach kannst du sie in der app selbst √§ndern.push-nachrichten: f√ºr jede eingehende und ausgehende zahlung wird eine push-nachricht an dein verkn√ºpftes smartphone gesendet. sie dient auch zur best√§tigung und zum abschluss deiner transaktionen. au√üerdem haben wir 3d secure eingerichtet, um dich vor online-kartenbetrug zu sch√ºtzen. jedes mal, wenn du uns kontaktierst, werden wir dir einige sicherheitsfragen stellen um sicherzugehen, dass wir wirklich mit dir sprechen. aber wir werden dich nie nach deiner kartennummer, deinem card verification code (cvv), passwort und deiner karten- oder best√§tigungs-pin fragen. wir haben weitere schritte eingef√ºhrt, um deine pers√∂nlichen daten zu sch√ºtzen: wir speichern so wenige informationen √ºber dich wie m√∂glich; nur so lange wie wir rechtlich dazu verpflichtet sind und l√∂schen diese daten, sobald sie f√ºr das produkt oder die dienstleistung nicht mehr ben√∂tigt werden. du kannst deine pers√∂nlichen daten bis zu 6 monate nach deiner kontoschlie√üung herunterladen. mehr informationen dazu findest du in unserer datenschutzerkl√§rung(neuen tab).

question: why is n26 secure?
answer: to protect your account, we use a three-layered security architecture: secure login. your login details of both the mobile and webapp(new tab) consist of a username and password or fingerprint/face recognition (depending on your smartphone). please choose a secure password and don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone.confirmation pin. this 4-digit code is required every time you make a transfer or connect/disconnect your phone. you first set it up once you have successfully connected your smartphone to your account. you can then change it in the app yourself after that.push messages. for every incoming and outgoing payment, a push message will be sent to your connected smartphone. it‚Äôs also used to confirm and finalize your transactions. we‚Äôve also added 3d secure to protect you from online card fraud. every time you contact us we‚Äôll ask you some security questions to make sure it‚Äôs really you. but we‚Äôll never ask for your debit card number, card verification code (cvv), password, or your card or confirmation pins. we‚Äôve also taken steps to protect your data: we store as little information about you as possible, only for as long as we are legally obligated to, and we delete data when it is no longer required for a product or service. you can download your personal data up to 6 months after you close your account. find more information in our privacy policy(new tab).

question: why can‚Äôt i see other n26 users on moneybeam?
answer: to carry out real-time transactions such as moneybeams, n26 checks your smartphone‚Äôs contact list and finds other n26 users based on saved phone numbers or emails. you can also enter someone‚Äôs contact details manually to send them a moneybeam. if you don‚Äôt see your friend‚Äôs name on moneybeam but you know they‚Äôre an n26 user, they most likely haven‚Äôt made themselves visible. indeed you can manage your visibility as an n26 user. most moneybeam transfers that fail between n26 users happen because there are multiple phone numbers or emails listed in the contact entry of a phone‚Äôs address book. to avoid this, make sure you have the email and phone number your friend uses in your phone book in order to send them moneybeams. if the contact details you have stored don‚Äôt match, you cannot send a moneybeam to your friend. want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to n26. learn more about our refer a friend program.

question: how long do transfers take?
answer: all domestic and international incoming sepa transfers are instant if they come from a bank that supports instant transfers and the sender selects this option. banking regulation applies to sepa instant transfers and may delay the transfer in case it needs additional monitoring e.g. when sending large amounts of money. in case the sending bank doesn‚Äôt offer instant transfers or the sender doesn‚Äôt choose this option, all sepa transfers should arrive within a maximum of 2 working days.  please note that outgoing sepa transfers are completed within one banking day. if the transfer is not instant, keep in mind that if a transfer has been made right before a weekend or bank holiday, the time frame will be extended. we send our sepa payment orders through target2(new tab). it‚Äôs open to process payments every working day from 07:00 to 18:00 cet. the system is closed on the following days: 1 january (new year‚Äôs day)good friday, easter monday1 may (labour day)25 december (christmas day)26 december. with moneybeam, you can transfer money to other n26 customers instantly and you can also receive instant moneybeam requests from banks that support instant transfers. times vary for foreign currency transfers with transferwise (but you‚Äôll see an estimated transfer time on the quote screen). you‚Äôll need to confirm each type of transfer via push message in the app before we send anything out. please note: we only accept transfers in eur via sepa (that means no swift transfers). if your incoming transfer is outside of these estimated time frames, please contact the sender (bank) for a payment investigation. we can‚Äôt investigate incoming transfers.

question: how to download my personal data?
answer: the general data protection regulation (gdpr) is a european regulation on data protection and privacy that went into effect on may 25th, 2018. we‚Äôve added a data export option to the webapp(new tab) as a response to art. 20 gdpr. and, as with everything we do, getting your personal data you provided to us is transparent and simple, and you‚Äôre in complete control: go to üë§ my account then personal settings and your personal data. the right to data portability under art. 20 gdpr covers personal data you provided to us. art. 20 gdpr shall enable you to easily switch the service provider in case you want to use these data to open a bank account at another bank. this is why art. 20 gdpr requires to provide these data in a machine-readable format to you.  it‚Äôs important to keep in mind that the file is to be used for data portability purposes only and your computer might not be able to read a json file. also, if you can open the json file the data might be difficult to understand as it is not intended to be human-readable, but machine-readable. the file we provide has the only purpose of being transmitted to another bank.  as a mobile bank, we know the importance of data security. for this reason we take additional security measures before you can download your data, which are described below. we do so in order to make sure that you, the account holder, is in fact the person who downloads the data.   how to download your data you can request to download the personal data you provided for a current or previous account with us up to 6 months after account closure date. it will come in a machine-readable format so you can share it with a third party if you choose to. current customers: please request your data through our web form(new tab). you will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. this link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. and please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request. former customers: you can download personal data you provided up to 6 months after account closure date. to request this information, complete a data request form(new tab) and make sure that the information you provide correctly matches all your previous account information. you‚Äôll need to know: the first and last name, personal id number, and expiration date of the identification document (national id card or passport) you used to verify the account,the registered email address of the account,the date (month and year) you created and closed your account (check your verification email). for security reasons, we have to make sure it‚Äôs really you downloading the data: if any field is inaccurate or missing, your request will not be successful. you will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. this link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. and please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request. if you want more information about the collection, use, and processing of your personal data, please visit our updated privacy policy (deu(new tab)) (eu(new tab)).

question: what to do if my account was hacked?
answer:
if you suspect possible fraudulent activity on your account, please contact us as soon as possible. our chat function is available in the app, on the n26 website(new tab), and at the end of some of our support center articles, such as this one. just click on start a chat.  if you‚Äôd rather speak on the phone, you can request this during the chat. we‚Äôll arrange a callback within the hour so we can discuss the matter further with you. once in contact with one of our agents, please thoroughly explain the situation to us.  every detail here is important.  
please be assured that we‚Äôll take all necessary measures to assist you in this situation.  in addition to our legal obligations for fraud prevention, and in order to continually improve our security safeguards, we have a dedicated team who analyzes each fraud case individually. the fraud cases themselves are often relatively complicated and have to be dealt with in detail. depending on the complexity, this can take a few days, but in some cases it can take several weeks. finally, if you have evidence or strong feelings that the account might have been hacked, we recommend that you file a police report as well. to learn more about how we protect your account in case of fraud, visit our blog article(new tab). visit our page about security at n26(new tab) to discover our commitment to protect your funds and your account. chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including sundays and bank holidays. if you do not have access to your n26 mobile app or your n26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in english) .

question: why didn't i receive my pairing code via sms?

question: crs - why we require certain information from our customers
answer:
n26 as a financial institution is (according to crs) required to report information directly to tax authorities in the european union concerning financial accounts held by customers who are tax resident in another country. crs stands for common reporting standard. the crs has been developed by the organization for economic cooperation and development (oecd) and is a global reporting standard for the automatic exchange of information (aeoi). the goal of crs is to allow tax authorities to obtain a clearer understanding of financial assets held abroad by their residents for tax purposes in order to fight tax evasion. more than 90 countries have agreed to share information on residents‚Äô assets and incomes in conformation with crs. in order for us to be able to accurately determine whether an account is to be reported to the tax authorities for crs purposes, we need to ask you: in which country(ies) are you a tax resident? 

you are normally a ‚Äútax resident‚Äù and therefore subject to tax on your worldwide income in the country where you have a residential address. if you have a place to live in more than one country, then there are normally ‚Äútie-breaker rules‚Äù included in double tax treaties and tax laws of the relevant countries that help determine where you are a tax resident. it may be that you are tax resident in more than one country during a year and, if so, we‚Äôd need to know both the country and your taxpayer identification number for each of them in order to accurately report the information to the relevant tax authorities. 
what is your taxpayer identification number (‚Äútin‚Äù) for each country?

the issuance and format of a tin differs by country. for eu countries, the european commission has published guidance on tins in each eu country(new tab), which may help you in identifying your individual tin(s) in these countries.  in case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the n26 app. to do this, simply log in to the n26 app and go to: my account > settings > personal settings > tax information

question: how to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?
answer: it‚Äôs important to keep your personal data up to date (for example, your phone number is necessary to connect your smartphone or to send and receive moneybeams). here‚Äôs how you can change your information: delivery address, password, or tax information: you can change this information yourself at any time in the app. just go to üë§ my account and select settings then personal settings.name and sex: chat with us and send two forms of id: a copy of your new id card or passport as well as an official document of the change (a marriage licence or updated birth certificate).  we can also re-order a card with your new name once your account has been updated.nationality: chat with us and send a copy of your new id card or passport.email address: you‚Äôll need to contact us via chat for this. we need to verify it‚Äôs really you changing your information so we can‚Äôt change any personal data over email.phone number: in germany, spain, france, and italy (ios app only), you can now change your phone number yourself at any time in the app. just go to üë§ my account and select settings then personal settings.note: to be able to update your phone number in the app, you must use your paired device, meaning the smartphone linked to your account.in other countries you‚Äôll need to contact us via chat for this. we need to verify it‚Äôs really you changing your information so we can‚Äôt change any personal data over email.

question: why is n26 secure?
answer: to protect your account, we use a three-layered security architecture: secure login. your login details of both the mobile and webapp(new tab) consist of a username and password or fingerprint/face recognition (depending on your smartphone). please choose a secure password and don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone.confirmation pin. this 4-digit code is required every time you make a transfer or connect/disconnect your phone. you first set it up once you have successfully connected your smartphone to your account. you can then change it in the app yourself after that.push messages. for every incoming and outgoing payment, a push message will be sent to your connected smartphone. it‚Äôs also used to confirm and finalize your transactions. we‚Äôve also added 3d secure to protect you from online card fraud. every time you contact us we‚Äôll ask you some security questions to make sure it‚Äôs really you. but we‚Äôll never ask for your debit card number, card verification code (cvv), password, or your card or confirmation pins. we‚Äôve also taken steps to protect your data: we store as little information about you as possible, only for as long as we are legally obligated to, and we delete data when it is no longer required for a product or service. you can download your personal data up to 6 months after you close your account. find more information in our privacy policy(new tab).

question: how do i get cash?
answer: you can get cash at any convenient atm, but you may have to pay a fee to do so. we have partnered with the allpoint atm network to provide you with unlimited free atm withdrawals at over 55,000 locations across the us, canada, puerto rico, australia, mexico, and the uk. with access to an expansive retail network including target, walgreens, cvs, speedway, and kroger, you‚Äôll never need to pay to withdraw cash again!  you can quickly and easily locate allpoint atms via the atm map feature in our mobile application for ios and android. find more information about this convenient feature here!  not on your smartphone? you can also find nearby allpoint atms via the allpoint web application(new tab). can‚Äôt find a convenient allpoint atm near you? no problem. enjoy 2 free atm withdrawals per month from any network, anytime, anywhere in the us. question: what's an insolvency and what can i do?
answer: an insolvency is a situation in which the debtor is unable to fulfil his financial obligation to the creditor(s). how this is going to affect your n26 account depends on whether you have a p-account and whether we received an insolvency application or insolvency opening.  faq your account is seized because we received a garnishment. if the garnishment is issued by one of the insolvency creditors, the insolvency manager has to inform us accordingly. in this case we will unseize your account. if, however, the garnishment is based on a claim which emerged only after the insolvency proceedings, the seizure will be maintained. since we cannot be sure if the garnishment is valid or not, your account will be seized again until we‚Äôve received a written confirmation to release your account from your insolvency manager. in order to release the account we require written confirmation from the insolvency manager directly. it can take a few days until they send it to us and we receive it. until then your account remains seized. if you have a p-account, you can use your funds to the extent of your monthly allowance. you can revert your p-account to a normal bank account at any time. we recommend that you make sure we have a written confirmation to release your account from the insolvency manager. in that case you can only issue a transfer order for the new garnishment in agreement with the insolvency manager.

question: what if my balance is negative?
answer: your balance can be negative as long as you‚Äôre within your overdraft limit.  if you have a negative account balance, you‚Äôll be charged an overdraft interest rate of 8.9%. otherwise, you‚Äôll receive an email to notify you that the authorized limit of your account has been exceeded. this means you don‚Äôt have enough funds on your account to cover future charges. even if you haven‚Äôt used your account since you opened it, certain charges still apply (such as n26 you or n26 metal monthly fees or express delivery costs) and have resulted in a negative balance. so you‚Äôll need to top up your account via sepa transfer (choose international transfer if you‚Äôre making the transfer outside of germany) or cash26 (if you‚Äôre in germany or austria). your account will remain active for the next 60 days without doing so. at that point: you‚Äôll receive two additional reminders (each cost ‚Ç¨3).if you have an overdraft: it‚Äôll be cancelled after the second reminder and you‚Äôll have to repay that amount immediately (or you can set up a repayment plan).if you have an n26 you, n26 metal, or n26 business you account: all benefits will be cancelled after 60 days and your account will turn into a standard one.if you don‚Äôt respond after 60 days, we may close your account.

question: come verifico la mia identit√†?
answer: in qualit√† di banca, abbiamo bisogno di sapere chi sei. ecco perch√© devi dimostrare la tua identit√† con un documento supportato quando apri un conto con noi o richiedi alcuni prodotti.  non ti chiederemo mai di dimostrare la tua identit√† per conto di altre persone o aziende. abbiamo raccolto dei suggerimenti per aiutarti a proteggere la tua identit√†. puoi mostrarci il tuo documento d‚Äôidentit√† in due modi: foto o video. il modo in cui puoi dimostrare la tua identit√† dipende dalla tua nazionalit√†, dal tuo paese di residenza e dal tipo di documento d‚Äôidentit√† che utilizzi: vivo in germania(nuova tabella)vivo fuori dalla germania(nuova tabella)vivo in italia(nuova tabella) se il tuo passaporto o la tua carta d‚Äôidentit√† non sono inclusi nel nostro elenco, significa che non possiamo offrirti un conto in questo momento. la verifica dell‚Äôidentit√† √® un argomento serio per noi. se il tuo documento d‚Äôidentit√† non √® presente nell‚Äôelenco, la nostra assistenza clienti non potr√† fare eccezioni per te. aggiungiamo continuamente nuovi documenti a questo elenco, quindi vale la pena controllare di tanto in tanto se il tuo √® stato aggiunto. la chat √® disponibile dal luned√¨ alla domenica dalle 07:00 alle 23:00.

question: what are the benefits of n26 you?
answer:
once you upgrade to n26 you, you‚Äôll receive 10 additional spaces and the option to choose one of our five new card colours: rhubarb, ocean, sand, aqua, and slate.  n26 you customers are also covered under the premium account‚Äôs insurance package provided by allianz global assistance*, which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as: travel insurance: reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.
snow and mountain rescue. get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains. car, bike and scooter sharing. coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies. extra card. you can purchase an extra n26 you card for a one-off fee of 14‚Ç¨ through your n26 app (available in germany, spain, austria, italy).  if you‚Äôre an n26 you customer, or if you want to upgrade to n26 you, you‚Äôll have the possibility to choose one of our five new colors when ordering a new card:  keep these in mind when considering n26 you(new tab): the n26 you mastercard has no embossing: the card details, including the number, cvv code, and 10-digit token are printed on the back. if you upgrade to n26 you, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨9,90 will be deducted directly from your n26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. if you‚Äôre a new customer, the first fee will be deducted 15 days after you prove your identity. from then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on your sign-up date. meaning that, if you opened your account at the end of the month, the first two  monthly fees will be charged the following month. the minimum membership is one year. your contract automatically renews if you don‚Äôt cancel your membership at least 4 weeks before the contract expires. you can purchase an extra n26 you card for a one-off fee of 14‚Ç¨ through your n26 app.   *allianz global assistance europe trade name of awp p&c s.a. - dutch branch, and member of the allianz group. want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to n26. learn more about our refer a friend program.

question: how to close my account?
answer: we are sorry to see you go, but we appreciate the time you spent with us as a customer. you have convenient options to close your n26 account. if you have a de or es iban you can use the following methods to request account closure: option 1: click here(new tab) to be guided through our electronic account closure process: this option is the fastest way to close your account.you will need to login to authenticate yourself.you will be guided through the process to close your account. if you cannot log in or do not want to, please follow the steps for option 2. option 2: please contact us via live chat or via email to closure@n26.com(new tab) from your registered email address using our cancellation form(new tab) (the form will require the below information): a statement requesting the closure of your account on a specific date or asap.your name.your n26 iban.if you have a positive balance in your main account or your spaces, we also need an iban within sepa to transfer your remaining balance. if you have an it iban you can use the following method to request account closure: please send your request through live chat (click the start new support chat button below) or via email to closure@n26.com(new tab) from your registered email address using our cancellation form(new tab) (the form will require the below information): a statement requesting the closure of your account on a specific date or asap.your name.your n26 iban.if you have a positive balance in your main account or your spaces, we also need an iban within sepa to transfer your remaining balance. a few things to consider when closing your account: for a quick account closure: if you have a positive balance, please transfer your remaining balance yourself. if you have a negative balance, top up your account.destroy your cards by cutting them with scissors or a paper shredder. the chip, nfc antenna and the magnetic strip should all be cut into pieces and disposed of separately. (for cards that cannot be easily destroyed by cutting, please store your card in a safe place.)

question: why are some products and services unavailable to me?
answer: we collaborate with many partners. that‚Äôs why certain products and services require that you meet their requirements as well. the most common reasons why you wouldn‚Äôt be eligible for certain products: expired or unsupported identity documents (for example, certain passports due to a lack of security features).you‚Äôre taxable in the united states. if so, you won‚Äôt be able to use certain invest or savings products. if this is not the case, contact our customer support via chat so we can look into your account details. you may need to switch your telephone number if it starts with a north american area code (+1).you proved your identity using postident (in germany). we‚Äôll have to reset your account and you‚Äôll have to prove your identity again in order to use certain products and services. if this is the case, we‚Äôll email you about it and find a convenient time for you to do so.the product or service is not yet available in your country.

question: what to do if my account was hacked?
answer:
if you suspect possible fraudulent activity on your account, please contact us as soon as possible. our chat function is available in the app, on the n26 website(new tab), and at the end of some of our support center articles, such as this one. just click on start a chat.  if you‚Äôd rather speak on the phone, you can request this during the chat. we‚Äôll arrange a callback within the hour so we can discuss the matter further with you. once in contact with one of our agents, please thoroughly explain the situation to us.  every detail here is important.  
please be assured that we‚Äôll take all necessary measures to assist you in this situation.  in addition to our legal obligations for fraud prevention, and in order to continually improve our security safeguards, we have a dedicated team who analyzes each fraud case individually. the fraud cases themselves are often relatively complicated and have to be dealt with in detail. depending on the complexity, this can take a few days, but in some cases it can take several weeks. finally, if you have evidence or strong feelings that the account might have been hacked, we recommend that you file a police report as well. to learn more about how we protect your account in case of fraud, visit our blog article(new tab). visit our page about security at n26(new tab) to discover our commitment to protect your funds and your account. chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including sundays and bank holidays. if you do not have access to your n26 mobile app or your n26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in english) .

minimum 16.90‚Ç¨ as soon as your account balance reaches the minimum requirement your n26 card will be automatically produced and shipped. you will be notified in the app via messages from n26 and of your card.for premium account holders your first monthly fees are charged on the 15th day of your subscription and will be deducted from your account.for express delivery the fee of 20‚Ç¨ will be question: can n26 close my account?
answer: in short: yes. we can close your account in 3 ways (with 2 months notice, 14 days notice, or immediately). these cancellations are final: our customer support can‚Äôt provide any information about the background of individual cancellations nor can they reverse the decision. you‚Äôre also able to terminate your business relationship with us at any time, immediately, and without a reason. 2 months notice: we have the right to terminate any business relationship with 2 months notice without a cause (see section 19 (1) of our t&cs(new tab) or ¬ß 675h of the german civil code). 14 days notice: we can also terminate any business relationship with 14 days notice (see section 19 (3) of our t&cs(new tab)) if reasonable cause is given due to the breach of contractual duties. these include: using a personal account for business purposes. according to our t&cs, a private account may only be used for personal use. any credit transfers that relate to professional fees for provided services and/or sold products are considered business transactions. if you‚Äôd like to use your account for this purpose, please sign up for an n26 business, n26 business you or n26 business metal account.providing incorrect or insufficient information for a routine background check. we‚Äôre a bank so we sometimes run checks on transactions. if you don‚Äôt provide correct and/or sufficient information about the transaction in question, we have the right to terminate the business relationship in order to be compliant with german financial regulations.displaying abusive behaviour towards n26 employees. we don‚Äôt tolerate abusive behaviour towards our employees. the threat of physical harm or general abusive behaviour may be considered a criminal offense according to german law and will be reported to the respective authority without exception. immediate cancellation we may also terminate any business relationship on an extraordinary basis (see section 19 (3) of our t&cs(new tab)). that means: at any time, without prior notice, and without a cancellation period when there is reasonable cause for such termination. these include: providing incorrect statements to n26 about your financial situation, especially when you apply for a credit.failure to repay your loan or any debt toward n26.failure to comply with n26‚Äôs requests about your loan (see provision or increase of security, section 13 (2) of our t&c‚Äôs(new tab)).

question: psd2 - secure open banking

this means that you can permit regulated third party providers to access your account information through a dedicated interface:  you can enable an account information service (ais) to pull together data from different bank accounts you may have, and then aggregate and manage their details in the same place through certified third-party providers.you can securely pay at the checkout of any website that offers payment initiation services (pis).  the data exchange is handled in the background via our partner - token.io. if you begin using a third-party payment service like an account information service or a payment initiation service, you‚Äôll be redirected to your n26 app via token.io to confirm the access request. in our privacy policy(new tab) we inform you about the purposes, involved parties and legal bases of the necessary data processing involved to fulfil our obligations as part of the revised european payment services directive. faqs if a third party provider has not integrated with our dedicated interface, the third party provider will need to integrate with our dedicated interface via our partner token.io. you need to contact the respective third party provider and revoke the access permission directly with them.  *applies to all countries in the eea.

question: what does n26 do with my tax information?
answer: the oecd requires certain tax information to be shared by means of the common reporting standard(new tab) (ecr). to carry out our obligations, we must establish which country you‚Äôre taxable in. we do this through your tax identification or national insurance number.  we forward this information via the german federal tax office to tax authorities in other countries if:  you live in a ecr participating country.you have a postbox or a second registered address in another ecr participating country.when registering you gave a telephone number belonging to another ecr participating country.you have a standing order, or make regular payments, to an account located in another ecr participating country. we also forward data to the u.s. internal revenue service(new tab) (irs) according to the foreign account tax compliance act(new tab) (fatca). we may request your social security number (ssn) in order to check your tax status in the u.s. because: you are a citizen of the u.s (including dual citizenship).when registering you gave a telephone number belonging to the u.s.you were born in the u.s. (or in a u.s. embassy located abroad).you‚Äôre married to a u.s. national.you gave us an address in the u.s.you make regular payment transfers to the u.s. to update your tax identification or social security number in the n26 app: go to  my account and tap on settings and account settingsselect personal settings then tax informationselect the country in which you‚Äôre tax-liableenter either your tax identification number or your social security number important information in germany, we need your steueridentifikationsnummer (11 digits) not your steuernummer (9 digits).if you‚Äôre not tax-liable in another country, contact us so we can confirm your tax status.in each and every case your personal data will be securely stored and only used for the fulfillment of ecr and fatca requirements.we‚Äôre unable to advise you on your tax status. if you‚Äôre unsure of your status please discuss the matter with a tax advisor.if you‚Äôve entered the country in which you are liable for tax but not your tax identification number, please remove the country from the list shown to you in the app, reenter the country, and enter your tax identification number again.

question: who is a politically exposed person?
answer:
a politically exposed person is a natural person who occupies or has ceased to occupy important public offices less than a year ago. their family members and people with whom they have close relations should also be included in this category. individuals who occupy or have occupied important public office are: president of the republic, president of the council, minister, vice-minister and undersecretary, president of the region, regional councillor, mayor of a provincial capital or metropolitan city, mayor of a municipality with a population of not less than 15,000 inhabitants and similar offices in foreign states;member of parliament, senator, member of the european parliament, regional councillor and similar offices in foreign states;member of the central governing bodies of political parties;judge of the constitutional court, magistrate of the court of cassation or the court of auditors, state councillor, other members of the administrative justice council for the sicilian region and similar offices in foreign states;member of the governing bodies of central banks and independent authorities;ambassador, charg√© d‚Äôaffaires and equivalent offices in foreign states, senior officer of the armed forces and similar offices in foreign states;member of the administrative, management or control bodies of companies controlled, even indirectly, by the italian state or by a foreign state or controlled, predominantly or wholly, by the regions, by provincial capitals and metropolitan cities and by municipalities with a total population of not less than 15,000 inhabitants;general manager of asl and of the hospital company, of the university hospital company and of the other bodies of the national health service.director, deputy director and member of the management body or equivalent functions in international organizations. 
family members of politically exposed persons are:  parents; spouse or person in a civil partnership or de facto cohabitation;children and their spouses and persons linked to their children in a civil partnership or de facto cohabitation. the persons with whom peps are known to have close relations are: natural persons linked to the politically exposed person due to the joint effective ownership of legal entities or other close business relationship;natural persons who only formally hold total control of a notoriously established entity, de facto, in the interest and for the benefit of a politically exposed person.

question: will my direct debit go through if i'm low on funds?
answer: if your balance can‚Äôt cover a direct debit* when it‚Äôs due, it‚Äôll bounce and you‚Äôll be charged a ‚Ç¨3 fee. if you have a negative account balance, you‚Äôll be charged an overdraft interest of 8.9%. it‚Äôs not possible to delay a direct debit. to avoid this fee in the future, you can instantly check whether you‚Äôre eligible for an overdraft directly in the app (available in germany and austria). *for non-euro countries only: if you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it‚Äôs the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. see the below list of countries:  bulgariacroatiaczech republicdenmarkhungaryicelandliechtensteinnorwaypolandromaniaswedenswitzerland want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to n26. learn more about our refer a friend program.

question: what to do if my n26 iban is not accepted?
answer: your iban includes the 2 digit country code (e.g. de), a two-digit check number, the eight-digit bank sort code, and your ten-digit account number. for example: de xx 10011001 26xxxxxxxx. the participating countries of the sepa area (single euro payments area) have agreed on the iban system in order to simplify national and international payments, and to reduce the risk of error in the communication and processing of transactions. merchants or employers who do not accept ibans from other member states of the european economic area are violating european law as of 1 february 2016 (article 9 of regulation no 260/2012(new tab)). if you are ever affected by iban discrimination, please contact your relevant national authority(new tab) directly and notify them. provide your contact details, the name of the merchant or company that didn‚Äôt accept your iban, as well as a brief description of the incident (including a screenshot of the rejection or other documentation of your communication with them).

question: why was i charged a direct debit fee?
answer: direct debits returned to your account due to insufficient funds* are charged a ‚Ç¨3 fee in accordance with our terms & conditions(new tab). if your balance becomes negative due to this fee, overdraft interest will also apply at a rate of 8.9%. you can avoid these fees by making sure you have enough funds in your account to cover incoming direct debits by 18:00 on the same business day. we suggest you use sepa instant credit transfers, moneybeam (between n26 accounts) or cash26 (if you live in germany, austria or italy) to transfer the amount due. with these three methods, the amount will be credited to your account instantly. if you don‚Äôt recognize a direct debit, you can request a refund in the app. *for non-euro countries only: if you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it‚Äôs the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. you can check the list of countries below: bulgariacroatiaczech republicdenmarkhungaryicelandliechtensteinnorwaypolandromaniaswedenswitzerland

question: what if my balance is negative?
answer: your balance can be negative as long as you‚Äôre within your overdraft limit.  if you have a negative account balance, you‚Äôll be charged an overdraft interest rate of 8.9%. otherwise, you‚Äôll receive an email to notify you that the authorized limit of your account has been exceeded. this means you don‚Äôt have enough funds on your account to cover future charges. even if you haven‚Äôt used your account since you opened it, certain charges still apply (such as n26 you or n26 metal monthly fees or express delivery costs) and have resulted in a negative balance. so you‚Äôll need to top up your account via sepa transfer (choose international transfer if you‚Äôre making the transfer outside of germany) or cash26 (if you‚Äôre in germany or austria). your account will remain active for the next 60 days without doing so. at that point: you‚Äôll receive two additional reminders (each cost ‚Ç¨3).if you have an overdraft: it‚Äôll be cancelled after the second reminder and you‚Äôll have to repay that amount immediately (or you can set up a repayment plan).if you have an n26 you, n26 metal, or n26 business you account: all benefits will be cancelled after 60 days and your account will turn into a standard one.if you don‚Äôt respond after 60 days, we may close your account.
