question: how to use apple pay?
answer:
(applies to germany, austria, france, italy, spain, finland, ireland, iceland, greece, liechtenstein, luxembourg, portugal, slovakia, estonia, belgium, poland, norway, netherlands, sweden, denmark, and switzerland) apple pay allows you to make payments with your smartphone so you don‚Äôt have to carry your mastercard everywhere. we‚Äôve made a video(new tab) to help you set up your n26 mastercard with apple pay. some tips to keep in mind: your iphone region matches the country where your mastercard was first shipped to (you can check your region by selecting settings then general and language & region in your phone).
if you‚Äôve lost your iphone and aren‚Äôt able to find it again using find my iphone, you can always access your icloud and remove all apple pay devices via the web browser on a mac or pc. in addition, you should turn on lost mode to block your mastercard for apple pay. payments with your physical card will still be possible.
if your n26 mastercard is unexpectedly removed from apple wallet, it may be because you have logged out of your icloud, turned off passcode or touch id, reset your device to factory settings via itunes, or deleted all the content and settings from your device. in all cases, you can simply add your card again. keep in mind that the card won‚Äôt be removed if you update your operating system, reset your personal device settings, or turn off find my iphone.
for in-store or online purchases, you must authorize your payment via touch id or using your passcode. if you‚Äôre using apple watch, authorizations are done by double-clicking on the side button. and if you‚Äôre using your mac, authorize your payment by using touch id via the touch bar in the top-right corner of your keyboard.
if you‚Äôre an n26 metal or n26 business you customer, it may happen that the card image displayed in your apple wallet shows as an n26 you card (for metal customers) or as an n26 business card (for business you customers). we‚Äôre working now to resolve this. rest assured that this does not affect the usability of apple pay or your premium membership.
make sure your device meets the technical requirements by visiting apple support(new tab):iphone 6 or later, iphone se: available in apps, stores and webapple watch paired with iphone 5 or later: available in apps and storesipad pro, ipad air 2, ipad mini 3, ipad mini 4: available in apps and webmacs introduced in 2012 or later (macs other than the macbook pro with touch bar and touch id require an iphone or apple watch: available in web

question: why didn't an atm give me cash?
answer: it happens: you go to an atm doesn‚Äôt give you cash and, and in some cases, the amount is still deducted from your account. first, check your card limits in your card settings and make sure atm withdrawals are active.make sure that you personal limits are set higher than the amount you want to withdraw.please be aware that you can only withdraw as many funds as you have deposited on your account. otherwise, if you don‚Äôt have an overdraft, the withdrawal will be rejected.the fixed maximum daily (24 hours rolling) limit for withdrawals is 2500‚Ç¨. some atms have their own limits in place, so it can happen that you can‚Äôt withdraw your daily limit at once. if you didn‚Äôt receive cash from the atm, but the amount was still charged from your account, we‚Äôre happy to help you: the amount that was deducted from your balance is only an authorization, meaning that the amount is blocked or reserved to be debited by the merchant. when the merchant debits the amount, it‚Äôs called a settlement of the transaction. if your transaction was not successful the authorization normally expires within a matter of hours - or a maximum of 12 working days - and is then automatically credited to your account again. only in case the transaction has been settled we can charge back the amount from the merchant. you can see whether a transaction has been settled when it appears on your downloadable monthly statement (not only in your transaction list in the app). this means: if the amount appears on your monthly statement and/or hasn‚Äôt been credited back to your account after 12 working days, you can file a chargeback with us. in the meantime, we suggest you try another atm from a different operator. this rarely happens twice in a row.

question: how to protect my account?
answer: the security of your account and your personal data is our top priority. if you ever feel that your n26 login may be compromised or that someone is trying to initiate a chat on your behalf, it‚Äôs crucial to immediately change your n26 account password. to do so, log into the app and go to my account > settings > security. please choose a secure password and don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone. if you believe that your account has been compromised or tampered in any way then please get in touch with us immediately.  if you do not have access to your n26 mobile app or your n26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in english) .

question: what are ‚Äúmessages from n26‚Äù ?
answer: the security of your personal data is our priority. that‚Äôs why we created an inbox in the n26 app that allows us to share any communication. any content that includes personal data is communicated in messages from n26. we‚Äôll still use your email address to communicate general information. personal data is any information that relates to you as a person and identifies or could possibly identify you. it could be your account details, your address (email or postal), id documents, proof of residence, but also the notification about your accrued overdraft interest or your monthly standing order. when we send you a message to message from n26, you‚Äôll receive a push notification on your paired smartphone and an email to your registered email address. once connected to the webapp, you‚Äôll also be notified by an info card of any new messages. we‚Äôll send you a message that you can find in your messages from n26, and ask that you reply directly from there. this feature is available from both the n26 app and the webapp under my account -> support -> messages from n26. make sure you downloaded the latest app version.  you can‚Äôt initiate a conversation, but you‚Äôll be able to reply as soon as we send you the first message. if you need to provide us with a document, simply select add attachment. please make sure that the total file size of your attachments per message doesn‚Äôt exceed 25mb.    messages from n26 doesn‚Äôt replace our chat and you can still send us an email. if you need to get in touch with us first, visit our page how to contact n26? if we need to verify you, we‚Äôll ask you to open a chat with us.

question: how do contactless payments work?
answer: it‚Äôs not possible to deactivate contactless payments. if you‚Äôre experiencing issues with your contactless payments, keep in mind that:   to activate contactless payments, you must first use your card at an atm or payment terminal. transactions up to ‚Ç¨50 don‚Äôt require a card pin*. for amounts over ‚Ç¨50, you‚Äôll need to enter your card pin.  *if the merchant‚Äôs payment system supports this option. make sure your card is held directly onto an nfc-compatible payment terminal. if you remove your card too fast or didn‚Äôt hold it close enough, just try again. n26 metal cards only have nfc on the back side of the card. make sure to hold the back side of the card against the terminal to use nfc (using the front won‚Äôt work). if contactless is not working, please always try to use the chip and pin method to complete your payment.

question: how to dispute a transaction?
answer:
is there a card transaction on your n26 monthly statement that you did not make? did you place an order online, but never receive it? don‚Äôt worry, this article will help you figure out how to resolve these issues. a chargeback is a service offered by n26 through mastercard, which allows you to dispute transactions which you did not make, or where something went wrong with the merchant. for example, if you ordered goods online and did not receive them by the allotted delivery date, you may be eligible to file a chargeback and ask for your money back.  if you need to dispute a transaction, you can do it in your n26 app by navigating to the transaction you want to dispute, then clicking report a problem. if you already closed your account and you do not have access to the app, you will need to contact customer service via email to support@n26.com. note: if your dispute is due to an unauthorised transaction, you need to block and reorder your card to prevent further fraud occurring, before we can process your request.  
common card dispute faqs:  a: go to your n26 app, and reorder your card as ‚Äúlost‚Äù or ‚Äústolen‚Äù based on your circumstances. if your card was in your possession at all times, please re-confirm that you did not make the transaction yourself. if that is the case, you can go ahead and reorder as ‚Äústolen‚Äù. this will prevent further unauthorised transactions occurring, and secure your account. report the fraud with the police, and follow the instructions above to initiate a dispute.   a: if you did not receive a delivery date, mastercard chargeback guidelines allow for customers to file a dispute 30 days after the date of the transaction. if you received a delivery date, you can dispute the transaction from the date you expected to receive the goods. mastercard chargeback guidelines state that you must file the dispute within 120 days of either of these dates. a: first, try contacting the bank that owns the atm. this is the fastest way to get your money back. to help you out, here is some guidance on what you can say: dear xx,  i attempted to withdraw cash from an atm owned by your company, and i did not receive the cash, but was still charged. below, you can find information about the transaction:  amount: ‚Ç¨{insert amount}atm name: {insert atm/bank name} atmdate & time of transaction: dd/mm/yyyy at {insert time} (cet) atm location: {atm address - include the name of the street, shopping mall} please return the funds to my account, or i shall fill a chargeback with my bank.  if the bank which owns the atm is not helpful, you can follow the instructions above to initiate a dispute. be sure to include the transaction date, amount and merchant, and your reason for contesting this transaction, to allow us to have enough information. a: first, reach out to the merchant to see if they can help. this is the fastest way to get your money back. to help you out, here is a basic template you can use to raise this issue with the merchant:  dear xx,  i authorised a transaction to {merchant name}, but {merchant name} has subsequently charged me additionally, without my authorisation. below, you can find information about the transaction:  merchant name: {insert merchant name}  amount of original, authorised transaction: ‚Ç¨{insert amount} amount of non-authorised transaction: ‚Ç¨{insert amount} date & time of original, authorised transaction: dd/mm/yyyy at {insert time} (cet) date & time of non-authorised transaction: dd/mm/yyyy at {insert time} (cet) please return the funds to my account, or i shall fill a chargeback with my bank and a complaint to the police/authorities. if the merchant is unresponsive or uncooperative, you can follow the instructions above to initiate a dispute. be sure to include the transaction date, amount and merchant, and your reason for contesting this transaction, to allow us to have enough information.  a: your refund could take up to 15 calendar days from the date the merchant issued it. please be patient, and wait for this time frame to pass. if 15 days pass and you still see no refund in your account, you can follow the instructions at the top of this article to initiate a dispute. be sure to include the transaction date, amount, merchant and your reason for contesting this transaction to allow us to have enough information and identify the transaction.  a: at n26 we take every possible action to protect your account from fraud, including: the flexibility to choose when to block your card, activate and deactivate payments abroad, enable and disable online transactions and set up spending limits directly within your n26 appreceiving push notifications informing you of any activity occurring on your accountusing internal tools and card fraud prevention to detect and prevent frauddeveloping systems to reduce the risk of potential fraud occurring  a: there are 3 main types of card fraud: your card is skimmed & counterfeited, for example you used your card at a tampered atm which stole your card detailsyour card details are stolen online, for example:you ordered something from a fraudulent/fake websiteyour details were stolen from a legitimate purchase your online shopping account was hacked your physical is card stolen & used to make purchases a: below are a few ways you can protect your account from fraud: use trusted atms which are located within a bank branch order from trusted online retailers & websiteschange your passwords/pins regularly n26 will never ask for your card or account details outside the app or web app. don‚Äôt trust sms or emails that seem to come from n26 with odd links or which ask you to provide this information directly.change your card settings within your n26 app, for example: disabling online payments, atm withdrawals, payments abroad and setting spending limits based on your regular transactional behaviouravoid making magnetic stripe transactions if possible, as these are not as safe as chip based transactions or digital walletkeep your card in a safe place

question: how to declare my n26 account for my taxes in france?
answer: (applies to all french residents) according to the french general tax code, all french residents are required to declare any bank accounts they have opened, used, or closed within the year of declaring an income. this includes your n26 bank account. to do this: in your tax return, check the box foreign account opened, used or closed (8uu) (compte √©tranger ouvert, utilis√© ou ferm√©).complete the cerfa n¬∞ 3916(new tab) form and attach it to your tax return.

question: shared spaces - was ist eine kontovollmacht?
answer:
shared spaces sind keine gemeinschaftskonten im klassischen sinn. sie funktionieren durch die erteilung einer kontovollmacht. die person, die die anderen teilnehmer dazu berechtigt, in dessen namen zu handeln, wird ‚Äúbesitzer‚Äù genannt. diese person ist und bleibt der alleinige kontoinhaber. der besitzer muss ein n26 premium-kunde sein, das hei√üt n26 you, n26 metal oder n26 business you nutzen. teilnehmer eines shared space sind nicht kontoinhaber des shared space. durch die erteilung der kontovollmacht erhalten alle teilnehmer das recht, im namen des besitzers √ºber die gelder innerhalb des shared spaces zu verf√ºgen. das bedeutet, dass diejenige person, die den shared space erstellt hat, dessen alleiniger inhaber ist. der besitzer eines shared space
 ist besitzer des gesamten guthabens auf dem shared space.kann √ºber die gelder des shared space jederzeit verf√ºgen.kann andere teilnehmer einladen, indem er ihnen eine kontovollmacht erteilt.kann die kontovollmacht eines teilnehmers jederzeit widerrufen.kann einen shared space schlie√üen, nachdem alle teilnehmer entfernt worden sind (in diesem fall werden alle gelder innerhalb des shared space dem hauptkonto des besitzers gutgeschrieben). 
die erteilung der kontovollmacht hat zur folge, dass der jeweilige teilnehmer vollen zugriff auf das gesamte guthaben des shared space hat. das bedeutet, dass auch die teilnehmer eines shared spaces √ºber alle dort verbuchten gelder frei verf√ºgen k√∂nnen. die n26 bank gmbh kann nicht haftbar gemacht werden f√ºr zahlungen, die von einer kontovollmacht gedeckt sind. erfahre mehr

question: how to create a password?
answer: if you forgot your password or want to change it, select forgot? in the app or forgot your password?(new tab) in the webapp(new tab) during login. we‚Äôll send a link to your registered email address so you can create a new password. make sure your new password meets our requirements: we do not have a specific set of requirements for our passwords. we measure their strength on the fly and only accept passwords that are considered robust by our underlying algorithm. we tend to recommend to go with a ‚Äúpassphrase‚Äù rather than a password, and thus go by the common phrase ‚Äúhard to guess, easy to remember‚Äù.  if your password is not accepted by our system, try to add more special characters, numbers, and vary between upper- and lowercase letters. if you enter your password incorrectly six times in a row, you‚Äôll be temporarily blocked from your account. if this happens, try logging in again after 30 minutes. chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including sundays and bank holidays.

question: how to use my card digitally?
answer: you can make purchases with your smartphone: simply add your n26 card to your apple pay or google pay wallet in order to make purchases at merchants who support this payment method. you can enable this feature before your card arrives in the mail to start using your n26 account straight away but also once you have received your card and activated it. to add your card to your wallet follow these steps: login to your n26 accountgo to ‚Äôactions‚Äôselect ‚Äôcard settings‚Äô and swipe to select the card you want to addselect ‚Äôadd to apple pay‚Äô or ‚Äôadd to google pay‚Äô good to know: whilst waiting for your card to arrive this feature is available for 30 days after your physical card is being produced. if you don‚Äôt activate your card within the timeframe then this feature will be suspended. once you activate your card you will be able to continue using it digitally again.this feature is not enabled if you reorder your card or upgrade to a premium membership without blocking your current card. in these cases your current card will continue working with ‚Äôapple pay‚Äô or ‚Äôgoogle pay‚Äô until you activate your new card. if you need your card details but aren‚Äôt carrying your card with you at the moment then don‚Äôt worry. n26 allows you to view your complete card details in the mobile app if you have an active card and paired device. to view your card follow these steps: login to the n26 mobile appgo to ‚Äôactions‚Äôfrom your card list swipe until you see the card you want to usetap ‚Äôcard details‚Äôconfirm with your fingerprint, face id or phone lock pin you will be able to view your complete card details for 1 minute. please note, you won‚Äôt be able to take screenshots whilst your card details are being displayed.

question: am i liable to tax in the united states?
answer:
as a licensed bank we‚Äôre required to report directly to the irs information about financial accounts held by u.s. taxpayers according to fatca, a legislation designed by the us department of treasury and the u.s. internal revenue service to encourage better tax compliance by preventing u.s. persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid u.s. taxation on their income and assets. you can find more information about fatca here(new tab).  in the context of fatca, a u.s. person is defined as, among other things: a citizen of the united states (including dual citizens)a resident in the united states, for example as a holder of a valid u.s. green card or as a person who passes the ‚Äúsubstantial presence test‚Äù (see below). if you‚Äôre unsure as to how to determine whether you‚Äôre a u.s. person, please consult a tax advisor. ‚Äúsubstantial presence test‚Äù means: that you‚Äôve been physically present in the u.s. 183 days or more in the current calendar year or that you have been physically present in the u.s. 183 days or more over the last three calendar years, to be calculated as follows: 
 
(31 days or more in the current calendar year) + (the number of days physically present in the u.s. last year) divided by 3 + (the number of days physically present in the u.s. the year before last) divided by 6.  in addition, if your account shows any of the following: u.s. citizenship or u.s. residenceu.s. place of birthu.s. mailing or residence address, including u.s. po boxesu.s. telephone numberstanding instructions to a u.s. address or an account maintained in the us we‚Äôre still obliged to treat you as a u.s. person, unless we receive the following from you:  a w-8ben or similar agreed self-certification form anda non-u.s. passport or other government-issued identification evidencing your citizenship or nationality in a country other than the u.s.in case you were born in the us, a copy of your certificate of loss of nationality of the us.

question: cosa fare se il mio iban n26 non √® accettato?
answer: l‚Äôiban include il codice paese de, due cifre di controllo, le otto cifre del codice sort della banca e le dieci cifre del tuo numero di conto. per esempio: de xx 10011001 26xxxxxxxx. i paesi aderenti dell‚Äôarea sepa (single euro payments area - area unica dei pagamenti in euro) hanno concordato il sistema iban per semplificare i pagamenti nazionali e internazionali e ridurre il rischio di errore nelle comunicazione e nell‚Äôelaborazione delle transazioni. i commercianti e i datori di lavoro che non accettano i codici iban di altri stati membri dell‚Äôarea economica europea violano la legge europea del 1¬∞ febbraio 2016 (articolo 9 del regolamento ue 260/2012 (nuova tabella)). se hai subito discriminazioni sulla base dell‚Äôiban, contatta direttamente l‚Äôautorit√† nazionale(nuova tabella) competente del tuo paese (nuova tabella)e denuncia l‚Äôepisodio. fornisci i tuoi contatti, il nome del commerciante o dell‚Äôazienda che non ha accettato l‚Äôiban e una breve descrizione dell‚Äôaccaduto (incluso uno screenshot del rifiuto o altra documentazione rilevante).

question: was ist n26 savings?
answer: mit n26 savings kannst du kostenlos ein festgeldkonto mit einer einlage zwischen 2.000 ‚Ç¨ und 100.000 ‚Ç¨ er√∂ffnen. diese option findest du in der app im bereich entdecken und dann unter n26 finanzprodukte. du kannst nicht auf den eingezahlten betrag zugreifen, bis der sparplan f√§llig wird (3 bis 60 monate), aber du erh√§ltst w√§hrend dieser zeit bis zu 1,38% p.a. zinsen. danach erh√§ltst du die auszahlung direkt auf dein n26 konto. n26 savings wird durch die enge zusammenarbeit von drei unternehmen(neuen tab) mit verschiedenen partnerbanken m√∂glich gemacht. du musst die agb aller vier teilnehmer akzeptieren, um ein konto zu er√∂ffnen.aus regulatorischen gr√ºnden ben√∂tigen wir informationen √ºber deinen steuerstatus. wenn du in den vereinigten staaten steuerpflichtig sind, k√∂nnen wir dir unser sparprodukt derzeit nicht anbieten.du bist m√∂glicherweise zu einer steuerbefreiung qualifiziert. ist das der fall, f√ºlle unser formular(neuen tab) aus und chatte mit uns. wir leiten deine anfrage an unsere partnerbank weiter.sobald du dein sparkonto er√∂ffnest, wird der einmalige betrag von deinem girokonto abgebucht. bitte beachte, dass es bis zu sieben werktage dauern kann, bis dein konto er√∂ffnet wird.wenn der sparplan ausl√§uft, erh√§ltst du den eingezahlten betrag und die zinsen (abz√ºglich eventueller kapitalertragsteuer) innerhalb von zwei tagen deinem n26 konto gutgeschrieben.nach europ√§ischem recht sind alle mitgliedstaaten verpflichtet, eine einlagensicherung von bis zu 100.000 ‚Ç¨ pro person und bank zu gew√§hren. damit dieser schutz bei wechselkursschwankungen nicht unterschritten wird, haben wir ein zus√§tzliches limit f√ºr sparkonten in l√§ndern au√üerhalb der eurozone festgelegt. du willst deinen freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig geld verdienen? erhalte 15‚Ç¨ f√ºr jeden freund, dem du n26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. erfahre mehr √ºber unser freunde-empfehlungsprogramm.

question: why was i charged a direct debit fee?
answer: direct debits returned to your account due to insufficient funds* are charged a ‚Ç¨3 fee in accordance with our terms & conditions(new tab). if your balance becomes negative due to this fee, overdraft interest will also apply at a rate of 8.9%. you can avoid these fees by making sure you have enough funds in your account to cover incoming direct debits by 18:00 on the same business day. we suggest you use sepa instant credit transfers, moneybeam (between n26 accounts) or cash26 (if you live in germany, austria or italy) to transfer the amount due. with these three methods, the amount will be credited to your account instantly. if you don‚Äôt recognize a direct debit, you can request a refund in the app. *for non-euro countries only: if you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it‚Äôs the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. you can check the list of countries below: bulgariacroatiaczech republicdenmarkhungaryicelandliechtensteinnorwaypolandromaniaswedenswitzerland

question: how to order my card with express delivery?
answer: express delivery is a good option if you need your card in a hurry or if postal deliveries have sometimes failed to reach you for whatever reason. you‚Äôll be given the option to select express delivery when choosing a delivery method for your first card or if you reorder a card. you‚Äôll then receive a tracking link by email. if you‚Äôre not home during the delivery and your mailbox can‚Äôt be accessed, the card will be left at a nearby access point (you can find it through the provided tracking link). the card only stays at the access point for a limited amount of time. after that, it‚Äôll be returned to us. we‚Äôll inform you by email if that happens. if you order via express delivery, keep in mind that: your new standard, n26 you or metal mastercard will be delivered within 2-3 working days. deliveries take place between 08:00 and 12:00. deliveries can be made by dhl express to all of our supported countries within europe. it‚Äôs currently not possible to make deliveries to other countries.it‚Äôs not possible to cancel or change an express delivery once it‚Äôs been selected as the delivery method.to close an account, you must pay for the express delivery of your card. if your card hasn‚Äôt arrived within 3-5 working days of placing your order, please check the tracking link for an update. you can also use the tracking link to inform dhl directly about the details of your delivery address or to redirect the shipment if you can‚Äôt be there at the time of delivery. n26 standard and n26 you cards have a fee of ‚Ç¨10 for standard shipping and ‚Ç¨30 for express shipping (which includes the ‚Ç¨10 card replacement fee).

question: how does 3d secure work?
answer: 3d secure protects you from online card fraud. it‚Äôs automatically activated when you activate your card in the app. no additional passwords are required. whenever you make an online payment using your mastercard, 3d secure confirms the transaction with you within 5 minutes via a push message. if you don‚Äôt see the transaction, try some of the troubleshooting tips we‚Äôve collected. if you make a purchase using your smartphone, you‚Äôll see a pending transaction in the app. tap on the bell icon and the push message will appear for you to confirm and finalize your purchase. then go back to the merchant‚Äôs website. you should see a confirmation of your successful purchase within a few moments. want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to n26. learn more about our refer a friend program.

question: why was i charged twice?
answer: we offer you banking in real-time. this means you‚Äôre able to see the processes going on behind your account that you otherwise wouldn‚Äôt see. there are two main transaction types that take place during an in-store or online purchase: authorizations. a block or reserved amount made by a retailer or merchant. this includes anything from your morning cup of coffee to hotel or car rental bookings (including security deposits).presentments. the actual amount that is deducted from your account. again, that cup of coffee is finally cleared from your account or you can get your security deposit back once that hotel room or car is returned safe and sound. once an authorization has been confirmed, we can‚Äôt cancel or reverse it. at that point, a few things can happen to your authorization: it turns into a presentment, it‚Äôs rejected, or it expires (and automatically returns to your account after 12 days at the latest. car rental deposits may need up to 30 days to return to your account). keep in mind: sometimes you‚Äôll see both the authorization and the presentment if they become disconnected or due to technical issues at the payment terminal. eventually the authorization will expire. if it doesn‚Äôt, we can help get your money back.verification authorizations (usually very small amounts) are used to check whether your card is active. this money will return to your account.the amount of an authorization can differ from the final presentment for a variety of reasons.

question: how to make a sepa transfer?
answer:
‚ÑπÔ∏è you can send debit transfers to any country within the sepa zone (if the receiving bank accepts euros). outgoing debit transfers can be made in either the n26 app or our web app. from the home screen choose the actions tab,

enter the recipient‚Äôs name and iban and select continue,
choose the amount and select next,

check the transfer review screen (which sums up the transfer),
here you can also schedule the date of your transfer and save it as a standing order,
press send and confirm with your confirmation pin. you‚Äôll then need to either confirm or cancel the transfer via push notification in the app from your paired device. once the transfer was confirmed in the mobile app, we can‚Äôt reverse it or change the recipient‚Äôs details. if you cannot confirm your debit transfer within the app you need to: ensure that you have a stable internet connection.ensure that your mobile phone has push notifications enabled. this is done through the phone settings, not in our app.ensure that you use your paired device. once your debit transfer is sent you‚Äôll be able to download a pdf confirmation of it. to do so: go to your transactions list.
locate and select the specific debit transfer.
scroll down to the transaction information and tap pdf by selecting transfer confirmation.

question: ¬øpor qu√© me han cobrado dos veces?
answer: ofrecemos banking en tiempo real. esto significa que puedes ver todo lo que est√° ocurriendo en tu cuenta en todo momento. hay dos tipos de transacciones que se dan durante una compra, tanto en tienda como online: autorizaci√≥n. un importe bloqueado o una reserva hecha por un comercio. esto incluye desde el caf√© que te tomas por la ma√±ana hasta la reserva de hotel o el coche de alquiler (incluyendo dep√≥sitos de seguridad).presentaci√≥n del pago. el importe real que ha sido deducido de tu cuenta; el caf√© se ha cobrado del todo, o bien te han devuelto el dep√≥sito tras terminar tu estancia en el hotel o devolver el coche sano y salvo. una vez que la autorizaci√≥n se ha confirmado, no podemos cancelarla o revocarla. en este momento solo pueden pasar tres cosas con tu autorizaci√≥n: se convierte en una presentaci√≥n, es rechazada o caduca (y autom√°ticamente vuelve a tu cuenta en un m√°ximo de 12 d√≠as). las cantidades bloqueadas como dep√≥sito por alquiler de un coche pueden tardar hasta 30 d√≠as en volver a tu cuenta. recuerda: en ocasiones ver√°s ambas, la autorizaci√≥n y la presentaci√≥n del pago, esto ocurre si se desconectan o existen problemas t√©cnicos en el terminal de pago. finalmente, la autorizaci√≥n acabar√° caducando. si no caduca en 12 d√≠as, podemos ayudarte a recuperar tu dinero.verificar autorizaciones (normalmente cantidades muy peque√±as), las cuales sirven para comprobar si tu tarjeta est√° activa. este dinero acabar√° volviendo a tu saldo disponible.la cantidad de una autorizaci√≥n puede ser diferente a la presentaci√≥n final por varias razones.

transazioni inviate a uno spazio specifico e quelle ricevute da esso.solo il tuo spazio principale (conto corrente principale) pu√≤ avere un saldo negativo, nel caso in cui lo scoperto di conto sia attuale verr√† aggiornato subito dopo.puoi bloccare e sbloccare uno space in qualsiasi momento dal tuo dispositivo mobile e dalla tua app web. dovrai solo confermare l‚Äôoperazione con il tuo pin di conferma. se uno space √® bloccato, sarai comunque in grado di trasferire denaro verso di esso. se devi prelevare denaro da uno space bloccato, dovrai prima sbloccarlo.puoi anche aprire i dettagli della transazione dalla lista movimenti spaces, esattamente come nel tuo conto principale.puoi tenere nascosto il saldo presente in uno space al saldo totale sul conto. per fare questo, entra nello question: shared spaces - what is a power of attorney?
answer: the legal model behind shared spaces is called power of attorney (kontovollmacht in german).  participants of a shared space do not have equal ownership of the account like a joint account in the traditional banking sense. after receiving power of attorney the participants obtain the right to act on behalf of the owner regarding any transfer of funds within the shared space. the person authorizing the other to act on his behalf is called the ‚Äúowner‚Äù, this person is the only account holder. the owner must be a n26 premium account holder e.g. n26 you, n26 metal and n26 business you. this means that whoever created the shared space is its legal owner. the owner of a shared space:  owns all the funds within a shared space. can transfer funds freely in and out of the account anytime. can invite people to the shared space by granting others power of attorney.can revoke the power of attorney of a participant at any time.can also close a shared space after removing a participant. (all funds in the shared space will be transferred to the owner‚Äôs main account) by granting a person power of attorney, they‚Äôll have full access to all the money held within a shared space. this means that each participant can also transfer funds freely in and out of the shared space.   n26 bank gmbh cannot be held liable for payments covered by the power of attorney. learn more

question: how to activate my card?
answer:
once you receive your physical card, you‚Äôll need to activate it. you can do this in the app only after you connect your smartphone to your account. or you can activate it directly from the web app(new tab).  you‚Äôll need your 10-digit token number: it‚Äôs found below your name on the front of your card (or on the back if you have an n26 you, n26 metal, or maestro card).  to activate your card on the n26 app, from the home screen:go to the actions tab,select cards settings and swipe until you see the card you want to activate,tap activate.
to activate your card on the web app, just select activate card from the home screen. if you live in france, spain, ireland, greece, finland, or estonia you must make a first atm withdrawal to fully activate your card. if you have multiple cards (for example, you ordered your card more than once or your delivery was delayed), you can only activate your most recent card. all other cards will be disabled. you‚Äôll need to follow these activation steps every time you reorder a new card, like if your card is lost, stolen, broken, or you upgrade your account.    after you activate your card, the next step is choosing a card pin.

question: why didn't i receive my pairing code via sms?
answer: a pairing code is required to connect your smartphone to your account. if you didn‚Äôt receive this code via sms for whatever reason, you can request a new one up to five times in the mobile app. please wait 30 seconds before requesting a new one.  if all five codes are requested and pairing is still unsuccessful, then for security reasons you‚Äôll be blocked from making further requests for 24 hours. if this happens, you can either wait or contact our customer support via chat - who would be happy to help you. if your country code is outside of the eu, it‚Äôs likely that you‚Äôll need to contact us to receive a pairing code.

question: how to use google pay?

question: what to do if i can't repay my overdraft or loan?
answer: we offer repayment plans if you can‚Äôt repay your overdraft or loan with n26 credit. this could happen because your overdraft was cancelled or you need more than two months to repay your negative amount. here‚Äôs how it works: chat with us and propose a detailed plan on how you‚Äôre going to pay back your overdraft or loan in instalments, such as a certain amount every month until your loan is paid off. we don‚Äôt accept offers of simply paying back the whole sum at a later date. we will then either accept, reject, or propose an alternative plan. it‚Äôs then up to you to confirm it. by the way: your account will be closed if it‚Äôs negative for an extended period of time. all closure dates are final unless you pay back your loan before this date. if not, your debt will go to a collection agency.

question: how to manage my visibility as an n26 user?
answer: to grant you access to all our in-app features, n26 matches your contact data with other n26 users. in order to manage your consent to be seen as a n26 user, you can simply go to üë§ my account in the app and selecting settings then personal settings and personal information. then just check or uncheck the box ‚Äúi agree to be identifiable for other users as n26 customer‚Äù. all of your contacts who have an n26 account set to visible will show up in the in-app contact list. similarly, you‚Äôll also appear in the list of other n26 customers who have your contact information. your contact list is not permanently stored by n26 and is only used when accessing the respective n26 feature. you can access to all our in-app features, e.g. moneybeam, which carries out real-time transactions without typing in a 22-digit iban, but only by selecting a name from your contact list. vice versa, you can also request money from people in your contact list who then only have to accept (or decline) your request. also, being visible enables you to use shared spaces, a sub-account, which you can share with other n26 users selected from your contact list.

question: what to do if my n26 iban is not accepted?
answer: your iban includes the 2 digit country code (e.g. de), a two-digit check number, the eight-digit bank sort code, and your ten-digit account number. for example: de xx 10011001 26xxxxxxxx. the participating countries of the sepa area (single euro payments area) have agreed on the iban system in order to simplify national and international payments, and to reduce the risk of error in the communication and processing of transactions. merchants or employers who do not accept ibans from other member states of the european economic area are violating european law as of 1 february 2016 (article 9 of regulation no 260/2012(new tab)). if you are ever affected by iban discrimination, please contact your relevant national authority(new tab) directly and notify them. provide your contact details, the name of the merchant or company that didn‚Äôt accept your iban, as well as a brief description of the incident (including a screenshot of the rejection or other documentation of your communication with them).

question: crs - warum wir bestimmte informationen von dir ben√∂tigen
answer:
n26 ist als reguliertes finanzinstitut gem√§√ü des common reporting standard (crs) dazu verpflichtet, steuerlichen beh√∂rden in der europ√§ischen union informationen √ºber kundenkonten zur verf√ºgung zu stellen, deren inhaber in anderen l√§ndern steuerpflichtig sind. der crs wurde von der oecd (organization for economic cooperation and development) entwickelt und ist ein globaler standard f√ºr den automatischen austausch von informationen (aeoi). das ziel des crs ist es, zur bek√§mpfung von steuerhinterziehung beizutragen, indem er steuerlichen beh√∂rden den bestand im ausland befindlicher verm√∂genswerte tranparenter macht. mehr als 90 l√§nder haben sich erkl√§rt, im rahmen des crs informationen ihrer einwohner √ºber ihre verm√∂genswerte und einkommen zu teilen. damit wir feststellen k√∂nnen, ob ein konto den steuerlichen beh√∂rden zwecks crs mitzuteilen ist, m√ºssen wir dich fragen: in welchem land du als steuerpflichtige person giltst:
normalerweise giltst du als steuerpflichtige person desjenigen landes, in dem deine wohnadresse liegt. wenn du mehrere wohnadressen in verschiedenen l√§ndern hast, greifen f√ºr gew√∂hnlich bestimmte entscheidungsregeln, die in den steuerabkommen und steuergesetzen der betreffenden l√§nder festgehalten sind. es kann vorkommen, dass du in mehreren l√§ndern steuerpflichtig bist. wenn dieser fall gegeben ist, m√ºssen wir wissen, um welche l√§nder es sich handelt und wie deine entsprechenden identifikationsnummern als steuerzahler lauten, damit wir den steuerlichen beh√∂rden zuverl√§ssige informationen zur verf√ºgung stellen k√∂nnen.
wie deine steuer-identifikationsnummer (‚Äútin‚Äù) lautet:
die zuteilung und das format der tin variiert zwischen den l√§ndern. die eu hat eine anleitung(neuen tab) zur identifikation der tins ihrer mitgliedstaaten ver√∂ffentlicht, mit der du deine individuelle(n) tin(s) in den verschiedenen l√§ndern identifizieren kannst. falls sich deine lebenslage ver√§ndert, kannst deine steuerinformationen in der n26 app jederzeit anpassen. logge dich daf√ºr einfach in deine n26 app ein, und gehe zum bereich: mein konto > einstellungen > pers√∂nliche einstellungen > steuerdaten, und aktualisiere dort deine informationen.

question: how to get push messages?
answer: we send you push messages to finalize transfers (such as moneybeam) or to confirm a service (as with cash26- please note this is only available in germany, austria, italy). if you aren‚Äôt receiving these messages, first check that notifications are enabled for both your phone and the app. then try some of our troubleshooting suggestions, depending on your smartphone: ios: delete the app and restart your smartphone. download and install the latest version of the app from the apple app store and connect your smartphone again.check whether you‚Äôre logged into your n26 app.make sure messaging for the app has been activated in the general settings of your smartphone. android: delete the app and restart your smartphone. download and install the latest version of the app from the google play store and connect your smartphone again.go to your account settings and activate notification by tapping app settings then notifications.huawei and xiaomi: go to settings then advanced settings and battery settings. then set n26 as a protected app.oneplus: select battery optimization then the n26 app and then don‚Äôt optimize.oppo: disable battery optimization for the app and lock it in the recent apps overview.

question: how can i credit my salary on my n26 account?
answer: having your salary credited to your n26 account is easy, simply provide your n26 iban to your employer, who‚Äôll transfer the amount to your account via sepa transfer. sepa transfers are the official payment method of the sepa area, which includes most of the european countries. in case your employer refuses to credit your salary through sepa transfer because you have a german iban and not an italian one, please check the "what to do if my n26 iban is not accepted" article on our support center.

question: who can get a basiskonto?
answer: you can open a free n26 bank account through our website or by downloading our app.  the german payment accounts act (zahlungskontengesetz or zkg) also gives all consumers who legally reside in the european union the right to hold a basic payment account. this applies to those who live in a supported country. the n26 basiskonto comes with a monthly 6‚Ç¨ account management fee. you can find all other fees in our pricing lists.  if you don‚Äôt have a bank account at n26 or at any other financial institution in germany yet, you can apply. under some circumstances, n26 is allowed to reject your request.   please note that some products and services such as n26 overdraft, n26 credit, n26 you, or n26 metal are not accessible with an n26 basiskonto.

question: wie bekomme ich einen kredit?
answer: mit n26 credit haben wir eine partnerschaft mit auxmoney (in deutschland) und younited credit (in frankreich) geschlossen, um privatkredite zwischen 1.000 und 50.000 ‚Ç¨ mit einer laufzeit von 6 bis 84 monaten anzubieten. beantrage jederzeit ein darlehen direkt in der app im bereich entdecken und dann unter n26 finanzprodukte. wir stellen dir einige fragen zum darlehen und zu deiner kreditw√ºrdigkeit (du musst zus√§tzliche onlinebanking-informationen angeben, wenn du n26 weniger als 6 monate genutzt hast).weise deine identit√§t nach. wir ben√∂tigen deinen personalausweis oder reisepass in deutschland und eventuell deinen wohnsitznachweis (in form einer stromrechnung o. √§.). als nicht-eu-b√ºrger musst du uns ein foto deiner aufenthaltsgenehmigung schicken.bearbeite deine antworten w√§hrend des antragsprozesses. wenn du mit deinem kreditantrag zufrieden bist, sende ihn in echtzeit an uns und wir machen dir ein verbindliches angebot, das du l√∂schen oder annehmen kannst. andernfalls verfallen die antr√§ge in 90 tagen und du kannst w√§hrend dieser zeit keinen weiteren kredit beantragen.best√§tige deinen kredit. wenn du unser angebot annimmst, musst du den vertrag entweder elektronisch per videoanruf unterzeichnen oder per sms best√§tigen.du erh√§ltst eine push-nachricht, sobald die auszahlung erfolgt ist. in deutschland wird der kreditbetrag in 5-7 werktagen deinem n26 konto gutgeschrieben. in frankreich dauert die auszahlung eine woche. wir bieten zinss√§tze zwischen 1,99% und 19% p. a. an. au√üer den zinsen fallen keine weiteren kosten an. wenn du jedoch deinen plan √§nderst oder mit deinen monatlichen zahlungen in verzug bist, k√∂nnen zus√§tzliche geb√ºhren anfallen. weitere informationen findest du in den agb(neuen tab) zu n26 credit.

question: how to prove my identity?
answer: as a licensed bank, it‚Äôs important that we know who our customers are. that‚Äôs why we request our customers to prove their identity with a supported id document when they open an account or use certain products. we would never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. we‚Äôve gathered other tips to help you protect your identity. there are two different ways you can show us your id, and we‚Äôve also collected some troubleshooting tips for each: photo and video. the method you can choose to show us your id depends on your nationality, your country of residence, and the type of id you use: i live in germany(new tab)i live in spain(new tab)i live in italy(new tab)i live in a different country(new tab) if your id isn‚Äôt on the list, it means we cannot offer you an account with us at the time. we take identity verification very seriously and our customer support will not be able to make an exception for you regarding the supported documents. but we‚Äôre always adding new documents to this list so it‚Äôs worth checking back to see if yours has been added. in case your residential address is in germany and you‚Äôre unable to complete your photo or video verification due to a disability, please start the registration process by entering your details and then contact our customer support. we‚Äôre happy to assist you. chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including sundays and bank holidays.

question: why was i charged twice?
answer: we offer you banking in real-time. this means you‚Äôre able to see the processes going on behind your account that you otherwise wouldn‚Äôt see. there are two main transaction types that take place during an in-store or online purchase: authorizations. a block or reserved amount made by a retailer or merchant. this includes anything from your morning cup of coffee to hotel or car rental bookings (including security deposits).presentments. the actual amount that is deducted from your account. again, that cup of coffee is finally cleared from your account or you can get your security deposit back once that hotel room or car is returned safe and sound. once an authorization has been confirmed, we can‚Äôt cancel or reverse it. at that point, a few things can happen to your authorization: it turns into a presentment, it‚Äôs rejected, or it expires (and automatically returns to your account after 12 days at the latest. car rental deposits may need up to 30 days to return to your account). keep in mind: sometimes you‚Äôll see both the authorization and the presentment if they become disconnected or due to technical issues at the payment terminal. eventually the authorization will expire. if it doesn‚Äôt, we can help get your money back.verification authorizations (usually very small amounts) are used to check whether your card is active. this money will return to your account.the amount of an authorization can differ from the final presentment for a variety of reasons.

question: perch√© i pagamenti contactless non funzionano?
answer:
non √® possibile disattivare i pagamenti contactless. se dovessero verificarsi problemi con i pagamenti contactless, considera che: per attivare i pagamenti contactless, √® necessario prima utilizzare la carta presso uno sportello bancomat o un pos.
le transazioni fino a 50‚Ç¨ non richiedono il pin della carta*. per importi superiori a tale cifra, dovrai inserire il pin della carta.  *se la modalit√† di pagamento offerta del venditore supporta questa opzione. assicurati di tenere la carta direttamente su un pos compatibile con nfc. se la carta viene rimossa troppo velocemente o se non viene tenuta abbastanza vicina al pos, la transazione potrebbe avere esito negativo: prova di nuovo.
le carte n26 metal hanno la funzione nfc sul retro della carta. assicurati di tenere il retro della carta sul pos per usare l‚Äônfc (usando la parte anteriore, il pagamento non andr√† a buon fine). se il pagamento contactless non funzionasse, ti consigliamo di inserire la tua carta nel pos e digitare il pin.

question: how to top up my account?
answer: once you are successfully verified, you‚Äôll be able to top up your account in several ways. to do so, simply go to the n26 app and select ‚Äôadd money‚Äô to see the available options: 1. sepa transfer (up to 2 business days): the transfer must be in eur and within the sepa zone.you will need to provide your iban and your name as it is written on the id you used to create your account.if you have a business account, please keep in mind that we do not accept company names. 2. debit or credit card (instant): you can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 150‚Ç¨.the first deposit is free. the following deposits charge a fee of 3% of the deposit amount.simply enter the card details from the sending account. please note, prepaid cards and american express credit cards are not accepted. 3. apple pay or google pay (instant): you can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 150‚Ç¨.the first deposit is free. the following deposits charge a fee of 3% of the deposit amount.simply enter the card details (credit or debit) linked to the apple pay or google pay account. please note, prepaid cards and american express credit cards are not accepted. 4. moneybeam (instant): you can receive money from other n26 users. 5. cash26 (instant): available in germany, austria and italy.deposit cash through our partner stores once your card is activated and with your paired device.

question: how to create and manage standing orders?
answer: when setting up an outgoing transfer in either the n26 app or web app you‚Äôll have the option to make it a standing order. once you complete the outgoing transfer you‚Äôll then be prompted to tick a box which will create a standing order. after you‚Äôve inputted the amount of the transfer and its recipient, under the reference text field select "want to save this as a standing order?". from here you‚Äôll be able to set the start/end dates of the standing order and choose its payment intervals. to view your scheduled transfers and standing orders directly in the mobile app: go to your transaction list (the main screen).then tap on the 3 dots located in the upper right corner for android and on the top of the transaction list for ios. a small window will pop, where you will be able to select "standing orders". here you can cancel and/or modify the details of your standing order. to cancel it just tap the standing order you wish to delete and tap the trash icon in the top right-hand corner. ‚ÑπÔ∏è  please note, if a standing order fails due to insufficient funds we won‚Äôt attempt the transfer again - you‚Äôll need to manually send the transfer, however the next scheduled transfers will proceed as normal.

question: how to file a complaint?

looking for support or have a question if you don‚Äôt wish to make a complaint but you have questions about our products or need help with your account, we‚Äôre always happy to assist. you can email us at support@n26.com(new tab) (new tab), or just open a chat with us directly within the mobile app or webapp, that‚Äôs the fastest and simplest way to get in touch. raising a complaint we‚Äôre sorry you feel the need to raise a complaint, please see below for the ways you are able to do this.  if you are dissatisfied with one of our products or services, you can send us an email from your registered email address* or send your complaint via post to the address to: n26 bank gmbh ‚Äì complaint management

arrangements, debit card charges and more. in the event that it is not possible for us to respect the time limit of 15 days, n26 will send an holding answer indicating the reasons for the delay and the deadline within which the definitive answer will be provided, in any case within the maximum time frame of 35 working days. if you are unhappy with the outcome of your complaint if you are not question: how do i return a sepa transfer to its sender?
answer: from the 17th march, customers from other banks can request‚Äîat their bank institution‚Äîthe return of a sepa transfer from an n26 customer. the sender of a sepa transfer can now request the recall of their funds from the receiving n26 account by reaching out to the sender bank. this request appears to n26 customers in the form of a push notification on their paired device. similarly to confirming a debit transfer in the n26 app, you‚Äôll then have the option to reject or accept the credit transfer recall. if you do not confirm or reject the transfer recall request after 15 days, the request is rejected automatically. once the transfer recall is accepted, the funds will leave your account and you cannot request them back. if you don‚Äôt have sufficient funds in your main account, you‚Äôll not be able to confirm the transfer recall.

question: psd2 - strong customer authentication
answer: sca acts as an additional layer of security for all n26 customers by providing two-factor authentication (2fa). this is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. you‚Äôre probably familiar with using just your personal password to sign in to your account but with two-factor authentication you‚Äôll need either confirmation from a paired device or an sms code. when you log into your n26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you‚Äôll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or you can request an sms code to be sent to your registered number to confirm your login attempt. this ensures that only you can log into your n26 account.  when you log into your n26 account from your paired device, two-factor authentication is already in motion. therefore, the process of logging into your n26 account from your paired device stays the same. sca is being introduced as part of the revised european payments services directive (psd2) which applies to all european banks. the objective of psd2 is to enhance the security of the customers‚Äô data and account security. find out more about psd2 in our dedicated article about the psd2.  faqs first, try update your phone to the newest version. if you still cannot log into your account but still have access to your registered email address, please try to reset your password. if you don‚Äôt have access to your registered email address, please contact us via our live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out.  if you lost access to your paired device but you still have access to your registered phone number, please log into your n26 account and request an authentication code. to do this: login to the webappwhen prompted to confirm your login on your paired device, select help choose send sms codeonce you receive the sms code, input it into the webapp as you confirm the authentication code you‚Äôve completed two-factor authentication and you‚Äôll be able to pair your new device with your account again. if you don‚Äôt have access to your registered phone number - either because you have a new phone number or your phone was lost or stolen - please contact our customer service via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out.  if you have an older smartphone device that doesn‚Äôt support the latest app version,  you won‚Äôt be able to access n26 via the mobile app anymore using your phone.  you can still use our webapp to view your account, to do this you‚Äôll need to confirm your login attempt via an sms verification code which we‚Äôll send to your account‚Äôs registered phone number.  you‚Äôll still be able to complete card transactions and cash withdrawals as normal using your mastercard but bear in mind that you won‚Äôt be able to perform any bank transfers or payments until you can confirm the transfer within the n26 app.

question: was kann ich tun, wenn mein konto gehackt wurde?

question: how does spaces work?

question: fatca - perch√© richiediamo alcune informazioni da te?
answer: come previsto dalla normativa fatca, n26 ha l‚Äôobbligo di fornire informazioni finanziarie al dipartimento del tesoro e all‚Äôinternal revenue service (irs) degli stati uniti sui conti di contribuenti statunitensi e di societ√† estere in cui contribuenti statunitensi detengono interessi considerevoli. la normativa fatca (foreign account tax compliance act) √® stata introdotta dall‚Äôirs con lo scopo di prevenire l‚Äôevasione fiscale di contribuenti statunitensi mediante l‚Äôapertura di conti presso istituti finanziari esteri. puoi trovare maggiori informazioni sulla normativa fatca sul sito www.irs.gov(nuova tabella)  a differenza della maggior parte dei paesi del mondo, il sistema fiscale statunitense prevede la tassazione dei propri cittadini anche nei casi in cui abbiano la residenza fiscale all‚Äôestero.   per stabilire se il tuo conto deve essere riportato all‚Äôirs, abbiamo bisogno delle seguenti informazioni: essere ‚Äúsoggetto a tasse‚Äù negli stati uniti non significa necessariamente pagare imposte sul reddito negli stati uniti. implica, piuttosto, che le normative fiscali richiedono la compilazione della dichiarazione dei redditi (inerente tutti i redditi percepiti al di fuori degli stati uniti) da presentare all‚Äôirs.  puoi fornire il tuo social security number (ssn) statunitense oppure il tuo individual taxpayer identification number (itin).  ti informiamo, inoltre, che se il tuo conto presenta un luogo di nascita statunitense, un numero di telefono statunitense oppure se hai impostato un ordine permanente verso gli stati uniti, secondo la normativa fatca, verrai considerato un soggetto ai sensi del fatca fino a quando non verr√† dimostrato il contrario.  nel caso si presentassero variazioni della tua situazione personale, potrai aggiornare le tue informazioni fiscali in qualunque momento tramite la app di n26. baster√† eseguire l‚Äôaccesso > il mio conto > impostazioni > impostazioni personali > informazioni fiscali.

methods. check out our article "how do i add money to my n26 account?(new tab)" to learn more.next, we will ship out your n26 visa¬Æ debit card by usps.look out for delivery within 5-7 business days. that‚Äôs all there is to it. if you would like more information, just reach out to our fantastic customer support team via phone, chat, or email.  call us at 1-888-n26-0-n26 (1-888-626-0626).chat directly from the n26 mobile app or webapp.(new tab) email us at support-us@n26.com(new tab). have questions about opening an n26 account in another country? click here(new tab) to be taken to our eu support center to learn more.

(applies to germany, austria, france, italy, spain, finland, ireland, iceland, greece, liechtenstein, luxembourg, portugal, slovakia, estonia, belgium, poland, norway, netherlands, sweden, denmark, and switzerland) apple pay allows you to make payments with your smartphone so you don‚Äôt have to carry your mastercard everywhere. we‚Äôve made a video(new tab) to help you set up your n26 mastercard with apple pay. some tips to keep in mind: your iphone region matches the country where your mastercard was first shipped to (you can check your region by selecting settings then general and language & region in your phone).

question: crs - why we require certain information from our customers
answer:
n26 as a financial institution is (according to crs) required to report information directly to tax authorities in the european union concerning financial accounts held by customers who are tax resident in another country. crs stands for common reporting standard. the crs has been developed by the organization for economic cooperation and development (oecd) and is a global reporting standard for the automatic exchange of information (aeoi). the goal of crs is to allow tax authorities to obtain a clearer understanding of financial assets held abroad by their residents for tax purposes in order to fight tax evasion. more than 90 countries have agreed to share information on residents‚Äô assets and incomes in conformation with crs. in order for us to be able to accurately determine whether an account is to be reported to the tax authorities for crs purposes, we need to ask you: in which country(ies) are you a tax resident? 

you are normally a ‚Äútax resident‚Äù and therefore subject to tax on your worldwide income in the country where you have a residential address. if you have a place to live in more than one country, then there are normally ‚Äútie-breaker rules‚Äù included in double tax treaties and tax laws of the relevant countries that help determine where you are a tax resident. it may be that you are tax resident in more than one country during a year and, if so, we‚Äôd need to know both the country and your taxpayer identification number for each of them in order to accurately report the information to the relevant tax authorities. 
what is your taxpayer identification number (‚Äútin‚Äù) for each country?

the issuance and format of a tin differs by country. for eu countries, the european commission has published guidance on tins in each eu country(new tab), which may help you in identifying your individual tin(s) in these countries.  in case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the n26 app. to do this, simply log in to the n26 app and go to: my account > settings > personal settings > tax information

question: how do i add money to my n26 account?
answer: we make it easy to fund your n26 account. you can add money via several methods, including direct deposit, transfer from external bank, and debit card transfer, to name a few. please see below for more information.  direct deposit: if you intend to fund your account via direct deposit, you have a few options. simply provide the sender (your employer, financial institution, armed forces, social security, etc.) with our aba routing number (122287675) and your personal n26 account number. you can locate your account number by clicking on the ‚Äúmy account‚Äù option on the top right side of the website (and the mobile application) after logging into your n26 account.you can fill out a direct deposit form directly in the n26 mobile application and print it or share it electronically. find out how here(new tab).in case your employer needs a physical direct deposit form, you can download one from our support center here(new tab). transfer from external bank: transfer funds from your external bank into your n26 account, conveniently, from within the n26 mobile application. to transfer funds to your n26 account using the n26 mobile application, follow these steps (note: if you have not yet linked an external bank to your n26 account, please read our article "transfer from external bank(new tab)‚Äù to find out how): launch your n26 mobile application.tap the "actions" button at the bottom right of your mobile‚Äôs screen.tap on "add money".tap "external bank transfer".select the account to use to transfer funds from.enter the amount you want to transfer.tap "continue".enter your 4-digit confirmation pin.tap "confirm transfer" to initiate the transfer.a message will be displayed in your transaction list indicating that the transfer is scheduled. ach transfer:  transfer funds directly from your primary bank account into your n26 account with an ach transfer. (note: this method is different from transfer from external bank in that you will initiate the transfer from your third-party bank account. this funding method may be a good option if you were unable to set up transfer from external bank successfully.) log into your financial institution‚Äôs online banking platform or mobile app (if applicable).locate the ‚Äúexternal transfers‚Äù or ‚Äútransfer money‚Äù or ‚Äúexternal account‚Äù or similar option and add your n26 checking account as a new account. (the bank account originating the transfer does not have to be under your name. however, please make sure that the recipient‚Äôs name is your full name as entered during the account sign-up process).input our aba routing number (122287675) and your personal checking account number. (you can locate your account number by clicking on the ‚Äúmy account‚Äù option on the top right side of the website or by clicking the icon in the mobile app, after logging into your n26 account).your financial institution may make a small test deposit(s) into your n26 account, within a few days, to verify your account. typically, to complete the process, you may have to confirm the test deposit(s) with the originating financial institution.upon completing the initial process, you should be able to transfer funds in or out of your n26 account using the third party banks fund transfer feature.  note:  please be advised that these are general guidelines and your financial institution‚Äôs requirements may differ.some banks may experience issues processing money transfers to the routing number 122287675. at this time, ach bank transfers from capital one and from usaa are not available to fund your n26 account. if you encounter this issue, please use another bank account to transfer money into your n26 account. top-up: you can use a debit card (via manual entry, apple pay¬Æ, or google pay¬Æ) to instantly fund your account right from the n26 mobile application. this is the fastest way to add money to your n26 account. we charge no fees for your first transfer by this method, but we do charge a fee for subsequent such transfers. in addition, if the account associated with the funding debit card contains funds insufficient to cover the transfer, the debit card‚Äôs issuing bank may charge you an overdraft fee or decline the transaction. you can find out more about top-up here(new tab). moneybeam:  instantly send money to (or receive money from) other n26 members. find additional details in our "what is moneybeam?(new tab)" article.  third party payment processors: put money into your account using these services: cash app(new tab)paypal(new tab)venmo(new tab)zelle(new tab)¬Æingo money(new tab) (mobile check cashing service) apple cash¬Æ:  you can transfer money from apple cash¬Æ into your n26 account. you can link your n26 card to apple cash¬Æ by following these steps: open "wallet" on your apple device.select "apple cash¬Æ".tap the three dots on the upper right hand corner.select "add money".select "add card".position your n26 card in the frame to scan.tap "next" when the scan is complete.enter your card‚Äôs 3-digit security code.tap "next".your card is now linked. transferring money to your n26 account from apple cash¬Æ can be achieved by following these steps: select "transfer to bank".enter the amount you want to transfer.select how quickly you want the money transferred."instant transfer".  there is a fee associated with this option."1-3 business days".  there is no charge for this option.done.

question: psd2 - strong customer authentication
answer: sca acts as an additional layer of security for all n26 customers by providing two-factor authentication (2fa). this is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. you‚Äôre probably familiar with using just your personal password to sign in to your account but with two-factor authentication you‚Äôll need either confirmation from a paired device or an sms code. when you log into your n26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you‚Äôll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or you can request an sms code to be sent to your registered number to confirm your login attempt. this ensures that only you can log into your n26 account.  when you log into your n26 account from your paired device, two-factor authentication is already in motion. therefore, the process of logging into your n26 account from your paired device stays the same. sca is being introduced as part of the revised european payments services directive (psd2) which applies to all european banks. the objective of psd2 is to enhance the security of the customers‚Äô data and account security. find out more about psd2 in our dedicated article about the psd2.  faqs first, try update your phone to the newest version. if you still cannot log into your account but still have access to your registered email address, please try to reset your password. if you don‚Äôt have access to your registered email address, please contact us via our live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out.  if you lost access to your paired device but you still have access to your registered phone number, please log into your n26 account and request an authentication code. to do this: login to the webappwhen prompted to confirm your login on your paired device, select help choose send sms codeonce you receive the sms code, input it into the webapp as you confirm the authentication code you‚Äôve completed two-factor authentication and you‚Äôll be able to pair your new device with your account again. if you don‚Äôt have access to your registered phone number - either because you have a new phone number or your phone was lost or stolen - please contact our customer service via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out.  if you have an older smartphone device that doesn‚Äôt support the latest app version,  you won‚Äôt be able to access n26 via the mobile app anymore using your phone.  you can still use our webapp to view your account, to do this you‚Äôll need to confirm your login attempt via an sms verification code which we‚Äôll send to your account‚Äôs registered phone number.  you‚Äôll still be able to complete card transactions and cash withdrawals as normal using your mastercard but bear in mind that you won‚Äôt be able to perform any bank transfers or payments until you can confirm the transfer within the n26 app.

question: why does n26 do checks on transactions?
answer:
we have the responsibility to run routine checks on accounts and transactions in order to ensure your account‚Äôs security (see gwg ¬ß 10(new tab)). these checks are automatically initiated by our systems.  as a result, we may ask you to provide some documents. if you receive such a request, please send the requested documents via messages from n26. there are no exceptions or evasion for such checks.  this practice is a standard banking procedure and ensures the safety of our customers. both the process and the result are confidential and handled internally. here are some tips to speed up the process: the document that we need you to provide will be exactly named in the message you‚Äôll receive from n26. you can send us scanned documents, pictures, or screenshots, as long as the original content of the document is easily readable. please make sure to also provide a detailed description. be precise in your answers, details, and documents. after we receive your required proof and description, we will let you know if your reply fulfills our check. in a few cases, we might ask for further clarification which could prolong the process.reply as soon as possible, always before the deadline stated in the message you received from n26. use that email to reply and send attachments. our customer support doesn‚Äôt have any additional information on this subject.you must provide valid documentation depending on your situation. 
 find here some examples: you‚Äôve received financial help from your family to complete projects or have inherited land or money from deceased relatives.
a granting/loan contract, an official document of inheritance, or an official document of the source of the loan (such as the sales documents of a sold property to finance the loan or bank statements of granting relatives).you‚Äôve sold a property or your shares on the stock market.
the contract showing the agreed transactions or the official notarial documentation of the transfer of property.you‚Äôve received or sent money to pay bills or buy a product.
documents showing the balance statements confirming the source of this money or documents showing the use of the money and its purpose.you‚Äôve received a final payout from your previous employer.
documents proving the end of your employment, detailing the payment and/or a bank statement from your previous employer.

question: quanto tempo richiedono i trasferimenti?

question: how long does it take to send money with transferwise?
answer: once you‚Äôve initiated your transfer via transferwise you‚Äôll be given an estimated time frame. when making a transfer, ensure that the recipients name exactly matches the name on their bank account!  if a transferwise transfer fails, we‚Äôll notify you via push message. the amount will automatically be returned to your account a few days later. you can‚Äôt personally cancel a transfer, but if you get in touch with transferwise support this way they can cancel the transfer for you. keep in mind that the transfer can only be cancelled up until the point transferwise pays out your funds. once the money has been sent to the recipient, it‚Äôs not possible to cancel the transfer anymore. the recipients details can only be changed up until the point that transferwise has paid out your money. after your money has been paid out, the recipients details can no longer be changed. you can get in touch with transferwise this way. transferwise doesn‚Äôt charge extra fees for a returned payment and neither do we. however, some participating banks do charge fees, in which case transferwise will deduct this amount from the money returned under their conditions of use(new tab). common reasons for a failed transfer: error in the transfer details (for example, when entering the recipient‚Äôs name or account information).special characters or too many characters in the recipient‚Äôs name or reference field.limits have been reached or online payments aren‚Äôt active in card settings.foreign currency transfers aren‚Äôt possible with n26 business or n26 business you or if the recipient is a business account.

question: how to add or remove shared space participants?
answer: for an owner to remove a participant from a shared space: in the space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.from the ‚Äòparticipants‚Äô list, tap on the arrow to the right of the relevant participant‚Äôs name (ios). android users can just simply tap on the participant‚Äôs name.tap ‚Äòrevoke power of attorney‚Äô. confirm the notification on the next screen and tap ‚Äòrevoke power of attorney‚Äô.   accept an invitation and join a shared space: in the spaces overview, tap the space with ‚Äòpending‚Äô and the shared space icon. read the shared space summary and continue to the power of attorney screen.once you‚Äôve read and understood the information on the power of attorney page (the legal screen), tick the box and tap the ‚Äòaccept power of attorney‚Äô button.enter your confirmation pin.confirm the ‚Äòaccept power of attorney‚Äô push notification on your paired mobile device you‚Äôll need to have enough free space(s) to accept an invitation to a shared space. if not, you can only proceed if you delete other space(s) to free up ‚Ä¶ space. you must also not have any open space with the same name or image as the shared space. you can only accept the invitation to join a shared space once you change the name/image of the other space(s).  to leave a shared space: in the space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.inside the settings tap on ‚Äòexit shared space‚Äô.confirm the notification on the next screen and tap ‚Äòleave the space‚Äô. a shared space can be created and modified within the n26 app or webapp  learn more

question: how to set my card pin?
answer: we don‚Äôt send you a pin via post; you set the pin for your mastercard or maestro card once you‚Äôve successfully connected your smartphone to your account and activated your card(s). to set or change your card pin: go to the actions tab.select card settings and swipe to choose a card.select reset pin on the mobile or webapp(new tab).enter the 10-digit token number on your card.choose your new pin and confirm it. keep in mind that: if you live in france, spain, ireland, greece, finland, or estonia, you must make your first payment using chip and pin before you can use your card anywhere else. you can also first make a withdrawal or balance inquiry at atm instead.for security reasons we don‚Äôt accept any pin containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences (such as 1111, 1234, or 4321). if the number you‚Äôve chosen is not accepted please try again using a different combination.if a pin is entered incorrectly three times in a row, the card will automatically be blocked for security reasons. if this happens, please contact our customer support via chat so we can unblock it for you.your card pin is separate from your confirmation pin, however you can choose the same pin for both.
